T02D1180:4b-23: de rnams rgyal bas kye yi rdo rje snying pos bdag la gsungs pa'ang med //
T02D1180:4b-24: gtsug lag dge slong skye bo la gsungs gang de'ang ma ga dh'a skad gzhan pa min //
T02D1180:4b-25: sde snod gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs gang de ni gnas brtan sde ba'i lugs su ste //
T02D1180:5a-1: gzhan de la'ang sman gzhan 'di ste nad 'di gzhom pa'i ched du'o //
T02D1180:5a-2: thub pa'i don la sogs pa rton pa rnam bzhi 'di yin tshig 'bru sogs la min //
T02D1180:5a-3: gang zhig lha dang lha min klu dang gnod sbyin skad rnams dang ni gzhan gyis kyang //
T02D1180:5a-4: chos rnams cig car ston mdzad 'jig rten dpe spangs ngo mtshar byed pa bcom ldan gyis //
T02D1180:5a-5: gsung dbyangs de 'di'ang legs sbyar mtshan nyid can gyis ae bam ma y'a zhes sogs kyis //
T02D1180:5a-6: gtsug lag bshad ces smra 'di skye bo mkhas pa rnams kyis mtshar bya cis ma yin //
T02D1180:5a-7: rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan mig 'phrul dang mtshungs sgyu ma lta bu mkha' 'gro ba'i //
T02D1180:5a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gang byis pa mkhas pa rnams kyis rtogs byed nges bshad de //
T02D1180:5a-9: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams dang ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams kyis spras //
T02D1180:5a-10: phung po khams dang dbang po rnams dang yul rnams bcas pa dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1180:5a-11: blun po rnams ni rten cing 'brel pa skye zhing 'byung ba rig par rtag tu 'dod //
T02D1180:5a-12: 'jig dang skye ba tshes grangs rgyu ba la sogs rtsis rnams rgyud gzhan du bstan to //
T02D1180:5a-13: skye bo byis 'ga' 'o ma med par zho 'dod pa med par ni 'o ma dang //
T02D1180:5a-14: ba byung yang ste spyod bral 'dir ni shes med
T02D1180:5a-15: pa la skyon ci zhig kye yi rdo rje yis
T02D1180:5a-16: ni bde mchog 'khor lo dang ni gdan bzhi shes
T02D1180:5a-17: par bya // kye yi rdo rje dang ni bde
T02D1180:5a-18: mchog 'khor lo nyung ngu 'di ni gdan bzhis shes
T02D1180:5a-19: par bya // par bya // mchog gi dang po'i
T02D1180:5a-20: sangs rgyas tshig dang bde mchog chen pos nges don
T02D1180:5a-21: par bya // par bya // shes par bya // de la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams ni //
T02D1180:5a-22: rgyud gzhan rnams kyis rtag tu ni //
T02D1180:5a-23: bstan dang rgyas bshad kyis shes bya //
T02D1180:5a-25: zhes pa kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel pa stong phrag drug
T02D1180:5a-26: par 'dod pa'i lha la bstod cing rgyud la 'jug
T02D1180:5a-27: pa ste yongs su bcad pa dang po'o /
T02D1180:5a-29: // / da ni rgyud bstan pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1180:5a-30: 'dir dang por re zhig brjod par bya ba dang /

T02D1180:5a-36: ba rnams la rang gi sems kyi bsam pas skye
T02D1180:5a-37: ba 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid stsol bar mdzad
T02D1180:5b-0: @5b pa ni / ae wam gyi yi ge la bzhugs pa /
T02D1180:5b-1: mkha' 'gro ma'i dra bas bskor ba /

T02D1180:5b-3: rdo rje snying pos gsol ba btab pa /
T02D1180:5b-4: bdag med mas kyang zhus pa /
T02D1180:5b-5: kye'i rdo rje 'bum phrag lnga pa las /
T02D1180:5b-6: nyung ngu'i rgyud gzhung phyed dang bcas pa'i bdun brgya
T02D1180:5b-7: pa 'di bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas bstan
T02D1180:5b-8: to // 'dir brjod par bya ba ni bcom ldan
T02D1180:5b-9: 'das kye'i rdo rje bdag med ma dang bcas pa'o
T02D1180:5b-10: to // // 'di rtogs par byed pa'i le'u'i tshogs
T02D1180:5b-11: kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po ni rjod par byed pa'o
T02D1180:5b-12: to // // // brjod par bya ba dang rjod
T02D1180:5b-13: par byed pa de dag gi phan tshun brjod bya
T02D1180:5b-14: rjod byed kyi mtshan nyid ni 'brel pa'o //
T02D1180:5b-15: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba byin pa ni dgos pa'o //
T02D1180:5b-16: dbang bskur nas de kho na nyid gsal bar byas
T02D1180:5b-17: pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o zhes pa 'di rnams
T02D1180:5b-18: mngon par yang dag par gzigs nas te /
T02D1180:5b-19: gdul bya'i skye bo nges pa dang bral ba rnams
T02D1180:5b-20: la zhes pa nyan thos kyi sdom pa dang bral
T02D1180:5b-21: ba rnams la'o // rang gi sems kyi bsam pas
T02D1180:5b-22: zhes pa 'dod pa lnga la nye bar longs spyod
T02D1180:5b-24: skye ba 'di la sangs rgyas nyid rab tu ster
T02D1180:5b-25: ba zhes pa ni yang dang yang du mi'i skye
T02D1180:5b-26: ba la ste / lha dang lha min la sogs pa la ni min no //
T02D1180:5b-27: ae wam gyi yi ge la bzhugs pa zhes pa
T02D1180:5b-28: bde ba thams cad kyi gzhi la bzhugs pas so
T02D1180:5b-29: // mkha' 'gro ma'i dra bas yongs su bskor ba
T02D1180:5b-30: zhes pa phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi
T02D1180:5b-32: kye'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
T02D1180:5b-33: pa rdo rje snying pos gsol ba btab pa shes
T02D1180:5b-34: rab bdag med mas yongs su zhus pas /
T02D1180:5b-35: kye yi rdo rje'i rtsa ba'i rgyud 'bum phrag lnga
T02D1180:5b-36: pa brtag pa chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis pa
T02D1180:5b-37: las nyung ngu'i rgyud rdzogs par byang chub pa dang
T02D1180:5b-38: / sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi brtag
T02D1180:5b-39: pa gnyis pa le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag
T02D1180:5b-40: nyid can phyed dang bcas pa'i bdun brgya pa'i gzhung
T02D1180:5b-41: gi tshad kyis bsdus pa'i rgyud ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1180:5b-42: rdo rje sems dpas yang dag par bstan te /
T02D1180:5b-43: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bden
T02D1180:5b-44: pa dag gis 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las
T02D1180:5b-45: 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi ched du bskyed pa dang
T02D1180:6a-1: dag gis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-2: de kho na nyid bsgom pas so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:6a-3: rgyud 'dir brjod par bya ba ni kye'i rdo rje yin la /
T02D1180:6a-4: kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud ni rjod par byed pa'o //
T02D1180:6a-5: brjod par bya ba de yang rjod par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa ste /
T02D1180:6a-6: dang po rdo rje rigs kyi le'u'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-7: de nas sngags kyi le'u'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-8: de nas lha'i le'u'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-9: de bzhin du lha dbang bskur ba'i le'u'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-10: de kho na nyid kyi le'u'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang //
T02D1180:6a-11: spyod pa'i le'u'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-12: brda dang gnas gtan la dbab pa'i le'u'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-13: rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo 'du ba'i le'u'i ngo bo nyid du gnas pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-14: rnam par dag pa'i le'u'i ngo bo nyid du gnas pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-15: mngon par dbang bskur ba'i le'u'i ngo bo nyid du gnas pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-16: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i brtag pa'i rgyal
T02D1180:6a-17: po'i le'u'i ngo bo nyid du gnas pa'o zhes pa
T02D1180:6a-18: yongs su bcad pa bcu gcig ni brtag pa dang
T02D1180:6a-19: po la'o // de nas sgyu ma'i dra ba'i brtag pa la /
T02D1180:6a-20: sgyu ma zhes pa ni mkha' 'gro ma ste /
T02D1180:6a-21: dra ba zhes pa ni tshogs pa'o //
T02D1180:6a-22: sdom pa ni 'dus pa ste he ru ka dang bcas pa zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1180:6a-23: 'di nyid du dang po re zhig rab gnas dang
T02D1180:6a-24: sbyin sreg dang thab khung dang las rab 'byam dang
T02D1180:6a-25: / mchod pa'i le'u'i ngo bo nyid kyis bzhugs pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-26: de nas dngos grub gtan la dbab pa'i le'u'i ngo bo nyid kyis bzhugs pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-27: de bzhin du rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang ;
T02D1180:6a-28: dgongs pa'i skad kyi le'u'i ngo bo nyid kyis bzhugs pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-29: rgyud thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsdus pa'i don gyi le'u'i ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pa dang /

T02D1180:6a-31: phyag rgya rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-32: bris sku dang glegs bam 'bri ba nges pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis bzhugs pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-33: bza' ba'i cho ga'i le'u'i ngo bo nyid kyis bzhugs pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-34: pad+ma can gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1180:6a-35: slob ma 'dul ba'i le'u'i ngo bo nyid kyis bzhugs pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-36: lha rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D1180:6a-37: sngags btu ba'i le'u'i ngo bo nyid kyis bzhugs pa dang /
T02D1180:6b-0: sngags bzlas pa'i @6b le'u'i ngo bo nyid kyis bzhugs pa dang /
T02D1180:6b-1: lhan cig skyes pa'i don gyis sbyor ba dang rjes
T02D1180:6b-2: su gnang ba'i gleng gzhi'i ngo bo nyid kyis bzhugs
T02D1180:6b-3: pa dang / de ltar le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis
T02D1180:6b-4: kyi bdag nyid kyi rgyud kyi ngo bo nyid kyis
T02D1180:6b-5: pa dang / bzhugs pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kye'i
T02D1180:6b-6: rdo rjes rdo rje snying po la bos par gyur
T02D1180:6b-7: pa dang / bzhugs pa'o // te / der bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1180:6b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D1180:6b-9: dang thugs kyi snying po ni ye shes te bde
T02D1180:6b-10: ba chen po'o // de nyid rje btsun gsang ba
T02D1180:6b-11: las ches shin tu gsang ba ste rnam par rtog
T02D1180:6b-12: pa'i bsgom pa la dga' ba rnams la sba bar
T02D1180:6b-13: bya zhing shin tu sba bar bya ba'o //
T02D1180:6b-14: ae ma rdo rje snying po snying rje chen po legs so legs so //
T02D1180:6b-16: byang chub sems dpa' dang sems dpa' chen po dang
T02D1180:6b-17: dam tshig sems dpa'i snying po kye'i rdo rje zhes
T02D1180:6b-18: bya ba nyon cig ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das
T02D1180:6b-19: kyis gsungs te / bzhugs pa'i gnas kyi mthar brjod pa'o //
T02D1180:6b-20: de'i phyir sngags bzhugs pa'i gnas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1180:6b-21: phyi nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba'i gsung ngag
T02D1180:6b-22: dang rdo rje snying pos gsol ba 'debs pa'o zhes
T02D1180:6b-23: pa'o // 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na ;
T02D1180:6b-24: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1180:6b-25: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i bha
T02D1180:6b-26: ga rnams la bzhugs so zhes pa bzhugs pa'i tshig
T02D1180:6b-27: go // 'o na 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
T02D1180:6b-28: dus gcig na zhes pa'i tshig gang yin pa de
T02D1180:6b-29: go // ci / ston pa po thams cad mkhyen
T02D1180:6b-30: pa'i yin nam 'on te sdud par byed pa gsol
T02D1180:6b-32: gnyi ga ltar na drang ba'i don du skyon yod de /
T02D1180:6b-33: 'dir gal te 'das pa'i dus su thos pa de nyid gsung bar byed na /
T02D1180:6b-34: de'i tshe ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ye shes med
T02D1180:6b-35: de gzhan las thos nas yongs su mkhyen pa'i phyir
T02D1180:6b-36: ro // ci ste sdud par byed pa po'i yin
T02D1180:6b-37: na de'i tshe 'di skad kyi yi ge la sogs
T02D1180:6b-39: rdo rje sems dpas ma gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1180:6b-40: de'i phyir ngag 'di dgongs pa'i skad gzhan gyis nges pa'i don du rtogs par bya ba'o //
T02D1180:6b-41: 'di yi nges pa'i don nyid ni //
T02D1180:6b-42: ae yig cha byed bzang po gang //
T02D1180:7a-2: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas //
T02D1180:7a-3: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ces pa bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1180:7a-4: de nyid ni ston pa po da ste bde ba chen po'o //
T02D1180:7a-6: bdag gis ni bdag nyid kyis so //
T02D1180:7a-7: dus gcig na ni skad cig gcig gis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na'o //
T02D1180:7a-8: bcom ldan 'das ni bde ba chen po'o //
T02D1180:7a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dgongs pa'i skad kyis phung po lnga rnams so //
T02D1180:7a-10: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
T02D1180:7a-11: btsun mo zhes pa la sku dang gsung dang thugs
T02D1180:7a-12: kyi bya ba rdo rje btsun mo rnams ni yul
T02D1180:7a-13: gyi chos can nam mkha' la sogs pa'i khams rnams
T02D1180:7a-14: te / srog 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i bye brag
T02D1180:7a-15: gis yon tan gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi
T02D1180:7a-16: dang lnga'i bye brag gis gtsug tor dang dpral ba
T02D1180:7a-17: dang mgrin pa dang snying ga dang lte ba'i pad+ma
T02D1180:7a-18: rnams kyi bha ga rnams su dang /
T02D1180:7a-19: lte ba dang gsang ba dang rdo rje nor bur
T02D1180:7a-20: yon tan gsum gyi dbye bas gnas pa rnams te
T02D1180:7a-21: / dga' ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas byang chub kyi sems de rnams su bzhugs so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:7a-22: zlog pas ni de las bzlog pa yon tan zad pas rdo rje nor bu dang gsang bar dang /
T02D1180:7a-23: yul zad pas lte ba dang snying ga dang mgrin
T02D1180:7a-24: pa dang dpral ba dang gtsug tor te 'di rnams
T02D1180:7a-25: su bzhugs te / rgyu mthun pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:7a-26: de ltar khams dang phung po la sogs pa rnams
T02D1180:7a-27: sgrib pa med pa nyid kyis rdzogs par brjod par
T02D1180:7a-28: bya ste bde ba chen po'i las so //
T02D1180:7a-30: wam yig ni m'a ma k'i'o //
T02D1180:7a-31: ma yig ni gos dkar mo'o //
T02D1180:7a-33: shru yig ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D1180:7a-34: tam yig ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:7a-35: de nas phung po rnams te /
T02D1180:7a-36: ae yig ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1180:7a-37: ka yig ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1180:7a-38: smin yig ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1180:7a-39: sa yig ni rin chen dbang po'o //
T02D1180:7a-40: ma yig ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1180:7a-41: ye yig ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1180:7a-42: bha yig ni dri rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1180:7a-43: ga yig ni ro rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1180:7a-44: w'an yig ni gzugs rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1180:7a-45: sa yig ni reg bya rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1180:7b-0: rba yig @7b ni sgra rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1180:7b-1: ta yig ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1180:7b-2: th'a yig ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'o //
T02D1180:7b-3: ga yig ni 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
T02D1180:7b-4: ta yig ni sa'i snying po'o //
T02D1180:7b-5: k'a yig ni nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02D1180:7b-6: ya yig ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02D1180:7b-7: w'a ka yig ni kun du bzang po ste /
T02D1180:7b-8: de ltar skye mched bcu gnyis rnams so //
T02D1180:7b-9: tsi yig ni rengs byed ma'o //
T02D1180:7b-10: tta yig ni nga rgyal ma'o //
T02D1180:7b-11: ba yig ni rmugs byed ma'o //
T02D1180:7b-12: dzra yig ni shin tu brtson 'grus ma'o //
T02D1180:7b-13: yo yig ni shin tu sngon mo'o //
T02D1180:7b-14: shita yig ni drag spyan ma'o //
T02D1180:7b-15: bha yig ni gnong mdzes so //
T02D1180:7b-16: ga yig ni gtsug tor ro //
T02D1180:7b-17: shu yig ni bgegs mthar byed do //
T02D1180:7b-18: pi yig ni shes rab mthar byed do //
T02D1180:7b-19: dza yig ni pad+ma mthar byed do //
T02D1180:7b-20: h'a yig ni gshin rje mthar byed do //
T02D1180:7b-21: ra yig ni shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid
T02D1180:7b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' gtso bo sum cu rtsa bdun
T02D1180:7b-23: pa'o // de ltar sum cu rtsa bdun byang chub
T02D1180:7b-24: kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams rim pa ji lta bar
T02D1180:7b-25: yongs su dag pa rnams te /
T02D1180:7b-30: las kyi dbang po'i bya ba drug rnams dang /
T02D1180:7b-31: las kyi dbang po drug dang /
T02D1180:7b-32: bde ba chen po'o zhes pa ste bzhi pa zad pa las so //
T02D1180:7b-33: de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams dang /
T02D1180:7b-34: yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnams dang /
T02D1180:7b-35: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rnams dang /
T02D1180:7b-38: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang /
T02D1180:7b-39: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnams so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:7b-40: de ltar bde ba chen po las ngo bo nyid las chos kyi sku ste /
T02D1180:7b-41: bzhi pa zad pa las gnyid stug po zad do //
T02D1180:7b-42: gnyid stug po zad pas rmi lam zad do //
T02D1180:7b-43: rmi lam zad pa las sad pa zad pa'o //
T02D1180:7b-44: de rnams zad pa las rim pa ji lta bar lhan cig skyes pa dang /
T02D1180:7b-45: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1180:7b-46: sprul pa'i sku rnams su rim pa ji lta bar 'gyur te /
T02D1180:7b-50: lus sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //

T02D1180:11a-5: kyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa dang bral ba shes rab
T02D1180:11a-6: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes rtog pa'i
T02D1180:11a-7: dra ba dang bral bas zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1180:11a-8: de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'jig rten gsum kun
T02D1180:11a-9: du bskyod pa'i he ru ka ngo bo nyid kyi
T02D1180:11a-10: sku'o // dngos po kun la khyab pa po //
T02D1180:11a-11: zhes pa phung po drug dang /
T02D1180:11a-15: las kyi dbang po drug rnams dang /
T02D1180:11a-16: las kyi dbang po'i bya ba drug rnams te dngos
T02D1180:11a-17: po 'di rnams la khyab pa po ye shes kyi
T02D1180:11a-18: sku'o // lus la gnas kyang lus skyes min //
T02D1180:11a-19: zhes pa skye ba dang 'jig pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1180:11a-20: 'dir gang mkha' 'gro ma dra ba sdom pa brtag
T02D1180:11a-21: pa gnyis par dngos grub gtan la 'bebs pa'i le'ur
T02D1180:11a-22: 'chad par 'gyur ba rdo rje snying pos gsol ba
T02D1180:11a-23: btab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi lan gyi
T02D1180:11a-24: gsung de ni kun rdzob tu byis pa'i skye bos
T02D1180:11a-25: rtogs pa'i don du bskyed pa'i tshul gyis dbang po
T02D1180:11a-26: gnyis kyi bde ba bstan pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:11a-28: rdo rje'i snying pos gsol ba btab pa /
T02D1180:11a-29: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1180:11a-30: dam pa'i bde ba bde chen na //
T02D1180:11a-31: rdzogs pa bsgom pa med pa ste /
T02D1180:11a-32: bskyed pa yi ni dgos pa ci //
T02D1180:11a-33: zhes pa la 'dir rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya
T02D1180:11a-34: ba ni rtog pa dang dbang po gnyis kyi bde
T02D1180:11a-36: de nyid sangs rgyas nyid ster bar byed pa yin
T02D1180:11a-37: na de'i phyir rtog pas dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang
T02D1180:11a-38: phyag rgya bskyed pas dgos pa ci yod ces pa'o
T02D1180:11a-39: // tshig 'di gsan nas bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rjes bka' stsal pa /
T02D1180:11a-40: byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di //
T02D1180:11a-41: ae ma dad pa'i shugs kyis nyams //
T02D1180:11a-42: zhes pa kun rdzob tu ste /
T02D1180:11a-43: lus kyi dngos med gang la bde //
T02D1180:11a-44: bde ba smra bar mi nus so //
T02D1180:11a-45: khyab bya khyab byed ngo bo yis //
T02D1180:11a-46: bde bas 'gro ba khyab pa po //
T02D1180:11a-47: ji ltar me tog la gnas dri //
T02D1180:11a-48: me tog dngos med las mi rtogs //
T02D1180:11a-49: de bzhin gzugs sogs dngos med pas //
T02D1180:11a-50: bde ba dmigs pa nyid mi 'gyur //
T02D1180:11b-0: zhes pa kun rdzob kyis @11b so ;
T02D1180:11b-1: / de nyid du slar yang don dam par 'gog pa 'di lta ste /
T02D1180:11b-2: dngos nga dngos po med pa nga //
T02D1180:11b-3: zhes pa rnam pa thams cad pa'i shes rab po //
T02D1180:11b-4: dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas nga //
T02D1180:11b-5: zhes pa mngon par shes pa drug can thabs so //
T02D1180:11b-6: rmongs pa gang rnams nga mi shes //
T02D1180:11b-7: 'di ltar gyur pa'i gang zhig le los bcom pas
T02D1180:11b-8: kyang ste de rnams ni dbang po gnyis kyi bde
T02D1180:11b-9: bas nye bar bcom pa rnams so zhes pa la
T02D1180:11b-10: sogs pas snga ma dang phyi ma drang ba dang
T02D1180:11b-11: nges pa'i don nyid de le'u de nyid du rgya
T02D1180:11b-12: cher bshad pa'o // 'dir ni rigs kyi le'ur gsungs pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1180:11b-13: 'dir khams gsum pa rgyu ba dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1180:11b-16: da ltar byung ba la khyab par byed pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1180:11b-17: gal te sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de lus las
T02D1180:11b-18: skyes pa yin na rten dang brten pa'i 'brel pas
T02D1180:11b-19: me tog gi dri ji lta ba bzhin du ste
T02D1180:11b-20: / ji ltar me tog med par ni dri med pa bzhin du /
T02D1180:11b-22: de ltar yang ma yin no //
T02D1180:11b-23: de'i phyir phyi dang lus la khyab pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1180:11b-24: phyi ma la gnas pa dang /
T02D1180:11b-25: lus la gnas pa zhes brjod kyi /
T02D1180:11b-26: gang gi phyir lus med pa na de med pa
T02D1180:11b-27: ni ma yin pa de'i phyir lus skyes min zhes
T02D1180:11b-28: pa nges pa'o // de skad du bshad pa /
T02D1180:11b-29: ji ltar bum pa zhig gyur kyang //
T02D1180:11b-30: nam mkha' la ni 'jig pa med //
T02D1180:11b-31: de ltar lus ni zhig gyur kyang //
T02D1180:11b-32: ye shes la ni 'jig pa med //
T02D1180:11b-34: kye'i rdo rje rgya cher 'grel pa stong phrag drug
T02D1180:11b-35: par shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pa'i ye
T02D1180:11b-36: shes nges pa ste yongs su bcad pa gsum pa'o
T02D1180:11b-38: / // / da ni rdo rje'i lus la rtsa rnams brjod par bya ste /
T02D1180:11b-39: 'dir rdo rje'i snying pos gsol pa /
T02D1180:11b-40: kye bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lus la rtsa du lags /
T02D1180:11b-41: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1180:11b-42: rtsa rnams ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te /
T02D1180:11b-43: byang chub kyi sems sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bab pa
T02D1180:11b-44: bde ba chen po'i gnas su 'dzag pa rnams so
T02D1180:11b-45: zhes pa la / 'dir bde ba chen po yang dag par myong bar byed pa'i phyir /
T02D1180:11b-46: bde ba chen po zhes brjod par bya ste gsang
T02D1180:11b-47: ba'i 'khor lo rtsa sum cu gnyis kyi bdag nyid
T02D1180:11b-48: tsan ka yig la sogs pa sde pa drug gi
T02D1180:11b-49: gsal byed sum cu dang gzhom du med pa gnyis
T02D1180:12a-7: ye shes kyi khams kyi chos kyi ae wam gyi yi ge'i chos kyis so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:12a-9: k'a kh'a g'a gh'a ng'a zhes pa nam mkha'i khams rnams te /
T02D1180:12a-10: aa ku ha rnam bar bcad pa rnams mgrin pa
T02D1180:12a-11: las gyur pa'o zhes pa ha yig gis shes par
T02D1180:12a-13: de'i nang du lhung ba ni de smos pas gzung
T02D1180:12a-14: bar bya'o zhes pa'i yongs su bshad pas grub pa'o
T02D1180:12a-15: // k'a'i sde pa ni nam mkha'i khams so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:12a-17: ts'a tsh'a dz'a dzh'a ny'a zhes pa ai tsu ya
T02D1180:12a-18: sha rnams rkan las 'byung ngo zhes pa rlung gi
T02D1180:12a-19: khams te ai yig gis shes par byed pa las
T02D1180:12a-21: t'a th'a d'a dh'a n'a zhes pa ri tu ra
T02D1180:12a-22: sha rnams spyi bo las 'byung ba rnams so zhes
T02D1180:12a-23: pa me'i khams te re phas shes par byed pa
T02D1180:12a-25: p'a ph'a b'a bh'a m'a zhes pa au pu hya
T02D1180:12a-26: wa mchu can rnams mchu las skyes pa chu'i khams
T02D1180:12a-27: te wa yig gis shes par byed pa las so
T02D1180:12a-29: t'a th'a d'a dh'a n'a zhes pa li tu la
T02D1180:12a-30: sa rnams so las byung ba sa'i khams te la
T02D1180:12a-31: yig gis shes par byed pa las so //
T02D1180:12a-32: 'di rnams kyi nang na s'a w'a sh'a sh'a thk'a zhes pas dang /
T02D1180:12a-36: nam mkha'i rang bzhin can rnam pa lnga'i bdag nyid drug pa ye shes kyi khams so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:12a-37: ae wam gyi yi ge ni 'gyur med gnyis te
T02D1180:12a-38: ae wam gyi yi ge la sogs pa rnams ni
T02D1180:12a-39: gang gis na byang chub kyi sems 'gugs pa de
T02D1180:12a-40: bas ni byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa rnams su
T02D1180:12a-41: gsungs so // bde ba chen po'i gnas su 'jig
T02D1180:12a-42: pa zhes pa ni gci ba dang bshang ba dang
T02D1180:12a-44: de rnams kyi dbus na 'og dang steng du rtsa gsum ni gtso mo rnams yin cing /
T02D1180:12a-45: 'og tu bshang ba 'dzag pa dang gci ba 'dzag
T02D1180:12a-46: pa dang khu ba 'dzag par byed pa ste lte
T02D1180:12a-48: lte ba las steng du brkyang ma dang ro ma dang kun 'dar ma zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:12a-50: brkyang ma shes rab rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1180:12a-51: ro ma thabs kyis yang dag gnas //
T02D1180:12a-52: aa wa dh'u t'i dbus phyogs su //
T02D1180:12a-53: gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa nyid //
T02D1180:12a-54: ces pa la 'dir shes rab kyi sgra yis zla
T02D1180:12a-55: ba brjod de de'i rang bzhin sna bug g-yon par
T02D1180:12a-56: srog 'bab pa'o // des na zla ba'i rang bzhin
T02D1180:12b-0: gyis zhes @12b ba srog 'bab pa brkyang ma gnas
T02D1180:12b-1: srog 'bab pa'o // pa'o // thabs kyi sgra yis
T02D1180:12b-2: nyi ma brjod par bya zhing de'i sna bug g-yas
T02D1180:12b-3: par srog 'bab pa rang bzhin te /
T02D1180:12b-4: rang bzhin des ro ma gnas so //
T02D1180:12b-6: nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02D1180:12b-7: mtshan mo shes rab rab tu grags //
T02D1180:12b-8: ji ltar nyi ma zhi bar brjod //
T02D1180:12b-9: zla ba nu ma de ltar bshad //
T02D1180:12b-15: gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga spro ba'i rim pas brkyang mar gnas so //
T02D1180:12b-20: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor lnga sdud pa'i rim pas ro mar gnas so //
T02D1180:12b-21: dus sbyor bcu gnyis yongs su bskor bas mi mnyam
T02D1180:12b-22: pa dang mnyam pa'i dus sbyor rab tu rgyu bas
T02D1180:12b-23: dkyil 'khor sum cu longs spyod pa can brkyang ma
T02D1180:12b-24: dang ro ma'o // 'dir chu srin gyi dus sbyor
T02D1180:12b-25: la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams rim pa ji lta
T02D1180:12b-26: dang ro ma'o // bar / 'di lta ste /
T02D1180:12b-27: k'a kh'a g'a gh'a ng'a zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:12b-28: de nas lugs las bzlog pas bum par yi ge
T02D1180:12b-29: thung ngu rnams spro ba'i rim pas rtsa g-yon par
T02D1180:12b-31: nga gha ga kha ka zhes pa nam mkha' la
T02D1180:12b-32: sogs pa rnams dang rnam par shes pa la sogs
T02D1180:12b-33: pa rnams so // de bzhin du g-yas su yang
T02D1180:12b-34: gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang sa la sogs pa
T02D1180:12b-35: rnams te lus dang bsam pa'i dbye bas gzung ba
T02D1180:12b-36: dang 'dzin pa'i 'brel pas so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:12b-37: de bzhin du nyi shar ba na ts'a tsh'a dz'a
T02D1180:12b-38: dzh'a ny'a zhes pa g-yas par sdud pa'i rim pas
T02D1180:12b-39: so // de nas lug 'char ba na nya dzha
T02D1180:12b-40: dza tsha tsa zhes pa g-yon par spro ba'i rim
T02D1180:12b-41: so // pas so // de bzhin du glang 'char ba na t'a th'a d'a dh'a n'a zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:12b-42: de bzhin du 'khrig pa 'char ba na na dha da tha ta zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:12b-43: de nas karka ta 'char ba na p'a ph'a b'a bh'a m'a zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:12b-44: de bzhin du ma bha ba pha pa zhes pa seng ge la'o //
T02D1180:12b-45: t'a th'a d'a dh'a n'a zhes pa bu mo la'o //
T02D1180:12b-46: na dha da tha ta zhes pa srang shar ba na'o //
T02D1180:12b-47: s'a w'a sh'a sh'a thk'a zhes pa sdig pa 'char ba na'o //
T02D1180:12b-48: de nas thka sha sha wa sa zhes pa gzhu'i dus sbyor 'char ba na'o //
T02D1180:12b-49: de ltar nyin mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor drug cu rnams so /
T02D1180:12b-50: de bzhin du nang gi rtsa rnams la dkyil 'khor rgyu ba rnams te /
T02D1180:12b-51: de rnams kyis shes par byed pa de rnams las
T02D1180:13a-0: skyes pa rnams ni lag pa dang rkang pa'i @13a
T02D1180:13a-1: * // tshigs rnams la brjod par bya'o //
T02D1180:13a-2: g-yas pa'i phrag pa dang dpung pa'i tshigs la chu srin gyi dus sbyor te /
T02D1180:13a-3: de'i dkyil 'khor so so'i bdag nyid sa la sogs
T02D1180:13a-4: pa'i dkyil 'khor ni mthe bo dang mdzub mo dang
T02D1180:13a-5: gung mo dang ming med dang mthe'u chung rnams kyi
T02D1180:13a-6: tshigs 'og ma rnams la rim pa ji lta bar
T02D1180:13a-7: ro zhes pa'o // de nas bum pa'i dus sbyor
T02D1180:13a-8: la g-yon pa'i phrag pa dang dpung pa'i tshigs la
T02D1180:13a-9: ro zhes pa'o // ste / nam mkha' la sogs
T02D1180:13a-10: pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni rim pa ji lta bar
T02D1180:13a-11: mthe'u chung dang ming med dang gung mo dang mdzub
T02D1180:13a-12: mo dang ma the bo'i 'og gi tshigs kyi mtshams
T02D1180:13a-13: ro zhes pa'o // ste / rnams la'o // de
T02D1180:13a-14: bzhin du g-yas pa'i dpung pa dang nye ba'i tshigs
T02D1180:13a-15: rnams la nya'i dus sbyor te /
T02D1180:13a-16: mthe bo la sogs pa'i tshigs gnyis pa'i mtshams rnams su dkyil 'khor rnams so //
T02D1180:13a-17: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i dpung pa dang nye ba'i
T02D1180:13a-18: dpung pa'i mtshams la lug gi dus sbyor te mthe
T02D1180:13a-19: 'u chung la sogs pa'i tshigs kyi phreng ba gnyis
T02D1180:13a-20: pa'i mtshams rnams su dkyil 'khor rnams so //
T02D1180:13a-21: de nas g-yas pa'i lag pa dang lag ngar gyi mtshams la glang gi dus sbyor te /
T02D1180:13a-22: mthe bo la sogs pa'i tshigs kyi phreng ba gsum pa'i mtshams la dkyil 'khor rnams so //
T02D1180:13a-23: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i lag pa dang lag ngar
T02D1180:13a-24: gyi mtshams su 'khrig pa'i dus sbyor te mthe'u chung
T02D1180:13a-25: la sogs pa tshigs kyi phreng ba gsum pa'i mtshams
T02D1180:13a-27: de ltar byang chub tu bgrod pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1180:13a-28: de nas lhor bgrod pa la 'di lta ste /
T02D1180:13a-29: g-yas pa'i rked pa dang brla'i tshigs la karka ta'i
T02D1180:13a-30: dus sbyor te rkang pa g-yas pa'i mthe bo la
T02D1180:13a-31: sogs pa'i tshigs kyi phreng ba dang po'i mtshams su
T02D1180:13a-32: sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams rim pa ji
T02D1180:13a-33: lta bar ro // de nas g-yon pa'i rked pa
T02D1180:13a-34: dang brla'i mtshams su seng ge'i dus sbyor te rkang
T02D1180:13a-35: pa g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung la sogs pa'i tshigs kyi
T02D1180:13a-36: phreng ba dang po'i mtshams rnams la nam mkha' la
T02D1180:13a-37: sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams rim pa ji lta bar
T02D1180:13a-38: lta bar ro // ro zhes pa'o // de bzhin
T02D1180:13a-39: du g-yas pa'i pus mo dang brla'i mtshams su bu
T02D1180:13a-41: rkang pa g-yas pa'i mthe bo la sogs pa'i tshigs
T02D1180:13a-42: kyi phreng ba gnyis pa'i mtshams rnams su dkyil 'khor
T02D1180:13b-0: rnams @13b so ; te / mthe'u chung la sogs
T02D1180:13b-1: pa'i tshigs kyi phreng ba gnyis pa'i mtshams rnams la
T02D1180:13b-3: de bzhin du g-yas pa'i rkang pa dang pus mo'i mtshams su sdig pa'i dus sbyor te /
T02D1180:13b-4: mthe bo la sogs pa'i tshigs kyi phreng ba gsum pa'i mtshams rnams la dkyil 'khor rnams so //
T02D1180:13b-5: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i rkang pa dang pus mo'i mtshams su gzhu'i dus sbyor te /
T02D1180:13b-6: mthe'u chung la sogs pa'i tshigs kyi phreng ba gsum
T02D1180:13b-7: pa'i mtshams rnams su dkyil 'khor rnams rim pa ji
T02D1180:13b-8: lta bar ro // de ltar na dkyil 'khor drug
T02D1180:13b-9: cu rnams ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo la yin zhing
T02D1180:13b-10: bzhi ni stong pa'i gnas rnams te /
T02D1180:13b-11: ae wam gyi yi ge'i rang bzhin rnams so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:13b-12: de'i phyir sprul pa'i 'khor lo la pad+ma 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
T02D1180:13b-13: 'dab ma'i sgra yis dkyil 'khor drug cu 'bab pa'i rtsa rnams brjod do /
T02D1180:13b-14: bzhi ni stong pa 'bab pa rnams so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:13b-15: de ltar dus sbyor so so'i rtsa la gnas lnga rnams te dbus su stong pa 'bab pa'i rtsa'o //
T02D1180:13b-18: byang du chu rgyu ba'i rtsa'o //
T02D1180:13b-20: dbus su aa wa dh'u t'i ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'bab pa ste /
T02D1180:13b-22: lte ba'i dbus su dpa' bo gnas //
T02D1180:13b-23: ze 'bru gsang ba'i spyod yul la'o //
T02D1180:13b-25: de ltar dbyu gu drug cu rnams dkyil 'khor drug cu 'bab pa'i byed pa rnams so //
T02D1180:13b-26: bzhi ni stong pa 'bab pa'i byed pa ste /
T02D1180:13b-27: ji ltar zla ba'i cha bcu drug pa skad cig
T02D1180:13b-28: tsam yin pa de ltar de ni dkyil 'khor yongs
T02D1180:13b-29: su rdzogs pa 'bab pa yang yin par shes par
T02D1180:13b-30: bya'o zhes pa sprul pa'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1180:13b-31: mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor zla ba'i rang bzhin gyi brkyang ma ste /
T02D1180:13b-32: mnyam pa'i dus sbyor nyi ma'i rang bzhin gyi ro ma'o //
T02D1180:13b-33: aa wa dh'u t'i ni mnyam pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs pa dbus phyogs su ste /
T02D1180:13b-34: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la shes par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:13b-35: de ltar sprul pa'i 'khor lo la dbyu gu'i 'pho
T02D1180:13b-36: ba rnams drug cu rtsa bzhi ste bzhi ni stong
T02D1180:13b-37: pa'o // de nas chos kyi 'khor lo la pad+ma
T02D1180:13b-38: 'dab ma brgyad pa ste der 'dab ma brgyad rnams
T02D1180:14a-0: pa'o // la @14a * // thun tshod kyi dbye bas 'pho ba brgyad rnams te /
T02D1180:14a-1: phyed dang bcas pa'i dus sbyor gyi bdag nyid can brkyang ma'i dang ro ma'i zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:14a-2: de nas mgrin pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo
T02D1180:14a-3: la gsal byed thung du'i dbye bas rtsa sum cu
T02D1180:14a-5: longs spyod rdzogs par ni pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis par bla ma'i man ngag las te /
T02D1180:14a-6: rgyud du ni lugs las bzlog pas gsungs so //
T02D1180:14a-7: de la yud tsam gyi dbye bas 'pho ba sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams so //
T02D1180:14a-8: dpral bar pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa ste de
T02D1180:14a-9: la thun tshod phyed pa'i dbye bas 'pho ba bcu
T02D1180:14a-10: drug rnams so // gtsug tor du pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa ste /
T02D1180:14a-11: de la thun mtshams kyi dbye bas 'pho ba bzhi rnams so //
T02D1180:14a-12: 'dir dbugs phyi rol du rgyu ba ni de las
T02D1180:14a-13: dbugs phyir 'byung ba'i dus su sprul pa'i 'khor lo
T02D1180:14a-14: la dbyu gu'i rtsa'i dkyil 'khor sna'i bu gar 'char
T02D1180:14a-15: bar 'gyur te / sna'i bu ga gnyis su g-yon
T02D1180:14a-16: pa'am g-yas par dang po'i tha mar gang gi tshe
T02D1180:14a-17: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'bab pa de'i tshe dbus su
T02D1180:14a-18: bar 'gyur te / rgyu'o // gang gi tshe rlung
T02D1180:14a-19: gi dkyil 'khor 'bab pa de'i tshe sna'i bu gar
T02D1180:14a-21: gang gi tshe me'i dkyil 'khor 'bab pa de'i tshe sna'i bu ga la g-yas su reg cing ngo //
T02D1180:14a-22: gang gi tshe chu'i dkyil 'khor 'bab pa de'i tshe g-yon du reg cing ste /
T02D1180:14a-23: g-yon du'am g-yas su yang rung sna la mngon du phyogs par ro //
T02D1180:14a-24: gang gi tshe sa'i dkyil 'khor rgyu ba de'i tshe 'og tu reg cing ngo //
T02D1180:14a-25: de ltar sna'i bu ga dag la gnas lnga rnams su rnal 'byor pas shes par bya ste //
T02D1180:14a-26: g-yon du'am g-yas su mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dus sbyor 'char ba'i dbye bas so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:14a-27: 'dir kye'i rdo rje 'bum phrag lnga par gang 'di
T02D1180:14a-28: rgyas par bshad pa de ni mang ba nyid kyi
T02D1180:14a-29: phyir ma brjod de thos pa chung ba rnams mang
T02D1180:14a-30: po bshad pa la skrag par 'gyur ro zhes bcom
T02D1180:14a-32: dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid can gyi khyim
T02D1180:14a-33: gyi 'khor lo la chu srin la sogs pa 'di
T02D1180:14a-34: ni gdan bzhir shes par bya ste 'chi ltas kyi
T02D1180:14a-35: mtshan nyid kyang ste rgyud ni rgyud gzhan gyis rtogs
T02D1180:14a-36: par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1180:14a-37: ro hi ta dang mo hi ta la sogs pa'i
T02D1180:14a-38: rtsa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dus sbyor 'bab
T02D1180:14a-39: pa rnams so zhes pa dgongs pa'i skad gzhan gyis
T02D1180:14a-40: gsungs te / rtsa de rnams kyis bzang ba dang
T02D1180:14a-41: ngan pa der gsungs shing 'chi ltas dang 'chi ba
T02D1180:14b-2: brkyang ma mi bskyod 'bab pa ste //
T02D1180:14b-3: ro ma khrag ni rab 'bab cing //
T02D1180:14b-4: shes rab zla ba 'bab bshang ba //
T02D1180:14b-5: aa wa dh'u t'i de rab grags //
T02D1180:14b-6: zhes pa ste 'di mi bskyod pa ni chu'i khams
T02D1180:14b-7: te chu'i khams rgyu ba ni sna bug g-yon pa
T02D1180:14b-8: brkyang ma'o // khrag ni me'i khams te /
T02D1180:14b-9: g-yas par me'i khams 'bab pa ni ro ma'o //
T02D1180:14b-10: de ltar na g-yon par chu las skyes pa pad+ma dang /
T02D1180:14b-11: g-yas par me las skyes pa rin po che lhag pa'i lha'o //
T02D1180:14b-12: shes rab aa wa dh'u t'i ste zla ba ni thig le khu ba yin la /
T02D1180:14b-13: de nyid ni lnga'i bdag nyid can stong pa chen
T02D1180:14b-14: po 'bab par byed do zhes pas stong pa 'bab
T02D1180:14b-15: cing dbus su rdo rje'i rigs lhag pa'i lha ste
T02D1180:14b-16: / aa wa dh'u t'i ru rab tu grags so //
T02D1180:14b-17: de bzhin du zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra
T02D1180:14b-18: gcan 'bab ma brkyang ma dang ro ma dang aa
T02D1180:14b-19: wa dh'u t'i rim pa ji lta ba ste srog
T02D1180:14b-21: thur sel la ni bshang ba dang gci ba dang
T02D1180:14b-22: khu ba 'bab ma rnams te lte ba las 'og
T02D1180:14b-25: rdo rje rtse gcig pa rnams so //
T02D1180:14b-26: steng gi sgo rnams dang 'og gi sgo rnams so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:14b-27: de ni 'og gi sgo can chu 'bab pa sum
T02D1180:14b-28: cu rtsa gnyis rnams bshad par bya ste mi phyed
T02D1180:14b-29: ma la sogs pa rnams so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:14b-30: 'dir dkar po'i phyogs la dbyangs bco lnga rnams te bcu drug pa thig le'o //
T02D1180:14b-31: rtsa de rnams kyang 'phyang ma la bskor nas gnas pa'o //
T02D1180:14b-33: aa ai ri au li zhes pa rim pa ji lta bar tshes gcig dang /
T02D1180:14b-37: de bzhin du yon tan rnams te /
T02D1180:14b-38: aar ae aar ao aal zhes pa drug po la sogs pa ste ;
T02D1180:14b-39: rim pa ji lta bas so //
T02D1180:14b-40: de la yan du bsgyur ba rnams ni ha ya ra wa la zhes pa ste /
T02D1180:14b-41: rim pa ji lta bas bcu gcig pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1180:14b-42: thig le'i dbus su 'phyang ma ni bcu drug pa
T02D1180:14b-43: ste de ltar rkan gyi steng du dpral bar khu
T02D1180:14b-44: ba'i cha'i rang bzhin gyi bdud rtsi 'dzag ste /
T02D1180:14b-45: phyi rol du bsil ba dang nang du stu ka zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:14b-46: de bzhin du rtsa so so ste /
T02D1180:14b-48: mi phyed ma dang phra gzugs ma //
T02D1180:14b-49: mchog ma g-yon ma thung du ma //
T02D1180:14b-50: zhes pa tshes gcig la sogs pa lnga rnams so //
T02D1180:14b-52: rus sbal skyes sgom dbang bskur ma //
T02D1180:14b-53: skyon ldan ma dang bshang ba ma //
T02D1180:15a-0: @15a * // zhes pa drug pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1180:15a-1: mtshan mo ma mo bsil sbyin ma //
T02D1180:15a-2: drod ma dang ni la la n'a //
T02D1180:15a-3: zhes pa bcu gcig la sogs pa rnams te rim pa ji lta bas so //
T02D1180:15a-4: brkyang ma ni bco lnga'i bdag nyid de aa wa dh'u t'i ni bcu drug la'o //
T02D1180:15a-5: de nas nag po'i tshe sa gcig la sogs pa
T02D1180:15a-6: rnams ro ma la ste dbyangs ring po'i rang bzhin
T02D1180:15a-7: gyis tshes bco lnga rnams sdud pa'i rim pas so
T02D1180:15a-9: l'a w'a r'a y'a h'a zhes pa tshes gcig dang /
T02D1180:15a-12: bzhi pa dang lnga pa ste rim pa ji lta bas so //
T02D1180:15a-13: de nas yon tan 'phel ba'i dbye bas /
T02D1180:15a-14: a'al aoo a'ar aee a'a zhes pas rim pa ji lta bas drug pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1180:15a-15: de nas dbyangs ring po'i dbye bas /
T02D1180:15a-16: l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a zhes pa bcu gcig pa
T02D1180:15a-17: la sogs pa rnams te rim pa ji lta bas
T02D1180:15a-18: so // lce'i rtse mor bcu drug pa rnam par bcad pa'o //
T02D1180:15a-19: 'di rnams kyi dbus na zhes pa ro ma la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1180:15a-21: ro ma dang 'jal ma dang mdog gnas ma dang
T02D1180:15a-22: spyi ma dang rgyu sbyin ma zhes pa tshes gcig
T02D1180:15a-24: sbyor bral ma dang sdu gu ma dang grub ma
T02D1180:15a-25: dang 'tshed ma dang yid bzangs ma zhes pa drug
T02D1180:15a-26: pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1180:15a-27: sum skor ma dang 'dod ma dang khyim ma dang
T02D1180:15a-28: gtum mo dang k'a ty'a ya ni zhes pa bcu
T02D1180:15a-29: gcig la sogs pa rnams te /
T02D1180:15a-30: de ltar bco lnga rnams so //
T02D1180:15a-31: lce'i dbus su bdud 'dral ma skud pa nag po'i
T02D1180:15a-32: rang gzugs can lce'i rtse mo ji srid par langs
T02D1180:15a-33: pa / 'phyang ma dang 'dzag pa thung zhing ro myong ba'o zhes pa'o ;
T02D1180:15a-34: / yang rdo rje'i snying pos gsol pa /
T02D1180:15a-35: bcom ldan 'das rtsa 'di rnams ji lta bu lags /
T02D1180:15a-36: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1180:15a-37: srid gsum yongs gyur thams cad ni //
T02D1180:15a-38: zhes pa phung po dang dbang po dang las kyi dbang po yongs su gyur pa rnams zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:15a-39: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
T02D1180:15a-40: zhes pa dbu mar rab tu zhugs par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1180:15a-41: yang na thabs ni thams cad kyis //
T02D1180:15a-42: dngos po'i mtshan nyid du ni brtags //
T02D1180:15a-43: zhes pa khams dang yul dang bya ba rnams kyi
T02D1180:15a-44: rnam par shes pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid du brtags
T02D1180:15b-0: pa rnams so // kye'i @15b rdo rje'i 'grel pa
T02D1180:15b-1: stong phrag drug par rdo rje'i lus la rtsa rnams
T02D1180:15b-2: gtan la dbab pa ste yongs su bcad pa bzhi
T02D1180:15b-4: / da ni sdom pa'i dbye ba bshang bar bya ste /
T02D1180:15b-5: 'dir lugs mthun dang lugs las bzlog pa dag gis
T02D1180:15b-6: gang gsungs pa de rim pa ji lta bar 'grel
T02D1180:15b-8: 'dir sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni //
T02D1180:15b-9: ae wam yi ger rab tu gnas //
T02D1180:15b-10: gsang ba'i pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis par dang /
T02D1180:15b-11: gtsug tor gyi 'dab ma bzhi pa la'o //
T02D1180:15b-12: lhag ma kun rdzob pas sprul pa dang chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1180:15b-13: lhan cig skyes pa'i 'khor lo rnams su sdom pa
T02D1180:15b-14: ste 'du bar byed pa yin la 'dab ma drug
T02D1180:15b-15: cu rtsa bzhi pa dang 'dab ma brgyad pa dang
T02D1180:15b-16: 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa dang 'dab ma
T02D1180:15b-26: lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni lte bar ro //
T02D1180:15b-27: chos kyi sku ni snying gar ro //
T02D1180:15b-28: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni mgrin par ro //
T02D1180:15b-29: sprul pa'i sku ni dpral bar ro //
T02D1180:15b-31: snying gar shin tu gnyid pa'o //
T02D1180:15b-37: lte bar ye shes rdo rje'o //
T02D1180:15b-46: dkyil 'khor bzhi rnams so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:15b-47: skad cig ma bzhi rnams ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa ni dpral bar ro //
T02D1180:15b-48: rnam par smin pa ni mgrin par ro //
T02D1180:15b-49: rnam par nyid pa ni snying gar ro //
T02D1180:15b-50: mtshan nyid dang bral ba ni lte bar ro //
T02D1180:15b-51: de bzhin du dga' ba ni dbral bar ro //
T02D1180:15b-52: mchog dga' ni mgrin par ro //
T02D1180:15b-53: khyad dga'i dga' ba ni snying gar ro //
T02D1180:15b-54: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni lte bar ro //
T02D1180:15b-55: de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ni dpral bar ro //
T02D1180:15b-56: kun 'byung gi bden pa ni mgrin par ro //
T02D1180:15b-57: 'gog pa'i bden pa ni snying gar ro //
T02D1180:16a-2: de kho na nyid bzhi rnams te /
T02D1180:16a-3: bdag gi de kho na nyid ni dpral bar ro //
T02D1180:16a-4: sngags kyi de kho na nyid ni mgrin par ro //
T02D1180:16a-5: lha'i de kho na nyid ni snying gar ro //
T02D1180:16a-6: ye shes kyi de kho na nyid ni lte ba la'o //
T02D1180:16a-9: snying gar thams cad sems pa'o //
T02D1180:16a-10: lte bar bde ba myong ba'o //
T02D1180:16a-12: gnas brtan pa lte bar ro //
T02D1180:16a-13: thams cad yod par smra ba snying ga na'o //
T02D1180:16a-14: mgrin par kun gyis bkur ba'o //
T02D1180:16a-15: dpral bar dge 'dun phal chen pa'o //
T02D1180:16a-16: zla ba ni dpral bar ro //
T02D1180:16a-17: nyi ma ni mgrin pa na'o //
T02D1180:16a-20: dpral bar 'pho ba bcu drug rnams so //
T02D1180:16a-21: mgrin par sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1180:16a-23: lte bar 'pho ba drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams so //
T02D1180:16a-24: sngar bshad pa'i thun mtshams bzhi rnams te /
T02D1180:16a-25: snga ma'i thun mtshams ni dpral bar ro //
T02D1180:16a-26: nyin gung gi thun mtshams ni mgrin par ro //
T02D1180:16a-27: nyin mo'i phyi ma'i thun mtshams ni snying gar ro //
T02D1180:16a-28: mtshan phyed kyi thun mtshams ni lte ba la'o //
T02D1180:16a-29: dpral bar ni longs spyod do //
T02D1180:16a-30: mgrin par ni dbang byed do //
T02D1180:16a-32: lte bar ni bdag po nyid do //
T02D1180:16a-34: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa drug rnams dang /
T02D1180:16a-35: khams sum cu rtsa drug rnams sngar bshad pa'i cha bzhir byas nas /
T02D1180:16a-36: thams cad bzhi bzhir grangs ji lta bar rigs kyi
T02D1180:16a-37: dbye bas 'khor lo bzhi rnams la sbyar bar bya'o
T02D1180:16a-38: // ji lta bar rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su
T02D1180:16a-39: 'brangs nas rgyud ni rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa'i rnam
T02D1180:16a-40: pas rigs drug gi dbye bas 'khor lo drug tu
T02D1180:16a-41: // sdom pa'o // rigs lnga'i dbye bas 'khor lo lnga rnams su sdom pa'o //
T02D1180:16a-42: rigs bzhi'i dbye bas 'khor lo bzhi rnams su sdom pa'o //
T02D1180:16a-43: rigs gsum gyi dbye bas 'khor lo gsum rnams su sdom pa'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1180:16a-44: rigs gsum dang ni rigs bzhi'i rgyud //
T02D1180:16a-45: de bzhin rigs lnga rigs drug ste //
T02D1180:16a-46: khyab bya khyab byed dbye ba yis //
T02D1180:16a-47: brten pa rten gyi bye brag las //
T02D1180:16a-48: 'dir rten rigs gcig gi dbye bas brten pa zhal gcig pa'o //
T02D1180:16a-49: rten rigs gsum gyi dbye bas zhal gsum pa'o //
T02D1180:16b-0: rten rigs @16b bzhi'i dbye bas zhal bzhi pa'o //
T02D1180:16b-1: rten rigs lnga'i dbye bas zhal lnga pa'o //
T02D1180:16b-2: rten rigs drug gi dbye bas zhal drug pa'o //
T02D1180:16b-3: rten rigs brgyad kyi dbye bas zhal brgyad pa'o //
T02D1180:16b-4: 'dir dus me'i dbye bas zhal gcig par bshad pa'o //
T02D1180:16b-5: sgra gcan gyi dbye bas shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis zhal gnyis pa'o //
T02D1180:16b-6: sku dang gsung dang thugs zla ba dang /
T02D1180:16b-7: nyi ma dang sgra gcan gyi dbye bas zhal gsum pa'o //
T02D1180:16b-8: zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan dang dus
T02D1180:16b-9: me sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi
T02D1180:16b-11: phung po lnga'i dbye bas zhal lnga pa'o //
T02D1180:16b-12: phung po drug gi dbye bas zhal drug pa'o //
T02D1180:16b-13: zla ba rnam pa gnyis dang /
T02D1180:16b-16: dus me rnam pa gnyis te 'di rnams brgyad kyi dbye bas zhal brgyad pa'o //
T02D1180:16b-17: 'dir zla ba'i dbye ba ni dpral ba dang 'phyang ma'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1180:16b-18: nyi ma'i dbye ba ni lce dang mgrin pa'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1180:16b-19: sgra gcan gyi dbye ba ni snying ga dang gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1180:16b-20: dus me'i dbye ba ni lte ba dang gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:16b-22: sgra gcan steng du nyi ma gnas //
T02D1180:16b-23: nyi ma'i steng du zla ba'o //
T02D1180:16b-24: zla ba'i steng du sgra gcan te //
T02D1180:16b-25: de yis sna tshogs rab tu 'jug /
T02D1180:16b-26: de yis 'jug byed dus kyi me //
T02D1180:16b-27: lte ba gsang bar rnam gnyis gnas //
T02D1180:16b-28: de nyid rdo rje nyi mar brjod //
T02D1180:16b-29: gang du gtum mo gnas pa'o //
T02D1180:16b-30: bdud rtsi yang dag gnas gang du //
T02D1180:16b-31: ham yig gnas pa de ru'o //
T02D1180:16b-33: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
T02D1180:16b-34: ces pa sdom pa'i dbye ba'i nges pa'o //
T02D1180:16b-35: da ni gtum mo zhes pa la sogs pa gtum mo'i rnal 'byor brjod par bya'o //
T02D1180:16b-36: gtum mo lte bar 'bar ba yis //
T02D1180:16b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs shing //
T02D1180:16b-38: spyan la sogs pa rnam bsregs te //
T02D1180:16b-39: bsregs nas ri bong can ham 'dzag / ces pa mdor bstan pa'i tshig ste /
T02D1180:16b-40: mdor bstan pa 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa'i tshig ni rtsa ba'i rgyud la 'jug par bya ste /
T02D1180:16b-41: der bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1180:16b-42: gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba //
T02D1180:16b-43: rdo rje snying po nges bshad nyon //
T02D1180:16b-44: dngos grub thams cad rnams kyi rgyud //
T02D1180:17a-2: rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs pa //
T02D1180:17a-3: ye shes sku ste gnyis rtog med //
T02D1180:17a-4: rtsa gsum lte bar mgon po ni //
T02D1180:17a-5: lte ba gsang ba'i nang na gnas //
T02D1180:17a-6: de yi 'og dang steng son pa //
T02D1180:17a-7: glog gi dbyug pa mtshungs 'od can //
T02D1180:17a-8: rnam shes dbang po'i khams rnams ni //
T02D1180:17a-9: lus la gnas pa sad byed pa'o //
T02D1180:17a-10: sa yi dbang phyug ma de ni //
T02D1180:17a-11: lte bar rtse mo dbus mar gnas //
T02D1180:17a-12: gsang bar g-yas kyi rtse mo yang //
T02D1180:17a-13: ltung bzhin pa ni glog dang 'dra //
T02D1180:17a-14: rang 'dra'i shes rab yin par brjod //
T02D1180:17a-15: de 'dir gtum mo yin par bshad //
T02D1180:17a-16: de ni thur du rtsi gsum ste ;
T02D1180:17a-17: / de bzhin gyen du 'ang gsum rnams so //
T02D1180:17a-18: tshangs pa'i rtse mo dbus na gnas //
T02D1180:17a-19: khyab 'jug rtse mo g-yon pa na //
T02D1180:17a-20: g-yas pa drag po'i rtse mo'o //
T02D1180:17a-21: bshang ba gci ba khu ba 'bab //
T02D1180:17a-22: sgra gcan rtse mo dbus na gnas //
T02D1180:17a-23: zla ba'i rtse mo g-yon pa na //
T02D1180:17a-24: g-yas par nyi ma'i rtse mo'o //
T02D1180:17a-25: chu dang me dang nam mkha' 'bab //
T02D1180:17a-26: brkyang ma g-yon du yang dag bshad //
T02D1180:17a-27: g-yas pa na ni ro mar brjod //
T02D1180:17a-28: dbu mar aa wa dh'u t'i gang //
T02D1180:17a-29: de ni g-yung mor rab brjod bya //
T02D1180:17a-30: lte ba nas ni snying dbus su //
T02D1180:17a-31: lam gsum byas nas de nas 'gro //
T02D1180:17a-32: snying gnas ni mgrin dbus su //
T02D1180:17a-33: lam gsum byas nas slar yang son //
T02D1180:17a-34: dpral ba mgrin pa dag dbus su //
T02D1180:17a-35: lam gsum byas nas slar yang bgrod //
T02D1180:17a-36: dpral ba gtsug tor dag dbus su //
T02D1180:17a-37: lam gsum byas nas slar yang bgrod //
T02D1180:17a-38: gtsug tor nas ni sna bar du //
T02D1180:17a-39: lam gsum byas nas slar yang bgrod //
T02D1180:17a-40: sna yi bu ga g-yon par ni //
T02D1180:17a-41: brkyang mar yang dag rnam par gnas //
T02D1180:17a-42: g-yas su rtsa ni ro ma'o //
T02D1180:17a-43: smin dbus aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
T02D1180:17a-44: lte ba la sogs 'khor lo lnga //
T02D1180:17a-45: de rnams lam gsum lnga rnams nyid //
T02D1180:17a-46: lte ba nas ni lte dbus su //
T02D1180:17a-49: brkyang ma ro ma dag bshad do //
T02D1180:17a-50: lte bar sgra gcan de nas nyid //
T02D1180:17a-51: zla ba zla bas mtshan pa yang //
T02D1180:17a-52: phug nas gtsug tor du son pa //
T02D1180:17a-53: de ni aa wa dh'u t'i rtsa //
T02D1180:17a-54: gang tshe skyes bu 'dod myos pa'i //
T02D1180:17a-55: brkyang ma dang ni ro ma dang //
T02D1180:17a-56: de dag sbyar ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1180:17a-57: gtum mo nges par 'bab par byed //
T02D1180:17b-1: g-yung mo'i lam nas nges par 'byung /
T02D1180:17b-2: sgra gcan zla bas mtshan phug nas //
T02D1180:17b-3: de ni ham yig la reg byed //
T02D1180:17b-4: de yis reg pas ham yig de //
T02D1180:17b-5: de nas bdud rtsi dkar por 'ju //
T02D1180:17b-7: phung po khams sogs bsregs pas na /
T02D1180:17b-8: yul dang dbang po 'gags pa na //
T02D1180:17b-9: dga' ba la sogs 'byung ba la //
T02D1180:17b-10: zla ba las ni thig le 'dzag / ham yig spyi bor yang dag gnas //
T02D1180:17b-11: dpral ba zla bar mgrin nyi mar //
T02D1180:17b-12: de nas sgra gcan du song ba //
T02D1180:17b-13: lte bar gtum mo zhugs pa ni //
T02D1180:17b-14: gsang ba'i 'khor lor de nas bgrod ;
T02D1180:17b-16: 'di ni phyugs chen du bshad do //
T02D1180:17b-17: 'og tu rtse gsum rtsa rnams kyis //
T02D1180:17b-18: gang du spu bas su rab tu bstan //
T02D1180:17b-19: skye ba bdun pa phyugs nyid ni //
T02D1180:17b-20: mkha' la spyod pa'i dngos grub ster //
T02D1180:17b-21: rgyal ba yis ni nad rnams 'phrog / phung po khams ni zhu ba yis //
T02D1180:17b-22: 'khor los sgyur ba nyid sbyin byed //
T02D1180:17b-23: dbang po dang ni yul bsad pa //
T02D1180:17b-24: 'di ni mkha' la spyod nyid ster //
T02D1180:17b-25: phra la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan //
T02D1180:17b-26: rjes su bzhu bas sad pa sogs //
T02D1180:17b-27: myur du sangs rgyas nyid ster byed //
T02D1180:17b-28: ji ltar phyi rol dngul chu ba cings //
T02D1180:17b-29: de ltar ye shes bcud 'di yang //
T02D1180:17b-30: sdug bsngal thams cad nges 'joms pa'i //
T02D1180:17b-31: dngos grub rgya chen ster bar byed //
T02D1180:17b-32: de bzhin tshangs pa khyab 'jug phyugs //
T02D1180:17b-33: gsang ba'i 'khor lor nges ltung ba //
T02D1180:17b-34: ji srid bsregs pa bdun gyi bar //
T02D1180:17b-35: tshe 'di yangs pa sbyin par byed //
T02D1180:17b-36: steng du sgra gcan phyugs su brjod //
T02D1180:17b-37: zla ba nyi ma phyugs chen po //
T02D1180:17b-38: tshangs pa'i bu gar lhung gyur pas //
T02D1180:17b-39: spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu ster //
T02D1180:17b-40: khrag dang chu rgyus de bzhin du //
T02D1180:17b-41: rkang mar 'bab pas ltung bar bya //
T02D1180:17b-42: 'di rnams kyang ni phyugs zhes bya //
T02D1180:17b-43: phyi rol yul can gzhan phyugs min //
T02D1180:17b-44: skye ba bdun pa phyugs rnams ni //
T02D1180:17b-45: kun nas mchog gi dbang phyug go //
T02D1180:17b-46: lus la skye bdun ji lta bar //
T02D1180:17b-47: de ltar de ni bshad bya nyon //
T02D1180:17b-48: bza' dang btung ba'i ro rnams kun //
T02D1180:17b-49: zos dang 'thungs pa rnam drug po //
T02D1180:17b-50: smin pa las ni bcud 'gyur te //
T02D1180:18a-2: de nas khrag nyid du 'gyur te //
T02D1180:18a-3: gnyis par gsal bar 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1180:18a-4: gsum pa sha nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1180:18a-5: bzhi pa pags pa nyid du 'gro //
T02D1180:18a-6: lnga pa rtsa nyid 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1180:18a-7: drug pa rgyus pa nyid 'gyur ro //
T02D1180:18a-8: bdun par rkang nyid du 'gyur te //
T02D1180:18a-10: de nyid brten pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1180:18a-11: mdzod drug rigs su brjod par bya //
T02D1180:18a-12: rigs ni lus zhes bshad pa ste //
T02D1180:18a-13: rigs las byung ba khu bar brjod //
T02D1180:18a-14: de yis nus ma rdul du brjod //
T02D1180:18a-15: lus ni skyed par byed pa'i rgyu //
T02D1180:18a-16: rnam shes khyab byed shes pa ni //
T02D1180:18a-17: de dag gi ni dbus su gnas //
T02D1180:18a-18: zla ba nyi ma la brten nas //
T02D1180:18a-19: srid gsum bdag nyid he ru ka / steng 'og gnas pa'i dpa' bo ni //
T02D1180:18a-21: rtsa ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis //
T02D1180:18a-22: spyi bor 'khor lo brjod par bya //
T02D1180:18a-23: dpral bar bcu drug rnams kyis te //
T02D1180:18a-24: mgrin par sum cu gnyis rnams kyis //
T02D1180:18a-25: snying gar 'khor lo brgyad rnams kyis //
T02D1180:18a-26: drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams nyid kyis //
T02D1180:18a-27: lte ba'i 'khor lor yang dag bshad //
T02D1180:18a-28: gsang bar sum cu gnyis rnams kyis //
T02D1180:18a-29: rtsa rnams 'khor lo'i rtsibs bshad pa 'am //
T02D1180:18a-31: rnal 'byor ma rnams de brten pa //
T02D1180:18a-32: bya ba rnam pa du ma byed //
T02D1180:18a-33: yul dang dbang po'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1180:18a-34: rnam par shes pa rab bskul ba //
T02D1180:18a-35: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas sogs kun //
T02D1180:18a-36: de ni rtsa yi pad 'dab rnams //
T02D1180:18a-37: lha mo bzhi yi gtsug tor du'o //
T02D1180:18a-38: sgyu ma chen por brjod par bya //
T02D1180:18a-41: dpral bar thig le rdo rje ni //
T02D1180:18a-42: rtsa rnams brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur //
T02D1180:18a-43: mig gnyis de bzhin rna ba dag / sna dang lce dang 'phyang ba'o //
T02D1180:18a-44: goo r'i la sogs lha mo ni //
T02D1180:18a-45: gzugs sogs dang ni sa sogs rnams //
T02D1180:18a-46: zla ba'i cha dbyes bdag med ma //
T02D1180:18a-47: 'di nyid du ni rab tu brjod //
T02D1180:18a-48: zhal gsum phyag drug mgrin par te //
T02D1180:18a-49: de ni sum cu gnyis kho nas //
T02D1180:18a-50: snying la'ang lha mo brgyad rnams dang //
T02D1180:18a-51: phyag bzhi pa 'di yang dag bzhugs //
T02D1180:18a-52: sems kyi rdo rjer khyab 'jug che //
T02D1180:18a-53: mi bskyod pa yi rigs las byung //
T02D1180:18b-0: @18b 'jig rten gsum bskyod lte bar te //
T02D1180:18b-1: de ni drug cu bzhi nyid kyis //
T02D1180:18b-3: mkha' 'gro ma rnams khams lnga rnams //
T02D1180:18b-5: drug pa gsang bar bdag po che //
T02D1180:18b-6: mkha' 'gro sum cu gnyis rnams dang //
T02D1180:18b-7: lhan cig khams gsum dbang phyug go /
T02D1180:18b-8: 'khor lo drug la lha mo rnams //
T02D1180:18b-9: lnga bcu rtsa drug lhag pa'i brgya'o //
T02D1180:18b-10: dus kyi 'khor lo zhes par bshad //
T02D1180:18b-11: rigs drug rnams kyis gcig bsdus pa'o //
T02D1180:18b-12: dpral ba spyi bor rtsa rnams gang //
T02D1180:18b-13: nyi shu pad kan 'bab byed pa'o //
T02D1180:18b-14: mgrin ba snying ga'i bzhi bcu rnams //
T02D1180:18b-15: de bzhin mkhris pa 'bab byed pa'o //
T02D1180:18b-16: lte ba gsang bar bcu drug gang //
T02D1180:18b-17: brgyad cu rlung ne 'bab byed pa'o //
T02D1180:18b-18: 'dus pa'i rang bzhin la sogs pa'o //
T02D1180:18b-20: steng 'og rtsa gsum gang yin rnams //
T02D1180:18b-22: nye ba'i rtsa rnams du ma ste //
T02D1180:18b-23: de las lus ni gang nas gnas //
T02D1180:18b-24: de rnams stong phrag bdun cu gnyis //
T02D1180:18b-25: lus la de snyed lha mo rnams //
T02D1180:18b-26: ba spu'i grangs kyi 'byung po ste //
T02D1180:18b-27: bye ba phrag gsum phyed bcas rnams //
T02D1180:18b-28: skra yi grangs kyis grub pa gnas //
T02D1180:18b-29: ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin lus //
T02D1180:18b-30: dbugs drug rnams kyi chu srang ste /
T02D1180:18b-31: chu srang drug cus chu tshod do //
T02D1180:18b-32: chu tshod dag gis yud tsam cig / bzhi chas dman pa bzhi rnams kyis //
T02D1180:18b-33: thun tshod phyed pa de gcig 'gyur //
T02D1180:18b-34: lnga rnams kyis ni dus sbyor 'gyur //
T02D1180:18b-35: dus sbyor phyed gnyis thun tshod 'gyur //
T02D1180:18b-36: thun tshod gnyis ni thun mtshams gcig / de bzhi rnams kyis lus can gyi //
T02D1180:18b-37: nyin zhag tu ni rab tu brjod //
T02D1180:18b-38: de yang dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyis //
T02D1180:18b-39: dbugs rnams drug brgya lhag pa yi //
T02D1180:18b-40: stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis //
T02D1180:18b-41: nyi ma'i dbyu gu dang mnyam pas //
T02D1180:18b-42: zla phyed nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang //
T02D1180:18b-43: de bzhin zla ba bcu gnyis kyis //
T02D1180:18b-44: dus tshigs drug gis ji bzhin bshad //
T02D1180:18b-45: sbyor ba'i dus ni mnyam pa bzhis //
T02D1180:18b-46: dus gsum gyis te bgrod gnyis kyis //
T02D1180:18b-47: de ltar lus la nyin zhag 'gyur //
T02D1180:18b-48: dbugs rnams dgu brgyas zla ba phyed //
T02D1180:19a-2: sum cu drug gis dus tshigs bshad //
T02D1180:19a-3: lnga stong bzhi brgyas sbyor ba'i dus //
T02D1180:19a-4: bdun stong nyis brgyas gsum can dus //
T02D1180:19a-5: bgrod pa brgyad brgyas lhag pa yi //
T02D1180:19a-6: stong phrag bcus so de bzhin du //
T02D1180:19a-7: gnyis kyis lo gcig brjod par bya //
T02D1180:19a-8: 'pho ba la ni dbu ma'i dbugs //
T02D1180:19a-9: lnga bcu rtsa drug rkang par bcas //
T02D1180:19a-10: bdun cu rtsa lngas lhag pa yi //
T02D1180:19a-11: brgya phrag drug rnams bcu gnyis la'o //
T02D1180:19a-12: de rnams lo brgya'i dbugs rnams kyis //
T02D1180:19a-13: phyogs gsum dang ni lo gsum mo //
T02D1180:19a-14: aa wa dh'u t'i'i dus su 'gyur //
T02D1180:19a-15: srog chags rnams la 'chi ster byed //
T02D1180:19a-16: brkyang ma la ni nyin mtshan du //
T02D1180:19a-17: gal te rlung gis 'bab byed na //
T02D1180:19a-18: de las lo gsum na 'chi ste //
T02D1180:19a-20: gang tshe nyi mar nyin zhag lnga //
T02D1180:19a-21: lus can rnams kyi srog 'bab na //
T02D1180:19a-23: g-yas su nyi ma'i 'chi ltas kyis //
T02D1180:19a-24: gang tshe g-yon gyi rtsa la srog /'di ni nyin zhag gsum rgyu na //
T02D1180:19a-26: lo gsum nas ni bgrod par zad //
T02D1180:19a-27: gnyis par nyin zhag drug de ltar //
T02D1180:19a-28: zla ba gsum la nges par 'bab //
T02D1180:19a-29: de ltar zla ba gsum gsum gyis //
T02D1180:19a-30: nyin zhag gsum gyi rnam 'phel las //
T02D1180:19a-32: lo gsum rim pas 'dor bar byed //
T02D1180:19a-33: sum cu rtsa gsum ji srid pas //
T02D1180:19a-34: nyin zhag g-yon nas bar med 'bab //
T02D1180:19a-35: yon tan gsum gyi dbye ba yis //
T02D1180:19a-36: de nas nyi mar yang dag 'jug / nyin zhag gnyis te de nas ni //
T02D1180:19a-37: dbus su lte bar yang dag 'jug / srog ni zhag gcig de nas ni //
T02D1180:19a-39: gang tshe rlung ni nyin zhag bcur //
T02D1180:19a-40: g-yas pa'i rtsa la 'bab byed de //
T02D1180:19a-41: khyim gyi 'dab ma gnyis pa la'o //
T02D1180:19a-43: khyim gyi 'dab ma gsum pa la //
T02D1180:19a-44: tshes zhes bya bas lo gcig na'o //
T02D1180:19a-45: bzhi par nyin zhag nyi shu ru //
T02D1180:19a-47: 'dab ma lnga par nyi shu lnga //
T02D1180:19a-48: 'bab na tshe ni zla ba gsum //
T02D1180:19a-49: drug par nyin zhag nyi shu drug /'bab na tshe ni zla ba gnyis //
T02D1180:19b-0: bdun par nyin zhag @19b nyi shu bdun //
T02D1180:19b-1: 'bab na tshe ni zla ba gcig / nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum du //
T02D1180:19b-3: 'dab ma brgyad pa dgu pa dang //
T02D1180:19b-4: bcu pa bcu gcig pa rim pas //
T02D1180:19b-5: tshes phyogs lnga dang yon tan gyis //
T02D1180:19b-7: de nas g-yas kyi rtsa spangs nas //
T02D1180:19b-8: g-yon du rlung gis 'gro byed de //
T02D1180:19b-9: nyin zhag gnyis su 'od nas ni //
T02D1180:19b-10: dbu ma'i gnas su nyin gcig 'gro //
T02D1180:19b-11: de ltar dbugs rnams zad byas nas //
T02D1180:19b-14: ma yi rdul ni gyen du 'gro //
T02D1180:19b-15: rang las bag chags kyis bcings pa'i //
T02D1180:19b-16: rnam shes rlung dang ldan pa ni //
T02D1180:19b-18: de med par ni phyi ma min //
T02D1180:19b-19: mkhan po las ni rig pa dang //
T02D1180:19b-20: mar mes mar me 'gyur ji bzhin //
T02D1180:19b-21: rgya las rgya gzhan ji bzhin dang //
T02D1180:19b-22: gdong las me long la gdong dang //
T02D1180:19b-23: sgra las sgra brnyan 'byung ba dang //
T02D1180:19b-24: ji ltar me shel las me ni //
T02D1180:19b-25: nyi mar nyi ma med mi 'byung //
T02D1180:19b-26: skyur ba zos las lce 'dzag pa //
T02D1180:19b-27: skyur min skyur ba med mi 'byung //
T02D1180:19b-28: sa bon las ni myu gu bzhin //
T02D1180:19b-29: de med par ni de mi 'byung //
T02D1180:19b-30: 'bras bu rgyu yi rang bzhin las //
T02D1180:19b-31: bdag las ma yin gzhan las min //
T02D1180:19b-32: gnyis las ma yin rgyu med min //
T02D1180:19b-33: dngos po gang rnams 'ga' na yang //
T02D1180:19b-34: skye ba 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
T02D1180:19b-35: pha dang ma yi dkar dmar dang //
T02D1180:19b-36: srog dang thur sel gnyis de bzhin //
T02D1180:19b-37: sems kyi rdo rje yang dag ldan ;
T02D1180:19b-38: / lus kyi skyed par byed pa'i rgyu //
T02D1180:19b-40: srog dang thur sel rim ji bzhin //
T02D1180:19b-41: lus ngag yid dang chags pa rnams //
T02D1180:19b-42: sems kyi rdo rje can gyi sgo //
T02D1180:19b-43: khu ba las ni zla ba phyed //
T02D1180:19b-44: khrag las nyi ma yang dag 'byung //
T02D1180:19b-45: srog las sgra gcan grub pa'o //
T02D1180:19b-46: dus kyi me ni thur sel las //
T02D1180:19b-47: khu ba las ni rtsa rnams skye //
T02D1180:19b-48: rus pa khu ba las byung ba'o //
T02D1180:19b-49: rdul las khrag ni yang dag 'byung //
T02D1180:19b-50: khrag las sha ni kun du skye //
T02D1180:19b-51: sha las kyang ni pags pa skye //
T02D1180:19b-52: rus pa las ni rkang skye 'gyur //
T02D1180:19b-53: khu ba rdo rje rdul dril bu //
T02D1180:20a-0: @20a * // rtsa ni pad+ma nor bu che //
T02D1180:20a-1: khrag go de bzhin 'khor lo rus //
T02D1180:20a-2: sha ni de bzhin ral grir bshad //
T02D1180:20a-4: lus can rnams kyi pags pa rkang //
T02D1180:20a-5: brgyad po 'di rnams rang sems kyis //
T02D1180:20a-6: rim pa ji bzhin zhal rnams so //
T02D1180:20a-7: shar gyi zhal rnams rkang par 'gyur //
T02D1180:20a-8: zla ba nyi ma mun pa med //
T02D1180:20a-9: khrag las 'jim pa'i rang bzhin sa //
T02D1180:20a-10: sha yi khams su rab brjod bya //
T02D1180:20a-11: khu ba las ni sra ba sa //
T02D1180:20a-12: rdo ba rus pa'i rang bzhin de'o //
T02D1180:20a-13: zla ba las ni chu 'grub bo //
T02D1180:20a-14: me ni khrag las grub pa yin //
T02D1180:20a-15: sgra gcan las ni srog 'grub po //
T02D1180:20a-16: thur sel dus me las bshad do //
T02D1180:20a-17: lus can kun gyi lce dang ni //
T02D1180:20a-18: 'phyang ma khu bcas bskyed pa yin //
T02D1180:20a-19: g-yon dang g-yas pa'i mig nyid ni //
T02D1180:20a-20: rdul gyis bskyed par byas pa yin //
T02D1180:20a-21: srog gis nges par bskyed pa ni //
T02D1180:20a-22: de bzhin sna yi bu ga gnyis //
T02D1180:20a-23: stong pa kho nas las bskyed pa //
T02D1180:20a-24: rna ba'i bu ga gnyis de bzhin //
T02D1180:20a-25: thur sel nyid kyis bskyed pa ni //
T02D1180:20a-26: 'og gi rgyu gsum de bzhin no //
T02D1180:20a-27: sgra gcan gyis ni bskyed pa slar //
T02D1180:20a-28: nu ma'i bu ga gnyis de bzhin //
T02D1180:20a-29: thur du rgyu las sgo nga zung //
T02D1180:20a-30: de ltar lus kyi khams rnams 'gyur //
T02D1180:20a-31: khu ba nyid kyis khams rnams gsum //
T02D1180:20a-32: rdul gyis kyang 'dir rnam pa gsum //
T02D1180:20a-33: mdzod drug pa zhes bshad pa yin //
T02D1180:20a-34: lus dang lus kyi dbang po gnyis //
T02D1180:20a-35: chu yis bskyed pa g-yon pa ste //
T02D1180:20a-36: g-yas pa me yis bskyed pa'o //
T02D1180:20a-37: srog nyid kyis ni bdud rtsir 'gyur //
T02D1180:20a-38: de las gyen du rtsa gsum bshad //
T02D1180:20a-39: rlung gis bskyed pa g-yon pa ste //
T02D1180:20a-41: g-yas pa'i rtsa ni thur sel gyis //
T02D1180:20a-42: bskyed par 'dir ni the tshom med //
T02D1180:20a-43: dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1180:20a-44: yang dag rdzogs lnga sku gnas so //
T02D1180:20a-45: mgrin pa'i phyogs su gsung rdo rje //
T02D1180:20a-46: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang ba la'o //
T02D1180:20a-47: sgra gcan dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02D1180:20a-48: lus can kun gyi rnam shes so //
T02D1180:20a-49: sgra gcan mjug ma sa la ni //
T02D1180:20a-50: rin chen legs gnas the tshom med //
T02D1180:20a-51: don yod dus me'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D1180:20a-52: sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng na gnas //
T02D1180:20b-1: rin chen ral gri lnga pa ste //
T02D1180:20b-2: skyes bu'i rdo rje nor bu dang //
T02D1180:20b-3: sangs rgyas dbu la drug par bshad //
T02D1180:20b-4: de ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1180:20b-5: rigs drug 'di rnams stobs chen yin //
T02D1180:20b-6: sa yis dri ni bskyed bya ste //
T02D1180:20b-7: ro ni me yis smin las 'gyur //
T02D1180:20b-8: chu las myu gu la sogs 'gyur //
T02D1180:20b-10: srog gi rlung las sgra 'byung ste //
T02D1180:20b-11: thur sel las ni chos kyi khams //
T02D1180:20b-12: yid kyi dbang po de nyid la'o //
T02D1180:20b-13: lus can kun gyis shes par bya //
T02D1180:20b-14: gshin rje mthar byed rus pas bskyed //
T02D1180:20b-15: khrag las shes rab mthar byed bshad ;
T02D1180:20b-16: / pad+ma mthar byed rtsa rnams las //
T02D1180:20b-17: sha las bgegs mthar byed pa bshad //
T02D1180:20b-18: rkang las kyang ni mi g-yor brjod //
T02D1180:20b-19: takki rgyal po pags pa las //
T02D1180:20b-20: dbyug pa sngo 'gyur ba spu las //
T02D1180:20b-21: sen mo las kyang stobs po che //
T02D1180:20b-22: skra las gtsug tor 'khor lo can //
T02D1180:20b-23: 'og gi skra las gnod mdzes rgyal //
T02D1180:20b-24: lag pa rkang pa'i tshigs rnams gang //
T02D1180:20b-25: khyim rnams yin te sa sogs bzhi'o //
T02D1180:20b-26: yon tan gsum gyi dbye ba rnams //
T02D1180:20b-27: de rnams bcu gnyis su ni bshad //
T02D1180:20b-28: sor mo rnams kyi tshigs rnams ni //
T02D1180:20b-29: dus tshigs nyin zhag drug cu rnams //
T02D1180:20b-30: lus can rnams kyi steng 'og tu //
T02D1180:20b-31: gang gnas so rnams rgyu skar 'dir //
T02D1180:20b-32: dhru ba khu bas spyi bor son //
T02D1180:20b-33: ri byi 'og tu son ba'i rdul //
T02D1180:20b-34: ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin du //
T02D1180:20b-35: lus la mngal nas nges par skye //
T02D1180:20b-36: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis pa //
T02D1180:20b-37: bcu gnyis phyag gis he ru ka / yan lag bcu gnyis 'gog pas so //
T02D1180:20b-38: gnas skabs las ni zhal bzhi'o //
T02D1180:20b-39: phyag ni bcu drug zla ba'i cha //
T02D1180:20b-40: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig / bu ga brgyad po 'gog pa yis //
T02D1180:20b-41: dbang phyug dam pa zhal brgyad pa'o //
T02D1180:20b-42: zla ba nyi ma mun pa me //
T02D1180:20b-43: gang gi zhabs kyis 'gog mdzad pa //
T02D1180:20b-44: zla phyed rnams ni bkag mdzad nas //
T02D1180:20b-45: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i phyag rnams kyis //
T02D1180:20b-46: zhal bzhi rnams kyis snga ma bzhin //
T02D1180:20b-47: dus kyi 'khor lo yang dag byung //
T02D1180:20b-48: ka sogs gsal byed bkag pa las //
T02D1180:20b-49: sum cu rtsa bzhi'i phyag gis gzhan //
T02D1180:20b-50: dbyangs rnams bcu drug 'gog pa yis //
T02D1180:21a-0: @21a * // bcu drug zhabs rnams bshad pa'o //
T02D1180:21a-1: sgo dgu rnams ni 'gog pa yis //
T02D1180:21a-2: rdo rje 'jigs byed zhal dgu pa //
T02D1180:21a-3: de lta bu sogs rgyud rnams ni //
T02D1180:21a-4: lus ngag sems rnams 'gog pa las //
T02D1180:21a-5: de dag sa las byis rnams la //
T02D1180:21a-6: rgyal ba'i dbang pos bstan pa yin //
T02D1180:21a-8: rtsa ba'i rgyud las gzhan yang rgya cher gsungs te /
T02D1180:21a-9: byis pa rnams kyis rtogs pa'i don du cung zad bshad pa yin no //
T02D1180:21a-10: rigs kyi le'u 'di nyid kyi rtsa'i kun du spyod pa ni /
T02D1180:21a-11: 'khor lo bde mchog nyung ngu'i tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1180:21a-12: phyed dang bcu gsum gyis bsdus pa'i don gyi 'grel
T02D1180:21a-13: bar shes par bya'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D1180:21a-14: nges pa ste // rgyud ni rgyud gzhan gyis rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1180:21a-15: de ltar tshigs bcad sum cu rnams kyis rtsa ba'i
T02D1180:21a-16: rgyud kyi nges pa kye'i rdo rje'i rigs kyi le'ur
T02D1180:21a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o zhes pa kye'i rdo
T02D1180:21a-18: rje'i 'grel pa drug stong par gtum mo'i rnal 'byor
T02D1180:21a-19: sdud pa dang // bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rigs kyi le'ur yongs su bcad pa lnga pa'o //
T02D1180:21a-22: // / sna tshogs sgro rnams kyi ni don tsam bstan //
T02D1180:21a-23: longs spyod rdzogs skur spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1180:21a-24: theg pa 'di la gsang sngags 'di nyid ni ;
T02D1180:21a-25: / brda yis rigs sogs don 'dir bshad par bya //
T02D1180:21a-26: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sngags kyi brda //
T02D1180:21a-27: rgyud du rnam gnyis gsal mdzad de //
T02D1180:21a-28: de bzhin nyid kyi brda can gcig / tha snyad rab brjod gnyis pa'o //
T02D1180:21a-29: de bzhin nyid brda zhes bya ba //
T02D1180:21a-30: sems can kun gyi skad can tshig / chos kyi dung ste sgra chen ldan //
T02D1180:21a-31: chos kyi gand'i sgra bo che //
T02D1180:21a-32: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po //
T02D1180:21a-33: kun tu 'gro ba'i ngag tu brjod //
T02D1180:21a-34: gang la tha snyad rab brjod sngags //
T02D1180:21a-35: brda yis don ni gsal byed pa'o //
T02D1180:21a-36: don ni rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa ni //
T02D1180:21a-37: rang bzhin med pa mdzes pa yis //
T02D1180:21a-38: yan lag dbye ba med pa'i sngags //
T02D1180:21a-39: ma ning go 'phang la gnas bzlas //
T02D1180:21a-41: aa wa dh'u t'i'i gnas son bzlas //
T02D1180:21a-42: stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang //
T02D1180:21a-43: drug brgya nyin dang mtshan mo la'o //
T02D1180:21a-44: nyin zhag lnga yis 'bum phrag ste //
T02D1180:21b-0: stong phrag brgyad rnams @21b lhag pa'o //
T02D1180:21b-1: nag po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te //
T02D1180:21b-2: gang ba gsum byung bar du'o //
T02D1180:21b-3: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas //
T02D1180:21b-4: rdzogs pa gsum gyi bar du bzlas //
T02D1180:21b-5: skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su ni //
T02D1180:21b-6: zla ba nya la de 'grub po //
T02D1180:21b-7: rdo rje sems dpar phyag byas nas //
T02D1180:21b-8: chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor byed //
T02D1180:21b-9: bzlas pa stong phrag brgyad rnams dang //
T02D1180:21b-10: khri phrag bzhi dang de bzhin du //
T02D1180:21b-11: 'bum phrag drug gis zla ba gcig / srog gi bzlas pa 'grub par byed //
T02D1180:21b-12: phreng bas ma yin brjod pa min //
T02D1180:21b-13: sbyin sreg sngags kyis mchod pa dang //
T02D1180:21b-14: tshim par byed dang cho ga gzhan //
T02D1180:21b-15: gzhan dang gzhan rnams rnam par 'jig / bzlas pa 'di yis nus med gang //
T02D1180:21b-16: byis pa'i blo can sngags pa rnams //
T02D1180:21b-17: de rnams la ni bgrang phreng gi / tha snyad rab brjod gsal bya ste //
T02D1180:21b-18: phyi rol longs spyod 'dod rnams la //
T02D1180:21b-19: sngags pas bsod nams thob byed du'o //
T02D1180:21b-20: nyin mtshan du ni dbu mar srog / zhugs pas nad rnams 'phrog par byed //
T02D1180:21b-21: tshes kyi nyin zhag srog bcings na //
T02D1180:21b-22: 'dis ni mkha' spyod nyid ster byed //
T02D1180:21b-23: zla gcig srog bsang snying gar gnas //
T02D1180:21b-25: lte ba'i zla drug bsregs na ni //
T02D1180:21b-26: 'di yis thams cad mkhyen nyid ster //
T02D1180:21b-27: dpral ba mgrin pa'i 'khor lo dang //
T02D1180:21b-28: snying ga lte bar go rims bzhin //
T02D1180:21b-29: mi rnams kyis ni brgyal dang bcings //
T02D1180:21b-30: bsad dang ji bzhin bsregs pas 'di'o //
T02D1180:21b-31: srog dang thur sel 'gog pa yi //
T02D1180:21b-33: bsad dang bsregs pa gnyis dag gis //
T02D1180:21b-34: sngags pa sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur //
T02D1180:21b-35: srog dang thur sel zad pas 'dir //
T02D1180:21b-36: yan lag bcu gnyis zad par 'gyur //
T02D1180:21b-38: sangs rgyas nyid du su mi 'gyur //
T02D1180:21b-39: ji srid srog chags rnams kyi srog / rgyu ba de sred yang srid pa'o //
T02D1180:21b-40: srog gi rgyu ba rnams zhig na //
T02D1180:21b-41: 'chi ba med cing yang srid med //
T02D1180:21b-42: ces pa de ltar sngags kyi brda ma ning gi bzlas pa ste //
T02D1180:21b-43: de bzhin nyid kyi brda yis shes par bya'o //
T02D1180:21b-44: 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1180:22a-0: de nas 'di las sngags kyi le'u bshad @22a * //
T02D1180:22a-2: 'di lta ste 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor mi'i
T02D1180:22a-3: sngags zhes pa thams cad dang 'byung ba pa rnams
T02D1180:22a-4: ni 'byung po thams cad pa ste /
T02D1180:22a-5: de'i dang de rnams kyi sngags grangs ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D1180:22a-6: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rmm'a n'am /
T02D1180:22a-7: aa dya nu tpa nna tv'a ta /
T02D1180:22a-8: ces pa la 'dir aa yig gi sgra yis gzhom du med pa'i sgra ste /
T02D1180:22a-9: aa yig yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / don chen 'gyur med dam pa yin //
T02D1180:22a-10: srog chen po ni skye ba med //
T02D1180:22a-11: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
T02D1180:22a-12: zhes pa la sogs pas sgyu 'phrul dra bar rig pa'o //
T02D1180:22a-13: thams cad ni thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
T02D1180:22a-14: kun mkhyen kun rig dam pa ste //
T02D1180:22a-15: bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa'o //
T02D1180:22a-16: kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog /'jig rten dpe las 'das pa ste //
T02D1180:22a-17: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / ces pa
T02D1180:22a-18: la sogs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sngags sems can
T02D1180:22a-19: thams cad kyi skad kyi gsung ngag ces pa nges
T02D1180:22a-20: pa'i don to // sa la sogs pa'i 'byung ba
T02D1180:22a-21: rnams las skyes pa ni 'byung ba pa rnams te
T02D1180:22a-22: pa'i don to // / phung po lnga'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos can rnams so //
T02D1180:22a-23: de rnams kyi sngags ni phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi yig ge lnga rnams zhes pa ste /
T02D1180:22a-24: aom yig gis de rnams kyi gzugs kyi phung po sku rdo rje'o //
T02D1180:22a-25: a'a: yig gis ni 'du shes kyi phung po ste gsung rdo rje'o //
T02D1180:22a-26: h'um yig gis rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste thugs rdo rje'o //
T02D1180:22a-27: sv'a yig gis tshor ba'i phung po'o //
T02D1180:22a-28: h'a yig gis 'du byed kyi phung po'o //
T02D1180:22a-29: de rnams la gtor ma dbul ba ste /
T02D1180:22a-30: mthar h'um yig gsum dang phat yig gnyis kyis phyir btang ba'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:22a-31: de ltar aom yig gis sbyong ba'o //
T02D1180:22a-32: a'a: yig gis rgyas par byed pa'o //
T02D1180:22a-33: h'um yig gis sbar bar byed pa'o //
T02D1180:22a-34: sv'a yig gis bdud rtsir byed pa'o //
T02D1180:22a-35: h'a yig gis 'gugs par byed pa'o //
T02D1180:22a-36: h'um yig gsum gyis dbul ba'o //
T02D1180:22a-37: phat yig gnyis kyis phyir btang ba'o //
T02D1180:22a-38: lag pa g-yon pas sbyong ba ste /
T02D1180:22a-39: lag pa g-yas pas rgyas par byed pa'o //
T02D1180:22a-40: thal mos bkab pas sbar ba'o //
T02D1180:22a-41: nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgyas bdud rtsir byed pa'o //
T02D1180:22b-0: khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i @22b phyag rgyas dgug pa'o //
T02D1180:22b-1: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas dbul ba'o //
T02D1180:22b-2: lag pa'i phyag rgyas se gol sbyar nas gshegs su gsol ba'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:22b-3: phyag rgya bcing ba 'di rgyud gzhan du shes par bya'o //
T02D1180:22b-4: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sa
T02D1180:22b-5: bon ni grangs ji lta ba bzhin du 'di lta
T02D1180:22b-6: ste / bhr'um yig gis rnam par snang mdzad de spyi bor ro //
T02D1180:22b-7: a'am yig gis rin chen 'byung ldan te lta bar ro //
T02D1180:22b-8: dzr'im yig gis 'od dpag tu med pa ste mgrin par ro //
T02D1180:22b-9: kham yig gis don yod grub pa ste gsang bar ro //
T02D1180:22b-10: h'um yig gis mi bskyod pa ste snying gar ro //
T02D1180:22b-11: de ltar pi tsu badzra'i sku la dgod pa byas
T02D1180:22b-12: nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro gzhan rnams kyi yang ngo
T02D1180:22b-14: de nas phyag bcu drug pa'i sngags ni /
T02D1180:22b-15: aom de ba pi tsu badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa ste /
T02D1180:22b-16: 'dir nges pa'i don ni aom yig gis lha rnams
T02D1180:22b-17: kyi gdan yin pa ji lta ba de ltar sngags
T02D1180:22b-18: kyi yi ge dang pos lha 'grub pa'o //
T02D1180:22b-19: sa bon lhag ma rnams kyis yan lag dgod pa ste /
T02D1180:22b-20: mig la sogs pa la rim pa ji lta bas so //
T02D1180:22b-21: h'um yig gsum gyis ye shes sems dpa' 'gugs pa ste /
T02D1180:22b-22: phat yig gis gzhug cing sv'a yig gis dgyes par byed pa dang /
T02D1180:22b-23: h'a yig gis ro mnyam par byed pa'o zhes pa kye'i rdo rje'i snying po'o //
T02D1180:22b-24: de ltar sngags rnams thams cad aom yig dang po can dang /
T02D1180:22b-26: h'um phat spel ba'i dbus so zhes pa thams cad du nges pa'o //
T02D1180:22b-27: de ltar snga ma bzhin du /
T02D1180:22b-28: aom ki ti ki ti badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa phyag drug pa'i'o //
T02D1180:22b-29: de bzhin du phyag bzhi pa'i aom dzva la dzva la bhyo h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1180:22b-30: de bzhin du phyag gnyis pa'i aom tree lo ky'a kshe pa h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a //
T02D1180:22b-31: 'di sngags btu ba'i li'u la h'um yig dang phat yig ni man ngag las shes par bya'o //
T02D1180:22b-32: thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis
T02D1180:22b-33: brlabs pa'i sngags ni aom yig gis s+hu byin gyis
T02D1180:22b-34: brlab pa ste / rnam par snang mdzad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D1180:22b-35: a'a: yig gis gsung byin gyis brlab pa ste /
T02D1180:22b-36: nyi ma la 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1180:22b-37: h'um yig gis thugs byin gyis brlab pa ste snying
T02D1180:22b-38: gar sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor la mi bskyod pa'o
T02D1180:23a-1: du bdag med ma la sogs pa dbyangs rnams sngags btu ba'i don du brjod par bya ste /
T02D1180:23a-10: nges pa'i don gyis yang so sor bsdu ba'i klog pas gzung bar bya ste /
T02D1180:23a-11: aa ai ri au li ka / aa ae aar ao aal tsa /
T02D1180:23a-12: ha ya ra wa la ta sa /
T02D1180:23a-13: zhes pa'i sa bon rnams dkar po'i phyogs la zla ba'i cha rnams kyi'o //
T02D1180:23a-14: byis pa klog pa'i tshul gyis drang ba'i don gyis
T02D1180:23a-15: ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ma yin no
T02D1180:23a-16: zhes pa rtsa ba'i rgyud du nges pa'o //
T02D1180:23a-17: de bzhin du grong khyer bskyod pa'i sngags ni /
T02D1180:23a-18: aom aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha sv'a h'a /
T02D1180:23a-19: zhes pa drang ba'i don gyis so //
T02D1180:23a-20: nges pa'i don gyis ni aa ku ha rnam par bcad bya rnams mgrin gyur ro //
T02D1180:23a-21: ai tsu ya sha rnams rkan gyur ro //
T02D1180:23a-22: ri tu ra sha rnams spyi bo las gyur pa'o //
T02D1180:23a-23: au pu wa dang mchu can rnams mchu gyur ro //
T02D1180:23a-24: li tu la sa rnams so gyur ro //
T02D1180:23a-25: aom aa a'a ha h'a nga nya na ma na ng+ka sv'a h'a /
T02D1180:23a-26: zhes pa grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags so //
T02D1180:23a-27: sngags btu ba'i le'u bla ma'i ngag las shes par bya'o //
T02D1180:23a-28: rtsa ba'i rgyud du nges pa'i don gyis man ngag
T02D1180:23a-29: ni a'a li zla ba'i cha'i dbye bas yud tsam
T02D1180:23a-31: nyin zhag so so la nyi ma'i gsal byed drug cu rnams dbyu gu'i dbye bas bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1180:23a-32: aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha'i sgra yis
T02D1180:23a-33: a'a li dang k'a li'i nges pa'i don gyis brjod
T02D1180:23a-34: de / a'a li dang k'a li'i bzlas pa 'bum
T02D1180:23a-35: phrag bzlas pas 'jig rten de gsum bskyod par byed
T02D1180:23a-36: na grong khyer gcig tsam lta ci smos zhes pa'o
T02D1180:23a-37: de / // a'a li dang k'a li brjod par bya ste /
T02D1180:23a-39: aa a'a ai a'i ri r'i au a'u li l'i
T02D1180:23a-40: ae aee aar a'ar ao aoo aal a'al ha h'a
T02D1180:23a-41: ya y'a ra r'a wa w'a la l'a zhes pa
T02D1180:23a-42: spro ba'i rim pas a'a li'i bzlas pas dbugs 'jug
T02D1180:23a-43: pa'o // dbugs 'byung bas k'a li ste //
T02D1180:23a-44: ka k'a kha kh'a ga g'a gha gh'a nga ng'a /
T02D1180:23a-45: tsa ts'a tsha tsh'a dza dz'a dzha dzh'a nya ny'a /
T02D1180:23a-46: ta t'a tha th'a da d'a dha dh'a na n'a /
T02D1180:23a-47: pa p'a pha ph'a ba b'a bha bh'a ma m'a /
T02D1180:23a-48: ta t'a tha th'a da d'a dha dh'a na n'a //
T02D1180:23a-49: sa s'a wa w'a sha sh'a sha sh'a ka k'a zhes pa ste /

T02D1180:23b-1: lha gcig gi bsam gtan dang me tog dmar po la bzlas pas dang /

T02D1180:23b-14: dbugs 'byung ba'i dus su bgrang phreng bskyod par mi bya'o zhes pa ku ru ku lle'i sngags so //

T02D1180:23b-16: aom yig gis 'jam pa'i stan brjod do //

T02D1180:23b-23: shar gyi rtsibs la gshin rje mthar byed do //
T02D1180:23b-24: lho'i rtsibs la shes rab mthar byed do //
T02D1180:23b-25: nub gyi [*kyi] rtsibs la pad+ma mthar byed do //
T02D1180:23b-26: byang gi rtsibs la bgegs mthar byed do //
T02D1180:23b-28: bden bral gyi phyogs su 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o //
T02D1180:23b-29: rlung gi mtshams su dbyug pa sngon po'o //
T02D1180:23b-30: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su stobs po che'o //
T02D1180:23b-31: steng gi rtsibs la gtsug tor ro //
T02D1180:23b-33: de nas gnyis pa brjod pas re ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1180:23b-34: ksha yig gis sna tshogs rdo rje ste de yis
T02D1180:23b-35: gcig tu 'dres par gyur pas rdo rje rab gsum

T02D1180:23b-37: dang khang pa brtsegs pa dang rdo rje pad+ma'i gdan

T02D1180:23b-41: dag dang sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa gsungs
T02D1180:24a-1: pa sngags 'di'i nges pa'i don to //

T02D1180:24a-3: shu rtsa bzhi sgrub par byed pa rnams su 'gyur
T02D1180:24a-4: zhing sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bya'o //
T02D1180:24a-5: 'dir nyung ngu'i rgyud du lugs dang mthun pa dang
T02D1180:24a-6: lugs las bzlog pa las thams cad gdug pa'i slob
T02D1180:24a-7: dpon yongs su mi shes pa rnams la sbas te

T02D1180:24a-9: glegs bam bklags pas ni ma yin no //

T02D1180:24a-11: 'thad pa rgyud mang por yang dag par rtogs par
T02D1180:24a-12: byas pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi ngag de gzung bar
T02D1180:24a-13: bya'i / blun po'i dad pa nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
T02D1180:24a-14: de skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1180:24a-15: nga'i gsung ni dang por dge ba /
T02D1180:24a-17: tha mar dge ba kho na ste /
T02D1180:24a-18: dang por dge ba bar dang tha mar mi dge ba ni ma yin zhing dang po dang /
T02D1180:24a-19: bar du mi dge tha mar dge ba /
T02D1180:24a-20: ji ltar byis pa'i skye bo rnams kyis kun du brtags pa /
