T02D1180:24a-22: bar du dbang po gnyis kyi bde ba bsgom pa dang /
T02D1180:24a-23: tha mar rnam par mi rtog pa stong pa nyid
T02D1180:24a-24: bsgom pa bde ba chen po sgom pa'o zhes pa

T02D1180:24a-27: ko tra ba yi sa bon las //

T02D1180:24a-37: ji ltar ljon shing de bzhin 'bras //

T02D1180:24a-47: rgyas bshad bdag gis brjod par bya //
T02D1180:24a-48: sa yi sa bon gyis rengs byed //
T02D1180:24a-49: rmongs dang phur bus gdab de bzhin //
T02D1180:24b-0: rtag tu zhi @24b byed chu'i sa bon //

T02D1180:24b-6: stong pa'i sa bon dug gcod byed //
T02D1180:24b-8: gso dang bslang dang dga' ba ni //

T02D1180:24b-10: lkugs pa nyid dang 'on nyid dang //

T02D1180:24b-12: thugs gsung sku yi sa bon gyis //
T02D1180:24b-13: rim pa ji bzhin sngags pas byed //

T02D1180:24b-15: ye shes dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las //

T02D1180:24b-18: ma ning byed dang lkugs nyid dang //

T02D1180:24b-21: snga ma'i sa bon rnams kyis bsgrub //
T02D1180:24b-22: ri bo ri khrod sman ljongs dang //
T02D1180:24b-23: rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram rnams dang //
T02D1180:24b-24: gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod de //
T02D1180:24b-25: gnas 'di rnams su bya ba yin //
T02D1180:24b-26: sngags bzlas de bzhin bsam gtan dang //
T02D1180:24b-27: sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa ni //
T02D1180:24b-28: so so'i las dang rjes mthun pas //
T02D1180:24b-29: gzhan du dngos grub sbyin mi 'gyur //
T02D1180:24b-30: skyes pa bud med gnas gzhan du //
T02D1180:24b-31: sngags dang lha ni sgrub pa min //
T02D1180:24b-32: de la sngags kyis rab bskul nas //
T02D1180:24b-33: lha ni las rnams byed par 'gyur //
T02D1180:24b-34: de phyir mkhas pa rnams kyis ni //
T02D1180:24b-35: ming dang sku yi bzlas bsgom bya //
T02D1180:24b-36: rtsa ba'i sngags ni sku ru 'gyur //

T02D1180:24b-38: de bzhin nye ba'i snying po ni ;

T02D1180:24b-40: ye shes sa bon zhes bshad par //
T02D1180:24b-41: ye shes sngags su de brjod bya //
T02D1180:24b-42: sa bon nye ba'i snying po dang //
T02D1180:24b-43: snying po dang ni rtsa ba'i sngags //
T02D1180:24b-44: ye shes thugs dang gsung dang sku //
T02D1180:24b-45: rim bzhin bsgom bya bzlas bya ste //

T02D1180:24b-53: rlung me sa dang chu las skyes //

T02D1180:25a-7: sangs rgyas kun dang bla ma dang //

T02D1180:25a-9: don du mdun du mandala bya ;

T02D1180:25a-11: rlung gi dkyil 'khor chos kyis ni //

T02D1180:25a-13: me yi dkyil 'khor ngo bo yis //
T02D1180:25a-14: 'dzam bu gling ste zur gsum pa //
T02D1180:25a-15: gru bzhi nub kyi ba glang spyod //
T02D1180:25a-16: sa yi dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid can //
T02D1180:25a-17: chu yi dkyil 'khor chos can gyis //
T02D1180:25a-18: zla phyed byang gi sgra mi snyan //
T02D1180:25a-19: stong pa'i ngo bos zla ba yi //
T02D1180:25a-20: dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid tshangs sgo nga //

T02D1180:25a-27: sa la mandala gzhan pa ni //
T02D1180:25a-28: rdul tshon dkyil 'khor bzhin du bya //
T02D1180:25a-29: phung po khams drug gzugs la sogs //

T02D1180:25a-33: khams drug ces par bshad byas pa ;
T02D1180:25a-34: / lus can rnams kyi gzugs phung po //
T02D1180:25a-35: mgrin gyur rkan gyur spyi bor gyur //
T02D1180:25a-36: mchur gyur sor gyur sna ldan te //

T02D1180:25a-48: yul dang dbang bo rab 'jug byed //
T02D1180:25a-49: 'du byed rnam drug rab tu bshad //
T02D1180:25a-50: rtag tu srog dang thur sel dag / steng dang 'og gi lam gsum po //
T02D1180:25a-51: rtsa drug rnams su 'bab byed pa //

T02D1180:25a-53: dam pa sum cu rtsa drug gi / khams kyi bskor ba rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1180:25b-0: aa sogs ka @25b sogs kyis mchod bya //

T02D1180:25b-2: khams rnams bdun cu rtsa gnyis te //

T02D1180:25b-29: mu tig sum cu drug dbyangs su //
T02D1180:25b-30: brjod pas mi rnams rgyas pa'o //
T02D1180:25b-31: nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyu skar gyi //

T02D1180:25b-37: dbyangs dang gsal byed yongs bsres pa //

T02D1180:29a-53: sgrub pa rab tu byed pa'i me //

T02D1180:29b-1: gal te glegs bam las rnyed na //

T02D1180:29b-3: ji ltar bris pa bklags pa yis //
T02D1180:29b-4: drang ba'i don gyis rab gsal byas //
T02D1180:29b-5: sngags kyi dam pa'i dngos spangs rnams /
T02D1180:29b-6: glegs bam las bklags sngags rnams kyis //
T02D1180:29b-7: lha la sogs rnams sgrub pa po ;

T02D1180:29b-9: rang sems brtan pa'i brtson 'grus sam //
T02D1180:29b-10: sngags kyi bzlas pa sgrub pa po //

T02D1180:29b-14: gnas dang mchod pa'i chog rim gyis //
T02D1180:29b-15: bya ba nyams na mi 'grub ste //
T02D1180:29b-16: tshig 'di yang dag de bzhin no //
T02D1180:29b-17: ston pa byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D1180:29b-18: lha yis bstan pa'i ngo ru ni //
T02D1180:29b-19: de phyir thams cad 'bad pa yis //
T02D1180:29b-20: de nyid mkhas pas gzung bar bya //
T02D1180:29b-21: zhes pa la sogs pas rtsa ba'i rgyud du thabs gzhan gyis sngags bsgrub pa gsungs te /
T02D1180:29b-22: rengs pa la sogs pa'i las bsgrub ba'i don du'o //
T02D1180:29b-23: nyung ngu'i rgyud 'dir ni dgongs pa'i skad gzhan gyis don rtogs pa ste /
T02D1180:29b-24: de kho na brjod par bya'o //
T02D1180:29b-25: aom h'um sv'a h'a rengs par byed pa'o zhes pa
T02D1180:29b-26: h'um yig gis rdo rje'i sa gzhi bsgrub par bya
T02D1180:29b-27: zhing des rengs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1180:29b-28: aom aam sv'a h'a dbang du bya ba'o zhes pa
T02D1180:29b-29: aam yig gis me'i khams bsgrub par bya zhing des
T02D1180:29b-31: aom kham sv'a h'a skrod par byed pa'o zhes pa
T02D1180:29b-32: kham yig gis rlung gi khams bsgrub par bya zhing
T02D1180:29b-34: aom dzr'im sv'a h'a sdang bar byed pa'o zhes pa
T02D1180:29b-35: dzr'im yig gis me dang rlung 'dres pa'i khams dag
T02D1180:29b-36: bsgrub par bya zhing de dag gis sdang ba byed
T02D1180:29b-37: par bya'o // aom bhr'um sv'a h'a mngon spyod do
T02D1180:29b-38: zhes pa bhr'um yig gis me dang chu dag bsgrub
T02D1180:29b-39: par bya zhing de dag gis mngon spyod bya'o //
T02D1180:29b-40: aom h'um sv'a h'a 'gugs par byed pa'o zhes pa
T02D1180:29b-41: h'um yig gis rlung dang me dang nam mkha' khams
T02D1180:29b-42: rnams bsgrub par bya zhing de rnams kyis dgug par
T02D1180:29b-43: bya'o // aom ghu: sv'a h'a gsod par byed pa'o
T02D1180:29b-44: zhes pa ghu: yig gis rlung dang chu dag bsgrub
T02D1180:29b-45: par bya zhing de dag gis gsod par bya'o //
T02D1180:29b-47: dbang po rnams kyi mngon sum gang //
T02D1180:30a-0: @30a * // sems kyis brtags pa mngon sum ste //
T02D1180:30a-1: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ye shes de //
T02D1180:30a-2: sangs rgyas byed pa'i mngon sum min //
T02D1180:30a-3: rnal 'byor pa yi mngon sum gang //
T02D1180:30a-4: rang rig byed pa gang yin pa //
T02D1180:30a-5: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ye shes ni //
T02D1180:30a-6: sangs rgyas bya ba byed pa'i mchog /
T02D1180:30a-7: de nyid tha dad rnam pa lnga //
T02D1180:30a-8: thog ma bar dang tha mar ni //
T02D1180:30a-9: chos sdud pa la skyob pa yis //
T02D1180:30a-10: spyan lnga rnams ni gsungs pa yin //
T02D1180:30a-11: sha yi mig dang de nas lha'i //
T02D1180:30a-12: de nas sangs rgyas spyan du 'gyur //
T02D1180:30a-13: shes rab spyan dang de nas slar //
T02D1180:30a-14: ye shes spyan ni lnga pa'o //
T02D1180:30a-15: las dang po yi rnal 'byor pa'i ;
T02D1180:30a-16: / dang po sha yi spyan du 'gyur //
T02D1180:30a-17: de nas de yis lha yi spyan //
T02D1180:30a-18: lha yi ji lta de lta ba'o //
T02D1180:30a-19: de la sangs rgyas spyan du 'gyur //
T02D1180:30a-20: nyan thos ji lta de lta ba'o //
T02D1180:30a-21: de nas shes rab mig ji ltar //
T02D1180:30a-22: byang chub sems dpa' de lta ba'o //
T02D1180:30a-23: de nas ye shes rang bzhin spyan //
T02D1180:30a-24: bde gshegs rnams kyi ji lta ba'o //
T02D1180:30a-25: ye shes rnam pa bzhi yi spyan //
T02D1180:30a-26: gang la yod pa des na de'o //
T02D1180:30a-27: ye shes rnam shes dbye ba yis //
T02D1180:30a-28: dngos po gnyis su rab bstan te //
T02D1180:30a-29: skyob pa rnams la ye shes spyan //
T02D1180:30a-30: de nas ye shes spyan du brjod //
T02D1180:30a-31: sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //
T02D1180:30a-32: dang po'i sangs rgyas gnyis rtog med //
T02D1180:30a-33: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
T02D1180:30a-34: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1180:30a-35: de ltar 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob kyis rten cing
T02D1180:30a-36: 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul gyis 'di thob nas 'di
T02D1180:30a-37: 'byung ste / yung ba dang rdo thal gyi sbyor
T02D1180:30a-38: ba las dmar ba nyid bzhin du las thams cad
T02D1180:30a-39: bsgrub pa la rig par bya'o //
T02D1180:30a-40: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas so zhes pa'i
T02D1180:30a-41: nga rgyal gyis ni ma yin no zhes pa las
T02D1180:30a-42: sgrub pa'i nges pa'o zhes pa kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel
T02D1180:30a-43: pa drug stong par sngags kyi rigs kyi le'u las
T02D1180:30a-44: rab 'byam sgrub pa'i yongs su bcad pa ste drug
T02D1180:30a-47: / kye'i rdo rje'i h'um la 'dud nas //
T02D1180:30a-48: sna tshogs sgrub pa bshad par bya //
T02D1180:30a-49: sems can rnams la rjes brtse bas //
T02D1180:30a-50: sa la char pa dbab ched du'o //
T02D1180:30a-51: aa phu:'i yi ge gnyis kyis mtha' yas kyi gzugs
T02D1180:30a-52: brnyan byas la zhes pa 'dir mtha' yas kyi gzugs
T02D1180:30b-0: brnyan / dri zhim po'i tsandan las byung ba @30b byas te /
T02D1180:30b-1: lte ba yan chad skyes bu'i cha byad can 'og
T02D1180:30b-2: sbrul gyi mjug ma'i rnam pa can lag pa bzhi
T02D1180:30b-3: pa g-yon du bdud rtsi'i thod pa dang /
T02D1180:30b-5: g-yas par bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang rin po che'i lag pa can /
T02D1180:30b-6: mgo bo'i steng du gdengs ka bdun pa can khor yug gi rnam pa can bya ste /
T02D1180:30b-7: de dang 'dra bar de'i g-yon du klu'i rgyal po aam yig gis so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:30b-8: de bdud rtsi lngas bkru bar bya ste /
T02D1180:30b-13: ka ra rnams bdud rtsi lnga ste /
T02D1180:30b-15: de nas autpala sngon pos mchod par bya'o //
T02D1180:30b-16: klu 'dul ba'i khu bas lus la byug par bya ste /
T02D1180:30b-17: glang po che'i chang gis mgo bo byugs la /
T02D1180:30b-18: kham phor gnyis kha sbyor du byas nas /
T02D1180:30b-19: ba nag mo'i 'o mas dgang ste /
T02D1180:30b-20: sor mo bzhis dpral ba dang /
T02D1180:30b-21: sna dang ao sko'i mthar thug pa dang /
T02D1180:30b-22: phyed dang bcas pa'i sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad can gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1180:30b-23: gzhon nu ma nag pos bkal ba rims kyis btsos
T02D1180:30b-24: pa'i skud pas phyogs brgyad rnams su dkri bar bya'o
T02D1180:30b-25: // de nas rdzing bu'i 'gram du rlung gi phyogs su dkyil 'khor bya ste /
T02D1180:30b-26: rdzing bu'i dbus su klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas der gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1180:30b-27: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du ni mtha' yas mnan
T02D1180:30b-28: pa'i kye'i rdo rje rdul tshon gyis bri bar bya'o
T02D1180:30b-29: // 'dir dkyil 'khor du tshon gdab pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1180:30b-30: dur khrod kyi sol bas rdul tshon nag po'o //
T02D1180:30b-31: mi'i rus pa'i phye mas dkar po dang /
T02D1180:30b-33: dur khrod kyi so phag gis dmar po dang /
T02D1180:30b-34: rkun ma'i lo ma mi'i rus pa cung zad bsres pas ljang gu ste /
T02D1180:30b-35: rdul tshon lnga po 'di rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bzhengs
T02D1180:30b-36: nas dang por dur khrod kyi srad bus zhes pa
T02D1180:30b-37: ro'i rgyus pa rnams kyis byas pa'i srad bus thig
T02D1180:30b-38: btab nas sor gsum lhag pa'i khru gsum pa smin
T02D1180:30b-39: ma'i dbus nas lte ba'i mthar thug pa'i tshad rnams
T02D1180:30b-40: kyis te 'gro ba 'ong ba rnams kyi zhes pa'o
T02D1180:30b-41: // dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyis pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad
T02D1180:30b-42: pa byas nas cha gsum gyi lte ba cha gcig
T02D1180:30b-44: de'i steng du mtha' yas dang /
T02D1180:30b-45: mtha' yas kyi rgyal po ste /
T02D1180:31a-0: kye'i rdo rje'i g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i zhabs dag gi mthil la rgyal ba @31a * //
T02D1180:31a-1: dang rnam par rgyal ba bri'o //
T02D1180:31a-2: kye'i rdo rje zhal brgyad pa zhabs bzhi pa phyag
T02D1180:31a-3: bcu drug gis brgyan pa bdag med mas phrag pa
T02D1180:31a-4: la 'khril ba 'chad par 'gyur ba'i spyan nyi shu
T02D1180:31a-6: de nas pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams la klu'i dbang po brgyad rnams te gdengs ka lnga dang /
T02D1180:31a-7: lhag ma mtha' yas kyi gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar bri bar bya'o //
T02D1180:31a-8: 'dab ma g-yon pa la mtha' yas so //
T02D1180:31a-9: g-yas pa la nor rgyas kyi bu'o //
T02D1180:31a-13: rlung phyogs su pad+ma chen po'o //
T02D1180:31a-14: bden bral du dung skyong ngo //
T02D1180:31a-15: dbang ldan du rigs ldan no //
T02D1180:31a-16: sa bon 'di rnams kyi lte dbus su aa phu'o //
T02D1180:31a-17: g-yas dang g-yon pa la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la phu: phu: phu: phu: phu: phu: phu: phu:'o //
T02D1180:31a-18: phu: yig brgyad po 'di rnams kyis klu brgyad yongs su rdzogs pa bya ste /
T02D1180:31a-20: lho dang bden bral du dmar po'o //
T02D1180:31a-21: nub dang rlung phyogs su ser po'o //
T02D1180:31a-22: byang dang dbang ldan du dkar po ste /
T02D1180:31a-23: thugs dang gsung dang ye shes dang /
T02D1180:31a-24: sku'i zhal gyi dbye bas so //
T02D1180:31a-25: gnas rkyal du 'gyel ba'i mjug ma mnan par thams cad bri bar bya'o //
T02D1180:31a-26: de bzhin du shar gyi sa gzhi nag po'o //
T02D1180:31a-29: byang dkar po ste re kh'a lnga'i mthar thug pa'o //
T02D1180:31a-30: dkyil 'khor gyi brgyad cha'i sgo ste de bzhin du 'gram dang sgo khyud rnams so //
T02D1180:31a-31: sgo'i phyed kyi stegs bu dang dra ba'i sa gzhi'o //
T02D1180:31a-32: stegs bu'i phyed kyis re kh'a lnga dang rin po che'i snam bu dang /
T02D1180:31a-34: kra ma sh'i rsha rnams so //
T02D1180:31a-36: mtshams su sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D1180:31a-37: phyi rol du rdo rje'i phreng ba 'bar ba dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1180:31a-38: de ltar dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas de nas sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D1180:31a-39: zlum po'i thab tu zhi ba'i don du'o //
T02D1180:31a-40: de nas dkyil 'khor rab gnas byas la /
T02D1180:31a-41: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gtor ma byin te /
T02D1180:31a-45: dza kkha zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis so //
T02D1180:31a-46: phyi nas slob dpon gyis nang gi khro bo'i sems kyis sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1180:31a-47: nang gi zhes pa cung zad spro ba dang bcas pa'i sems kyis so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:31b-0: de nas dkyil 'khor du sgo srung @31b rnams gzhag
T02D1180:31b-1: la bum pa bcu dgod cing steng du 'o mas
T02D1180:31b-2: gang ba'i kham phor rnams bzhag nas phyi rol du
T02D1180:31b-3: / phyogs bcu rnams su ba dan sngon bo rnams
T02D1180:31b-4: byin te dben pa'i gnas su sngags 'di bzla bar
T02D1180:31b-5: / bya'o // aom gha ta gha ta /
T02D1180:31b-7: ma sha ma sha / gha ta gha ta /
T02D1180:31b-8: gho ta ya gho ta ya aa na nta ksho
T02D1180:31b-9: bha ka r'a ya n'a g'a dhi pa ta ye
T02D1180:31b-10: he he ru ru kam sa bta p'a t'a la
T02D1180:31b-11: ga t'a na n'a ga na a'a k'a rsha ya
T02D1180:31b-12: ba rsha ya ga rdza ya ta rdza ya /
T02D1180:31b-13: phu: phu: phu: phu: phu: phu: phu: phu: h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1180:31b-15: gal te char mi 'bab na bzlog nas sngags 'di bzlas te /
T02D1180:31b-16: h'a sv'a ta phat phat pha h'um h'um h'um phu: phu: phu: phu: phu: phu: phu: phu:/
T02D1180:31b-17: ya rdza ta ya rdza ga ya rsha ba ya
T02D1180:31b-18: rsha ka a'a na g'a n'a t'am ga la t'a
T02D1180:31b-19: p'a pta sa kam ru ru he he ye ta
T02D1180:31b-20: pa dhi g'a n'a ya r'a ka bha ksho nta
T02D1180:31b-21: na aa ya ta gho ya ta gho ta gha
T02D1180:31b-22: ta gha sa ma sa ma /
T02D1180:31b-23: tu ghu tu ghu ta gha ta gha aom zhes
T02D1180:31b-24: pa de ltar bzlas par gyur pa na gal te
T02D1180:31b-25: klu rnams char mi 'bebs na de'i tshe mgo bo
T02D1180:31b-26: aa rdza ka'i dog pa ltar 'gas so //
T02D1180:31b-27: aa rdza ka zhes pa dbyug pa dkar po can ma lli ka nag po 'dra ba ste /
T02D1180:31b-28: de'i dog pa ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od kyi 'gas pa de bzhin du zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1180:31b-29: char pa 'bebs su 'jug pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1180:31b-30: sngags 'di'i sngon du bzlas pa 'bum phrag gcig ste /
T02D1180:31b-31: bye ba bzlas pas sngags 'grub cing /
T02D1180:31b-32: gang gi tshe sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bcu byas na
T02D1180:31b-33: de'i tshe sgrub pa pos gtor ma byin pa tsam
T02D1180:31b-35: de la dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga med do //
T02D1180:31b-36: dkyil 'khor gyi chog la sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig dang /
T02D1180:31b-37: sbyin sreg khri phrag gcig byas te de'i tshe klu
T02D1180:31b-38: rnams char 'bebs kyi rnam pa gzhan du ni ma
T02D1180:31b-39: yin no zhes rtsa ba'i rgyud du nges pa'o //
T02D1180:31b-40: da ni sprin dral ba brjod par bya ste /
T02D1180:31b-41: 'dir gang gi tshe char ches par gyur na de'i
T02D1180:31b-42: tshe mtha' yas de dur khrod kyi thal bas kham
T02D1180:31b-43: phor bkang bar gzhag par bya ste /
T02D1180:31b-44: sngags pas dur khrod kyi ras la nye bar 'dug nas sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1180:31b-45: aom a'a r+y'a sha ma sh'a na pri y'a ya
T02D1180:31b-46: h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat ces pas dral bar
T02D1180:31b-47: bya'o // 'di la yang snga ma bzhin du bsnyen
T02D1180:31b-48: pa dang sbyin sreg bzlas pa'o zhes pa sprin dral
T02D1180:31b-49: bya'o // ba'i cho ga'o // da ni rdo rje gri gug gi sgrub thabs brjod par bya ste /
T02D1180:32a-1: gdul ba'i don du rdo rje gri gug gi sngags
T02D1180:32a-2: bye ba bzlas pas bsgrub par bya zhing sbyin sreg
T02D1180:32a-4: de nas thod lo kor gyi sgrub pa bya ste /
T02D1180:32a-5: thod lo kor bdud rtsi lnga dang lhan cig btags
T02D1180:32a-6: la ku th'a ra tshi nna dang bcas pa'i ril
T02D1180:32a-7: bu mig 'bras kyi tshad tsam bya'o //
T02D1180:32a-8: de nas he ru ka'i khang par song ste /
T02D1180:32a-9: he ru ka'i zhal du bcu gnas sngags 'di ji
T02D1180:32a-10: srid du sku gzugs kyi zhal gyis ril bu de

T02D1180:32a-12: bya'o // aom badzra karta ri he badzr'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat /
T02D1180:32a-13: dngos grub kyi don du 'bum bzlas pa bya ste stan gcig pa'o //
T02D1180:32a-15: de bsgrubs nas ril bu'i mgrin pa la de'i ri mo bya'o //
T02D1180:32a-16: ri mo rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa'i mgrin pa
T02D1180:32a-17: la mthong na gal te ril bu'i mgrin pa de
T02D1180:32a-18: bcad pa de'i tshe dgra rnams mgo bo med par
T02D1180:32a-19: 'gyur ro // rdo rje gri gug rdzogs so //
T02D1180:32a-20: da ni rdo rje dgra sta'i sgrub thabs brjod par bya ste /
T02D1180:32a-21: 'dir mu stegs pa'i lha rnams 'gas par 'dod pas rdo rje dgra sta'i thig le bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1180:32a-22: 'dir yang sngags bsgrub pa snga ma bzhin du bya ste /
T02D1180:32a-23: de nas rgyu skar rgyal gyis nya ba la /
T02D1180:32a-24: tshangs pa'i shing gi sa bon blangs te /
T02D1180:32a-25: tshangs pa'i shing ni pa la shar brjod par bya'o //
T02D1180:32a-26: de'i sa bon ku th'a ra tshi nna dang bsres
T02D1180:32a-27: la cha mnyam pa mi bskyod pas btags par bya'o
T02D1180:32a-28: // btags nas dgra star bya zhing bskam par bya'o //
T02D1180:32a-29: nyi ma gzas bzung ba na rkang pas mnan te sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1180:32a-30: aom badzra ku th'a ra p'a ta ya p'a ta ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1180:32a-31: 'di bye ba bzlas nas snga ma bzhin du nyi
T02D1180:32a-32: ma bzung ba na nyin mtshan du bsgrubs nas de
T02D1180:32a-33: bdar bas dgra sta'i rnam pa'i thig le bya'o //
T02D1180:32a-34: byas pa des lha gang la sgrub pa pos phyag
T02D1180:32a-35: 'tshal ba des 'gas par byed pa'o zhes pa lha
T02D1180:32a-37: da ni tsha ba'i rims kyi sgrub thabs brjod par bya ste /
T02D1180:32a-38: snga ma bzhin du sngags bsgrubs la /
T02D1180:32a-39: de nas tsha ba'i rims byed par 'dod pas /
T02D1180:32a-42: tsi tra ka'i khu bas aa rka'i 'dab ma la
T02D1180:32a-43: dgra bo'i ming bris shing de nas sa gzhi la
T02D1180:32a-44: sor brgyad du brko bar bya'o //
T02D1180:32a-45: steng du phub ma'i me gzhag ste khri bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1180:32b-0: aom he badzra dzva ra dzva ra sha tr'um bhr'um h'um h'um h'um @32b phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1180:32b-1: de nas bsgrub bya rims kyis 'debs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1180:32b-2: 'dab ma phyung nas pa'i'o mas bkrus na grol ba'o zhes pa tsha ba'i rims kyi cho ga'o //
T02D1180:32b-3: da ni chang sgyug pa'i cho ga brjod par bya ste /
T02D1180:32b-4: snga ma bzhin du chang skyug pa'i sngags bsgrubs nas /
T02D1180:32b-5: de nas chang skyug par 'dod pas bsgrub bya'i lte
T02D1180:32b-6: bar yam yig yongs su gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil
T02D1180:32b-7: 'khor bsgom zhing / de'i steng du mam yig yongs
T02D1180:32b-8: su gyur pa'i chang gi lto ba can skra grol
T02D1180:32b-9: ba chang skyug pa bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1180:32b-11: aom he badzra ma r+ya mung+gi r'a ya mam h'um
T02D1180:32b-12: h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa'i sngags brgyad lhag
T02D1180:32b-14: chang skyug pa'i sgrub thabs so //
T02D1180:32b-15: da ni dbang du bya ba brjod par bya ste /
T02D1180:32b-16: snga ma lta bu'i ku ru ku lle'i sngags sngar
T02D1180:32b-17: bshad pa'i bye ba la sogs pa bzlas pa'i cho
T02D1180:32b-18: gas bsgrubs la / de nas rab tu myos ma
T02D1180:32b-19: dbang du bya bar 'dod pas mya ngan med pa'i
T02D1180:32b-20: brgyad pa la mya ngan med pa'i 'og tu song
T02D1180:32b-21: ste gos dmar po gyon nas myos byed kyi 'bras
T02D1180:32b-22: gas bsgrubs la / bu za zhing / k'a ma
T02D1180:32b-23: tsi k'a'i khu bas thig le byas la sngags bzlas
T02D1180:32b-24: gas bsgrubs la / bu za zhing / par bya'o
T02D1180:32b-25: // aom ku ru ku lle hr'i: aa mu k'am
T02D1180:32b-26: me ba sh'i bha wa tu sv'a h'a /
T02D1180:32b-27: khri bzlas pas 'ong ngo zhes pa dbang du byed pa'o //
T02D1180:32b-28: da ni zla ba dang nyi ma 'dzin pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1180:32b-29: sngon du bye ba phrag bdun bzlas te sngags pas sngags bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1180:32b-30: de nas zla ba dang nyi ma 'dzin par 'dod
T02D1180:32b-31: pas s'a lu btags pa las byung ba'i zla ba'am
T02D1180:32b-32: nyi ma byas nas rlangs pas btsos te /
T02D1180:32b-33: kham phor sor bzhi par rdo rje'i chu la gzhug cing sngags bzlas so //
T02D1180:32b-34: aom badzr'a rka na m'a tsa la m'a tsa la
T02D1180:32b-35: tishtha tishtha he badzr'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a
T02D1180:32b-36: h'a / nyi ma rnam par 'dzin pa la'o //
T02D1180:32b-37: zla ba rnam par 'dzin pa la ni /
T02D1180:32b-38: aom badzra tsandra zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1180:32b-39: khri bzlas na zla ba'am nyi ma gnas so //
T02D1180:32b-40: gci ba las bton na grol ba'o //
T02D1180:32b-41: de ltar zla ba dang nyi ma rnam par 'dzin pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1180:32b-42: da ni rdo rje skar rtsis la pra dbab pa la 'jug pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1180:32b-43: snga ma bzhin du sngags 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa
T02D1180:32b-44: dang pad+ma dmar po rnams kyi sbyin sreg 'bum gyis
T02D1180:32b-46: de la sngags ni aom na gr'a na gr'a ku
T02D1180:32b-47: m'a ri ke di bya lo tsa ni sv'a h'a
T02D1180:32b-48: zhes pa'i sngags 'dis dus ma yin pa'i dus su
T02D1180:33a-0: @33a * // gzhon nu ma'i mig dag la brgyad lhag pa'i brgya mngon par bsngags te /
T02D1180:33a-1: me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa nye bar
T02D1180:33a-2: spyod pa lnga yis mchod nas snyan gsan dbab pa'o
T02D1180:33a-3: // bcu bzhi pa'am brgyad pa la snga dro'i dus su bum pa bzhag nas de'i steng du /
T02D1180:33a-4: 'o ma can gyi shing gi yal ga bkod cing 'bru mar zangs ma'i snod du gzhag ste /
T02D1180:33a-5: rgya skyegs kyi khu ba snod gzhan du'o //
T02D1180:33a-6: sngags snga mas brgyad lhag pa'i brgya mngon par bsngags te /
T02D1180:33a-7: lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe bong rgya skyegs kyis bskus la til gyi til mar gyis bsku'o //
T02D1180:33a-8: de nas gzhon nu ma la bstan la sngags pas
T02D1180:33a-9: sngags zlos shing gzhan la 'dri bar byas te nga'i
T02D1180:33a-10: rdzas sus khyer smros shig / dgongs pa gzhan yang
T02D1180:33a-12: der des mthe bong mthong ste che ge mos rdzas khyer ro //
T02D1180:33a-13: dgos pa che ge mor 'gyur ro zhes smra bar byed do //
T02D1180:33a-14: rdo rje skar rtsis kyi ched du pra dbab pa la 'jug pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1180:33a-15: da ni phyugs zlog pa'i ched du phyugs kyi snying po'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02D1180:33a-16: dang por aom yig byin te dbus su sngags kyi
T02D1180:33a-17: tshig rnams dang tha mar he badzr'a ya sv'a h'a
T02D1180:33a-18: zhes pa 'bum phrag bcus bsgrubs la /
T02D1180:33a-19: de nas phyugs rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1180:33a-20: be tu y'a be tu y'a zhes brjod na lag ldan 'bros par 'gyur ro //
T02D1180:33a-21: ma mm'a ma mm'a zhes brjod na stag 'bros par 'gyur ro //
T02D1180:33a-22: te lli y'a te lli y'a zhes brjod na bse 'bros par 'gyur ro //
T02D1180:33a-23: ai li mi li phu: phu: zhes brjod na sprul 'bros par 'gyur ro //
T02D1180:33a-24: nor skyong 'dul ba'i phyag rgyas khyi 'bros par 'gyur ro //
T02D1180:33a-25: aom shv'a ti shtha ti shtha he badzr'a ya sv'a h'a zhes pa dud 'gro zlog pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1180:33a-26: de ltar dom la sogs pa rnams la gang gi ming gang yin ba de dbus su bcug ste /
T02D1180:33a-27: aom yig dang po dang tha mar he badzr'a ya
T02D1180:33a-28: sv'a h'a zhes pa de ltar sngags bzlas pa dang
T02D1180:33a-29: / sbyin sreg gi cho ga sgrub pa ni grub
T02D1180:33a-30: pa rnams su 'gyur gyi glegs bam bklags pa tsam
T02D1180:33a-31: gyis ni ma yin no zhes pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D1180:33a-32: du bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1180:33a-33: da ni rengs pa la sogs pa'i las rnams kyi lha'i rnal 'byor brjod par bya ste /
T02D1180:33a-34: rdo rje ma dang zhes pa la sogs pas so //
T02D1180:33a-35: 'dir rdo rje ma ni gzugs kyi phung po ste des rengs pa'o //
T02D1180:33b-0: goo r'i ni tshor ba'i phung po ste @33b des dbang du bya ba'o //
T02D1180:33b-1: chu yi rnal 'byor ma ni 'du shes kyi phung po ste des zhi bar byed pa'o //
T02D1180:33b-2: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni 'du byed kyi phung po ste des skrod pa'o //
T02D1180:33b-3: bdag med ma ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste nges sdang par byed pa'o //
T02D1180:33b-4: sa spyod ma ni reg bya rdo rje ma ste nges 'gugs pa'o //
T02D1180:33b-5: mkha' spyod ma ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma ste nges gsod par byed pa'o //
T02D1180:33b-6: de bzhin du pu kka s'i ser mos rengs pa'o //
T02D1180:33b-7: ri khrod ma zla ba nor bu'i 'od can gyis zhi ba'o //
T02D1180:33b-8: gtum mos dbang du bya ba'o //
T02D1180:33b-10: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas sdang bar byed pa'o //
T02D1180:33b-11: ye shes kyi khams kyis gsod pa grub pa'o //
T02D1180:33b-12: de ltar phyi dang nang du thams cad rnal 'byor pas shes par bya'o //
T02D1180:33b-13: ser po dang dkar po dang dmar po dang nag
T02D1180:33b-14: po dang ljang gu dang sngon po'i kha dog rnams
T02D1180:33b-15: kyis rengs pa la sogs pa rnams te lha'i rnal
T02D1180:33b-16: 'byor gyis sngags bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg dang gtor
T02D1180:33b-17: ma'i tshogs bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D1180:33b-18: du bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o zhes pa kye'i
T02D1180:33b-19: rdo rje'i 'grel pa stong phrag drug par las rab
T02D1180:33b-20: 'byam sgrub par byed pa'i mdor bsdus chen mo ste
T02D1180:33b-21: yongs su bcad pa bdun pa'o //
T02D1180:33b-22: sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so /
T02D1180:33b-24: // / drag po chags bcas mchog tu zhi ba'i gzugs //
T02D1180:33b-25: gang 'drar rgyal dbang gang gis bsgoms gyur pa //
T02D1180:33b-26: de 'drar de yis rang gi sems mthong ste //
T02D1180:33b-27: gzugs de thams cad smon pa'i sems yin no //
T02D1180:33b-28: 'jug pa'i sems kyang sems gcig de yin te //
T02D1180:33b-29: thugs min thugs ni rnam thar gsum dag pa //
T02D1180:33b-30: dus gsum son pa kun nas rig pa po //
T02D1180:33b-31: rdo rje sems dpa' de la mgos btud nas //
T02D1180:33b-32: rtsa ba'i rgyud las rtogs pa yi //
T02D1180:33b-34: sems can rnams kyis lam thob ched //
T02D1180:33b-35: rdo rje snying pos bri bar bya //
T02D1180:33b-36: bskyed pa'i rim pa gcig yin te /
T02D1180:33b-37: sems can chos la dmigs pa'o //
T02D1180:33b-38: gnyis pa dmigs pa med pa ni //
T02D1180:33b-39: rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgrub byed pa'o //
T02D1180:33b-40: 'dir nyung du'i rgyud du bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1180:33b-41: de nas 'di las lha'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
T02D1180:33b-42: dang po byams pa bsgom par bya //
T02D1180:34a-0: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig rnams kyis dang po'i tshig rnams rtsa pa'i rgyud la 'jug @34a * //
T02D1180:34a-3: mtha'i tshig rnams kyang ngo zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:34a-4: der bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1180:34a-5: gang gis sngags dang phyag rgya yi //
T02D1180:34a-7: lha yi sgrub thabs cho ga ni //
T02D1180:34a-8: rdo rje snying pos bshad par bya //
T02D1180:34a-9: tho rangs dus su sngags pa yis //
T02D1180:34a-10: bshang gci dag ni dor ba dang //
T02D1180:34a-11: gtsang sbra la sogs byas rjes su //
T02D1180:34a-13: rdzas bcu'i rang bzhin ril bu ni //
T02D1180:34a-14: byas nas rang gi kha ru gzhug / bdud rtsi lnga bcas pa byung gis //
T02D1180:34a-15: mdun du mandala byas nas ni //
T02D1180:34a-16: dri dang me tog la sogs pa //
T02D1180:34a-17: goo r'i sogs la rim bzhin dbul //
T02D1180:34a-18: dbang dkar gshin rjer chom rkun ma //
T02D1180:34a-19: chu bdag phyogs su ro langs ma //
T02D1180:34a-20: nor sbyin lha mo mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1180:34a-21: 'og tu sa spyod ma gnas so //
T02D1180:34a-22: steng du mkha' spyod ma ru bshad //
T02D1180:34a-23: de la rim bzhin mchod par bya //
T02D1180:34a-24: dbang ldan lha mo pu kka s'i ;
T02D1180:34a-25: / mer ni de bzhin ri khrod ma //
T02D1180:34a-26: srin po'i mtshams su gtum mo ste //
T02D1180:34a-27: rlung du g-yung mo rim pa las //
T02D1180:34a-28: 'khor lo'i dbus su kye'i rdo rje //
T02D1180:34a-29: bdag med ma dang lhan cig mchod //
T02D1180:34a-30: de slar sems can thams cad la //
T02D1180:34a-31: byams dang snying rje sogs dran bya //
T02D1180:34a-32: de rnams mchod nas de nas ni //
T02D1180:34a-33: de yi sa bon rang lus dgod //
T02D1180:34a-34: ming thog yi ge'i sa bon ni //
T02D1180:34a-35: aa yig bcas shing thig ler bcas //
T02D1180:34a-36: goo r'i gzugs kyi khams la son //
T02D1180:34a-37: sgra yi khams la chom rkun ma //
T02D1180:34a-38: dri yi khams la ro langs ma //
T02D1180:34a-39: ro yi khams la gha sma r'i //
T02D1180:34a-40: reg bya'i khams las spyod ma //
T02D1180:34a-41: chos kyi khams la mkha' spyod ma //
T02D1180:34a-42: mig la lha mo pu kka s'i //
T02D1180:34a-43: rna ba dag la ri khrod 'dod //
T02D1180:34a-44: sna la lha mo gtum mo'o //
T02D1180:34a-45: lce la g-yung mor 'dod pa yin //
T02D1180:34a-46: lus kyi dbang po kye'i rdo rje //
T02D1180:34a-47: bdag med ma ni yid la gnas //
T02D1180:34a-48: zhes pa rtsa ba'i rgyud du dang po yan lag dgod pa'o //
T02D1180:34a-49: gam tsam bam gham bham kham bam sham tsam dam
T02D1180:34a-50: ham nam zhes pa'i sa bon rnams bshad pa'i khams
T02D1180:34a-52: de nas gnas bsrung ba bsam par bya'o zhes pa 'di lta ste /
T02D1180:34a-53: re phas nyi ma bdun du rnam bsgoms nas //
T02D1180:34a-54: nyi der h'um byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste //
T02D1180:34a-55: rdo rje de nyid kyi ni ra ba dang //
T02D1180:34a-56: gur bcing ba yang rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02D1180:34b-1: 'di nyid la rtsa ba'i rgyud du /
T02D1180:34b-2: dang po re zhig srung ba'i 'khor lo gdug pa can zlog par byed pa dang /
T02D1180:34b-3: bgegs dang log par 'dren pa rnams phur bus 'debs
T02D1180:34b-4: pa sngags pas khro bo'i rgyal po'i sku yis bya
T02D1180:34b-5: ste / phyi nas 'dod pa'i lha bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1180:34b-6: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kye'i rdo rje'i
T02D1180:34b-7: rgyud 'di ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de phyi nas
T02D1180:34b-8: bdag med ma'i sgrub thabs kyi ngo bor rnal 'byor
T02D1180:34b-9: ma'i kun du spyod pas rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bshad
T02D1180:34b-10: par bya'o // de'i phyir rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi
T02D1180:34b-11: tshogs gshin rje gshed la sogs pa khro bo'i rgyal
T02D1180:34b-12: po'i dbang po rnams srung ba'i 'khor lo la bsgom
T02D1180:34b-13: par bya'o // par bya'o // 'khor lo'i gtso bo ni rdo rje h'um mdzad de /
T02D1180:34b-14: de yang kye'i rdo rje phyag drug pa'o //
T02D1180:34b-15: des na dang por de bas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1180:34b-16: mdun du bsams nas de'i dbus su h'um yig yongs
T02D1180:34b-17: su gyur pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje gdong bzhi pa'o
T02D1180:34b-18: // sna tshogs rdo rje de nyid dang //
T02D1180:34b-19: nyi ma gcig tu 'dres par gyur pas phyogs thams
T02D1180:34b-20: cad dang steng dang 'og tu rdo rje ra ba
T02D1180:34b-22: rdo rje gzhi bdud rnams thams cad kyis mi phyed pa dang /
T02D1180:34b-23: ra ba'i phyi rol dang 'og dang steng du mtshon
T02D1180:34b-24: cha sna tshogs 'jigs su rung ba rnams sngags pas
T02D1180:34b-26: de las gzhan ni rtsa ba'i rgyud la 'jug par bya ste /
T02D1180:34b-27: der bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1180:34b-28: khro bo'i rgyal po rnams kyi gdan //
T02D1180:34b-29: rim pa bzhin du rab bshad bya //
T02D1180:34b-30: zhal dang sku mdog phyag dang mtshon //
T02D1180:34b-31: g-yon brkyang stabs kyis zhabs rnams kyang //
T02D1180:34b-32: rdo rje gur gyi dbus su ni //
T02D1180:34b-33: bhr'um yig yongs su gyur pa yis //
T02D1180:34b-34: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad de las byung //
T02D1180:34b-35: gur gyi 'og dang steng du ni //
T02D1180:34b-36: rtsibs ni gnyis po yang bya'o //
T02D1180:34b-37: re ba bcu gcig po rnams kyis //
T02D1180:34b-38: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rim ji bzhin //
T02D1180:34b-39: nyi ma'i rkang pa bcu gcig rnams //
T02D1180:34b-40: nyi ma de rnams kho na'o //
T02D1180:34b-41: der ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnams /
T02D1180:34b-42: so so la ni h'um yig dgod /
T02D1180:34b-43: h'um yig las byung nyi mar gnas //
T02D1180:34b-44: khro bo'i rgyal po rnams bsgom bya //
T02D1180:34b-45: dbus kyi nyi ma'i gdan la ni //
T02D1180:34b-46: rdo rje h'um mdzad 'dren pa bsam //
T02D1180:34b-47: sngon po zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02D1180:34b-48: g-yon brkyang stabs kyi zhabs kyis bzhugs //
T02D1180:34b-49: rtsa ba'i zhal ni sngon po ste //
T02D1180:34b-50: mche ba gtsigs shing drag 'jigs shing //
T02D1180:35a-0: @35a * // g-yon dang g-yas pa dkar dang dmar //
T02D1180:35a-1: ji ltar rtsa gsum gnas pa bzhin //
T02D1180:35a-2: rdo rje gri gug rtse gsum pa //
T02D1180:35a-3: g-yas pa'i phyag na rim pa bzhin //
T02D1180:35a-4: rdo rje dril bu thod pa dang //
T02D1180:35a-5: kha tv'am ga yang g-yon pa na //
T02D1180:35a-6: sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa can //
T02D1180:35a-7: mi bskyod pa dang zla phyed can //
T02D1180:35a-8: phrag par mgo yi phreng ba nas //
T02D1180:35a-9: dbu nyid la ni thod pa can //
T02D1180:35a-10: rus pa'i phyag rgya lnga rnams ldan //
T02D1180:35a-11: stag gi pags pas rked la dkris //
T02D1180:35a-12: spyan dgu pa ste ljags 'gyur zhing //
T02D1180:35a-13: sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan byas pa //
T02D1180:35a-14: rdo rje h'um mdzad 'di lta bu //
T02D1180:35a-15: 'dren pa de phyir bsgom par bya //
T02D1180:35a-16: h'um yig nag po las byung ba //
T02D1180:35a-17: shar gyi nyi mar gzhag par bya //
T02D1180:35a-18: gshin rje mthar byed nag cing drag / g-yon brkyang gar stabs kyis gnas pa //
T02D1180:35a-19: nag dang dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal //
T02D1180:35a-20: gsus pa chen po spyan gsum pa //
T02D1180:35a-21: phyag rgya lnga dang thod pa'i phreng //
T02D1180:35a-22: rked pa stag gi pags pa can //
T02D1180:35a-23: klu dbang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan //
T02D1180:35a-24: kun la cod pan la ni rigs //
T02D1180:35a-25: de rnams mdog mtshon tha dad pa //
T02D1180:35a-26: de bzhin du ni zhabs rnams bzhi //
T02D1180:35a-27: dbyug pa 'khor lo rdo rje ni //
