T02D1180:41a-35: sku gsung thugs dang bde ba yang //
T02D1180:41a-36: gzhan te phung po'i tshogs pa'ang gzhan //
T02D1180:41a-37: sa sogs khams rnams gzhan pa ste //
T02D1180:41a-38: yul dang dbang po rnams kyang ngo //
T02D1180:41a-39: las kyi dbang po'i bya ba'ang gzhan //
T02D1180:41a-40: de bzhin las kyi dbang po yang //
T02D1180:41a-41: thams cad nas ni phyag zhabs sogs //
T02D1180:41a-42: kun nas spyan dang dbu dang zhal //
T02D1180:41a-43: kun nas thos ldan 'jig rten du //
T02D1180:41a-44: thams cad khyab par byas te bzhugs //
T02D1180:41a-45: zhes pa rtsa ba'i rgyud du de kho na nyid kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1180:41a-46: da ni 'di sgrub pa'i ched du kun rdzob tu
T02D1180:41a-47: phyag rgya nyung ngu'i rgyud du gsungs pa 'di lta
T02D1180:41a-48: ste / skyed byed ma dang sring mo dang //
T02D1180:41a-49: bu mo sring mo'i bu mo ni //
T02D1180:41a-50: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
T02D1180:41a-51: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod //
T02D1180:41a-52: rnal 'byor zhes pa gzung ba dang /
T02D1180:41b-0: @41b 'dzin pa'i sems dag gcig pa nyid //
T02D1180:41b-1: brkyang ma dang ro ma dag gcig pa nyid dang /
T02D1180:41b-2: gtum mo dang khu ba dag gcig pa nyid do //
T02D1180:41b-3: de las nges par sgrub pa'i dbang phyug dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1180:41b-4: tshangs par spyod pa mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba shes
T02D1180:41b-5: rab dang thabs snyoms par 'jug pas mchod par bya'o
T02D1180:41b-6: // phyi rol du ni yul dang rigs kyi tha
T02D1180:41b-7: snyad kyis ma la sogs pa rnams so zhes pa'o
T02D1180:41b-9: gar ma chos ma g-yung mo dang //
T02D1180:41b-10: gtum mo de bzhin bram ze mo //
T02D1180:41b-11: rnal 'byor rig pas zhes sngar bshad pa'i chogs dang /
T02D1180:41b-12: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
T02D1180:41b-13: de nyid rig pas rtag tu mchod //
T02D1180:41b-14: dus thams cad du mi 'pho ba'i bde bas cho ga bsten par bya ste /
T02D1180:41b-15: ji ltar bye bar mi 'gyur bar /
T02D1180:41b-16: bye ba ni nges pa'i don gyi khu ba 'pho ba'o //
T02D1180:41b-17: drang ba'i don gyi phyi rol du skye bos smod pa'o //
T02D1180:41b-18: de'i phyir ma la sogs pa rnams rnal 'byor bas
T02D1180:41b-19: 'bad pas bsten par bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D1180:41b-20: nges pa ste / gang gi tshe gsal por bsten
T02D1180:41b-21: par byas na de'i tshe rgyal po'i rigs la sogs
T02D1180:41b-22: pa rnams kyis byis pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la
T02D1180:41b-23: sdug bsngal ster bar byed do zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:41b-24: rigs lnga'i phyag rgya rnams zhes pa //
T02D1180:41b-25: thar pa'i rgyur ni brjod par bya //
T02D1180:41b-27: 'dir thar pa'i rgyur phyag rgya zhes bya ba /
T02D1180:41b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs can yin la /
T02D1180:41b-30: byang chub sems 'dis rgyas gdab bya //
T02D1180:41b-31: zhes pa phyag rgya ste aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
T02D1180:41b-32: 'dir rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa ma la
T02D1180:41b-33: sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams 'khrags 'khrugs su gsungs mod
T02D1180:41b-34: / rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzung bar bya ste /
T02D1180:41b-35: 'dir ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
T02D1180:41b-37: spyan ma ste lte ba'i pad+ma la'o //
T02D1180:41b-38: sring mo ni m'a ma k'i dang snying gar dang rdo rje'i rigs can ma dang g-yung mo'o //
T02D1180:41b-39: bu mo ni me'i khams dang /
T02D1180:41b-41: gar ma ste mgrin par ro //
T02D1180:41b-42: sring mo'i bu mo ni rlung gi khams dang /
T02D1180:41b-43: las kyi rigs can ma dang tshos ma ste dpral bar ro //
T02D1180:41b-44: chung ma ni rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang /
T02D1180:41b-45: nam mkha'i khams dang gtum mo dang /
T02D1180:41b-46: rin po che'i rigs can ma ste /
T02D1180:42a-0: mthar skyes ma ni ye shes kyi khams dang rdo rje sems @42a * //
T02D1180:42a-1: dpa'i rigs can ma ste gsang ba'i pad+mar ro //
T02D1180:42a-2: de ltar lte ba las steng du phyag rgya'i rigs lnga po 'di /
T02D1180:42a-3: mdor bsdus pa ni brjod par bya //
T02D1180:42a-4: rigs ni rnam pa drug rnams brjod //
T02D1180:42a-5: ces pa gtsug tor du nam mkha'i khams kyi rigs dang /
T02D1180:42a-6: dpral bar rlung gi khams kyi rigs dang /
T02D1180:42a-7: mgrin par me'i khams kyi rigs dang /
T02D1180:42a-8: snying gar chu'i khams kyi rigs dang /
T02D1180:42a-9: lte bar sa'i khams kyi rigs dang /
T02D1180:42a-10: gsang bar ye shes kyi khams kyi rigs so //
T02D1180:42a-11: de ltar nam mkha'i gtso bo'i yon tan ni chos kyi khams so //
T02D1180:42a-12: rlung gi yon tan gtso bo ni reg bya'o //
T02D1180:42a-13: me'i yon tan gtso bo ni ro'o //
T02D1180:42a-14: chu'i yon tan gtso bo ni gzugs so //
T02D1180:42a-15: sa'i yon tan gtso bo ni dri'o //
T02D1180:42a-16: ye shes kyi khams kyi yon tan gtso bo ni sgra'i khams so //
T02D1180:42a-17: de bzhin du rna ba'i dbang po dang /
T02D1180:42a-23: de bzhin du bha ga'i dbang po dang /
T02D1180:42a-29: de ltar phyag rgya rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D1180:42a-36: de ltar rigs sum cu rtsa drug rnams kyi rigs drug go //
T02D1180:42a-37: de ltar khams sum cu rtsa drug rnams su rig par bya'o //
T02D1180:42a-38: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa drug dang /
T02D1180:42a-44: de ltar phung po dang khams rnams bdun cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1180:42a-45: de rnams kyang nyis 'gyur gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba sdom pa las lha rnams te /
T02D1180:42a-46: dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa drug rnams dang /
T02D1180:42a-47: sum cu rtsa bdun pa he ru ka rdo rje phag mo dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1180:42a-49: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo ni bde mchog ste /
T02D1180:42a-50: nyis 'gyur ni 'khor lo drug gi bde mchog go //
T02D1180:42a-51: kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1180:42a-52: 'khor lo sdom pa'i tshig gnyis kyis gsal bar mdzad de /
T02D1180:42a-53: de nas sngags pas nyis 'gyur mchod //
T02D1180:42a-54: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02D1180:42b-1: /'dab ma dang zhing la sogs pa nyis 'gyur te /
T02D1180:42b-2: gnas bzhi rnams dang nye ba'i gnas bzhi rnams dang /
T02D1180:42b-3: zhing bzhi rnams dang nye ba'i zhing bzhi rnams dang tsha ndo ha bzhi dang /
T02D1180:42b-4: nye ba'i tsha ndo ha bzhi dang /
T02D1180:42b-6: nye ba'i 'du ba bzhi rnams dang /
T02D1180:42b-8: nye ba'i 'thung gcod bzhi rnams dang /
T02D1180:42b-10: nye ba'i dur khrod bzhi rnams te /
T02D1180:42b-11: de ltar sa bcu gnyis rnams so //
T02D1180:42b-12: re re la yang dpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma bzhi dpa' bo dang bcas pa rnams so //
T02D1180:42b-13: de ltar 'khor lo drug la rnal 'byor ma bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad rnams te /
T02D1180:42b-14: nam mkha'i 'khor lo la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma brgyad rnams dang /
T02D1180:42b-15: rlung gi 'khor lo la ral gri'i mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dang /
T02D1180:42b-16: me'i 'khor lo la rin po che'i mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dang /
T02D1180:42b-17: chu'i 'khor lo la pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dang /
T02D1180:42b-18: sa'i 'khor lo la 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dang /
T02D1180:42b-19: ye shes kyi 'khor lo la gri gug gi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad do //
T02D1180:42b-20: rdo rje nor bur stong pa'i mkha' 'gro ma brgyad
T02D1180:42b-21: de rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'dzin pa rnams so
T02D1180:42b-22: // gzhan rnams ni dur khrod bcu drug na dga'
T02D1180:42b-23: ba bcu drug las skyes pa mkha' 'gro ma bcu
T02D1180:42b-24: // drug rnams te / rna ba gnyis la gnyis dag dang /
T02D1180:42b-25: sna'i bu ga na gnyis dang /
T02D1180:42b-27: lce dang 'phyang ma dag na gnyis dang /
T02D1180:42b-28: spyi gtsug gi bu ga dag na gnyis dang /
T02D1180:42b-29: bshang lam gyi sgo na gnyis dang /
T02D1180:42b-30: gci ba'i sgo na gnyis dang /
T02D1180:42b-31: khu ba 'pho ba'i sgo na gnyis te de ltar rnal 'byor ma bcu drug rnams so //
T02D1180:42b-32: de rnams kyi dbus na gtso bo lhan cig skyes
T02D1180:42b-33: pa'i dga' ba stong pa nyid kyis 'khyud pa bcom
T02D1180:42b-34: ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje phyag nyi shu rtsa bzhi
T02D1180:42b-35: pa ste 'khor lo sdom pa nyis 'gyur las so
T02D1180:42b-36: // dus kyi khyad par gyis bzhugs pa ste /
T02D1180:42b-37: lo rnam par dag pa sku sngon po'o //
T02D1180:42b-38: bgrod pa rnam par dag pas dkar po dang dmar po'i zhabs so //
T02D1180:42b-39: dus gsum rnam par dag pas nag po dang /
T02D1180:42b-40: dmar po dang dkar po'i mgrin pa ste /
T02D1180:42b-41: mgo can la sogs pa'i zla ba bzhi rnams dus gcig go //
T02D1180:42b-42: chu srin la sogs pa zla ba gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi dus bzhi rnams te /
T02D1180:42b-43: de rnam par dag pas nag po dang /
T02D1180:43a-4: de bzhin du mgo can la sogs pa rnams zla
T02D1180:43a-5: ba gnyis kyi bdag nyid can gyi dus tshigs drug
T02D1180:43a-6: rnams te / de rnam par dag pas phrag pa drug ste /
T02D1180:43a-9: dkar po'i rang bzhin g-yas dang cig shos dag go //
T02D1180:43a-10: de bzhin du zla ba bzhi bzhi'i bdag nyid g-yas
T02D1180:43a-11: pa dang cig shos kyi nag po dang dmar po
T02D1180:43a-12: dang dkar po'i dpung pa bcu gnyis te zla ba
T02D1180:43a-14: de bzhin du phyogs kyi dbye bas phyag nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
T02D1180:43a-15: so sor ches grangs so so'i dbye bas g-yon pa
T02D1180:43a-16: dang g-yas pa'i phyag gi tshigs kyi rtsa rnams so
T02D1180:43a-17: // sor mo'i tshigs drug cu lhag pa'i brgya phrag
T02D1180:43a-18: gsum ni lo'i tshes kyi dbye bas so zhes pa'o
T02D1180:43a-19: // // de ltar rigs drug gi bdag nyid can gyi he ru ka dus kyi 'khor lo ste /
T02D1180:43a-20: de kho na dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02D1180:43a-21: 'di'i zhal brgya yis mgo bo'i phreng ba ni rig
T02D1180:43a-22: byed kyi yan lag brgya yin la tshangs pa'i mgo
T02D1180:43a-23: bo bcad pa rnams kyi rdo rje thod pa can
T02D1180:43a-24: chen po bcom ldan 'das so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:43a-25: nyis 'gyur gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba sdom pa ni rigs drug gi bdag nyid can no //
T02D1180:43a-26: rgyud gzhan dang gzhan du ni rigs lnga'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D1180:43a-28: rigs ni rnam pa drug bshad pa //
T02D1180:43a-29: mdor bsdus pas ni rnam pa lnga //
T02D1180:43a-30: sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis //
T02D1180:43a-31: phyi nas rnam pa gsum nyid 'gyur //
T02D1180:43a-33: de ltar bshad pa'i rim pas /
T02D1180:43a-34: rigs dang 'byung ba lnga rnams dang //
T02D1180:43a-35: phung po lnga yi bdag nyid can //
T02D1180:43a-36: 'di yis rig byed bgrangs byed pas //
T02D1180:43a-37: rigs zhes mngon par brjod par bya //
T02D1180:43a-41: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D1180:43a-42: dpal ldan de bzhin nyid du gshegs //
T02D1180:43a-43: de bzhin nyid du 'ang byon pa nyid //
T02D1180:43a-44: shes rab ldan pa 'di yis ni //
T02D1180:43a-45: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon brjod bya //
T02D1180:43a-47: 'dir shes rab stong pa nyid dang ldan pa de stong pa nyid kyi gzugs dang lhan cig pa'o //
T02D1180:43a-49: gsang ba'i pad+mar rdo rje nor bu'i mthar thug par
T02D1180:43a-50: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa la
T02D1180:43b-0: gtsug tor @43b nam mkha'i khams nas dpral ba dang
T02D1180:43b-4: gsang ba'i pad+ma rnams la rlung dang /
T02D1180:43b-8: ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje btsun mo'i
T02D1180:43b-9: bha ga rnams su bzhugs par gyur to zhes pa
T02D1180:43b-10: dpal ldan byang chub kyi sems rdo rje gshegs pa'o
T02D1180:43b-11: // de bzhin du yang byon pa nyid //
T02D1180:43b-12: ces pa ji ltar 'og gi char gshegs pa de
T02D1180:43b-13: ltar rdo rje nor bu las gsang ba'i pad+ma ye
T02D1180:43b-14: shes kyi khams las byon pa ste lte bar dang
T02D1180:43b-18: gtsug tor du gyen du khu ba yis so //
T02D1180:43b-19: de ltar na ji ltar gshegs pa de ltar byon pa grub ste /
T02D1180:43b-20: yan lag bcu gnyis 'gog pa zhes pas sa bcu gnyis thob pa'o //
T02D1180:43b-21: ji ltar 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob kyi dga' ba dang /
T02D1180:43b-24: lhan cig skyes pa'i dbye bas dpral ba nas 'og
T02D1180:43b-25: tu byon pa de ltar bzlog pas rgyu mthun pa
T02D1180:43b-26: dang rnam par smin pa dang /
T02D1180:43b-28: dri ma med pa rnams kyi gsang ba nas dpral bar gshegs pa'o //
T02D1180:43b-29: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1180:43b-30: lte bar rgyu mthun rab tu brjod //
T02D1180:43b-31: chos kyi 'khor lor rnam smin te //
T02D1180:43b-32: skyes bu byed pa longs spyod du //
T02D1180:43b-33: bde ba chen po dri ma med //
T02D1180:43b-36: de ltar na ji ltar tshes gcig la sogs pa
T02D1180:43b-37: cha bco lnga'i dbye bas kun rdzob tu gtsug tor
T02D1180:43b-38: nas gsang ba'i pad+mar cha rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis
T02D1180:43b-39: 'og tu khu bas ye shes kyi sems song ba
T02D1180:43b-40: ste / de ltar rdo rje nor bu las byung
T02D1180:43b-41: ba rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis gsang ba'i pad+ma las
T02D1180:43b-42: bzlog pas tshes gcig la sogs pa'i cha'i dbye bas
T02D1180:43b-43: cha gang ba'i rang bzhin gyi steng du khu bas
T02D1180:43b-44: dpral ba'i pad+mar gshegs pa ste /
T02D1180:43b-45: gtsug tor du cha bcu drug pa'i rang bzhin gyis so //
T02D1180:43b-46: de ltar 'khor ba pa rnams kyi rdul gyi khams
T02D1180:43b-47: nag po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa'i dbye bas gsang
T02D1180:43b-48: ba nas gtsug tor du song ba gnam stong gi
T02D1180:43b-49: mthar cha bcu drug pa nyams pa'i dbye bas yin
T02D1180:43b-50: no // de kho na sangs rgyas rnams kyis bzlog
T02D1180:43b-51: pas gtsug tor nas nag po'i tshes gcig la sogs
T02D1180:43b-52: pa'i cha'i dbye bas gnam stong gi mthar zla ba'i
T02D1180:44a-1: pa nyams pa'i bye brag gis gsang ba'i pad+mar son pa'o //
T02D1180:44a-2: de skad du yang kun rdzob pas dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa /
T02D1180:44a-3: lus can thams cad 'chi ba na //
T02D1180:44a-5: steng du nyi ma rdul sgra gcan //
T02D1180:44a-6: rnam shes dngos po'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1180:44a-7: de phyir zla ba bdud rtsi ni //
T02D1180:44a-8: steng du 'gro bya mi bskyod pa //
T02D1180:44a-9: 'og tu nyi ma rdul sgra can //
T02D1180:44a-10: rnam shes 'gyur med bde ba la'o //
T02D1180:44a-12: don dam pas 'di nyid du 'chad par 'gyur ba //
T02D1180:44a-13: byang chub sems ni zla bar 'gyur //
T02D1180:44a-14: bco lnga'i cha yi bdag nyid can //
T02D1180:44a-15: bde ba chen po a'a li'i gzugs //
T02D1180:44a-16: rnal 'byor ma rnams de yi cha //
T02D1180:44a-17: zhes pa dga' ba bcu drug gi nges pa'o //
T02D1180:44a-18: de bzhin du rigs kyi le'ur bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1180:44a-19: ji ltar rigs par rnal 'byor ma'i //
T02D1180:44a-20: skye ba dang ni gnas pa'i rgyur //
T02D1180:44a-21: nus pa ye shes rnam shes dang //
T02D1180:44a-23: he ru ka ni bskyed pa'i rgyu //
T02D1180:44a-24: dang po re zhig ae wam 'gyur //
T02D1180:44a-25: lhan cig skyes dga' bde ba che //
T02D1180:44a-26: ae wam yi ge 'gyur med che //
T02D1180:44a-28: rnam par mi rtog pa'i yid la ni //
T02D1180:44a-29: sgom pa po med bsgom bya med //
T02D1180:44a-30: sngags med lha ni yod ma yin //
T02D1180:44a-31: spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin las //
T02D1180:44a-32: sngags dang lha dag yang dag gnas //
T02D1180:44a-33: de nyid kyis na lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i
T02D1180:44a-34: rang bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa'i rnyog pa mtha'
T02D1180:44a-35: dag nub pa'i ngo bos so //
T02D1180:44a-36: da ni phung po drug po rnams kyi kun rdzob
T02D1180:44a-37: dang don dam pa'i dbye ba brjod par bya ste
T02D1180:44a-38: / rnam snang zhes pa la sogs pas so //
T02D1180:44a-39: 'dir rnam par snang mdzad ni sa'i 'khor lo la 'dren pa'o //
T02D1180:44a-40: mi bskyod pa ni nam mkha'i 'khor lo la 'dren pa'o //
T02D1180:44a-41: 'od dpag med ni chu'i 'khor lo la 'dren pa'o //
T02D1180:44a-42: rin chen 'byung ldan ni me'i 'khor lo la 'dren pa'o //
T02D1180:44a-43: don yod grub pa ni rlung gi 'khor lo la 'dren pa'o //
T02D1180:44a-44: sems dpa' can ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo la 'dren pa'o //
T02D1180:44a-45: de rnams kyang grangs ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02D1180:44a-46: tshangs pa khyab 'jug zhi ba dang //
T02D1180:44a-47: thams cad rnams da de nyid brjod //
T02D1180:44a-48: ces pa kun rdzob tu sems can rnams 'og tu khu ba can rnams te /
T02D1180:44a-49: don dam pas sangs rgyas rnams steng du khu ba can rnams so //
T02D1180:44a-50: tshangs pa myang 'das sangs rgyas te //
T02D1180:44a-51: zhes pa bshang ba'i khams mi 'dzag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1180:44b-0: gci ba'i khams rnams rang gi lus la 'jug pa nyid kyi @44b phyir te /
T02D1180:44b-1: phyi rol du 'byung ba med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas khyab 'jug tu brjod par bya'o //
T02D1180:44b-2: rtag tu dge phyir zhi ba'o //
T02D1180:44b-3: zhes pa la dge ba'i tshul khrims ma nyams pa ste /
T02D1180:44b-4: khu ba mi 'pho ba'i bde ba'i phyir sangs rgyas 'di ni zhi bar brjod par bya'o //
T02D1180:44b-5: thams cad kun bdag la gnas phyir //
T02D1180:44b-6: zhes pa thams cad ni rin chen 'byung ldan khrag gi khams te /
T02D1180:44b-7: de 'pho ba med pa la sdug bsngal med la /
T02D1180:44b-9: bde sdug sel ba mthar 'byung ba //
T02D1180:44b-10: chags bral lus ni zad pa po //
T02D1180:44b-12: kun bdag lag nas ni lha'i mig dang gzhan gyi
T02D1180:44b-13: sems shes pas thams cad la khyab par byed pa
T02D1180:44b-14: nyid kyi phyir // sangs rgyas ni thams cad ces par brjod par bya'o //
T02D1180:44b-15: rtogs pa med pas rnam sad do //
T02D1180:44b-16: zhes pa mig la sogs pa'i dbang pos rtogs pa
T02D1180:44b-17: med pas don yod grub pa ni sha'i khams te
T02D1180:44b-18: / de zad pa nyid kyi phyir mig la sogs pa rnams 'du byed pa med la /
T02D1180:44b-19: de med pa'i phyir rnam sad de /
T02D1180:44b-20: bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa //
T02D1180:44b-21: kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog /'jig rten dpe las 'das pa ste //
T02D1180:44b-22: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / ces pas sangs rgyas ni /
T02D1180:44b-23: rtog pa med pas rnam sangs rgyas //
T02D1180:44b-25: dam pa'i bde bas de nyid 'gyur //
T02D1180:44b-26: zhes pa la dam pa'i bde ba ni zag pa med pa stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1180:44b-29: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste /
T02D1180:44b-30: rnam par thar pa bzhi po gcig tu 'dres par
T02D1180:44b-31: gyur pa nyid snying rje dang byams pa dang dga'
T02D1180:44b-32: ba dang btang snyoms dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1180:44b-33: gyis / dmigs pa shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag
T02D1180:44b-34: nyid can gyi de kho na nying ni sangs rgyas
T02D1180:44b-37: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis pa //
T02D1180:44b-38: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig / rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa ;
T02D1180:44b-39: / rnam dag mchog tu mi 'gyur rig / ces pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1180:44b-40: de ltar gsungs pa'i rim pa las //
T02D1180:44b-41: rigs gsum dang ni rigs lnga nyid //
T02D1180:44b-42: rang bzhin gcig pas rigs brgya'o zhes pa'o de skad du mtshan yang dag par brjod par /
T02D1180:44b-43: khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs //
T02D1180:44b-44: mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan //
T02D1180:44b-45: keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po //
T02D1180:44b-46: ha la ha la gdong brgya pa //
T02D1180:44b-47: zhes pa dang ni de bzhin du //
T02D1180:44b-48: rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzang //
T02D1180:44b-49: mgo skyes rdo rje 'bar ba ste //
T02D1180:44b-51: mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mig / ces pa rigs brgya'i nges pa'o //
T02D1180:44b-52: de ltar kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i dbye bas
T02D1180:44b-53: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i de
T02D1180:45a-1: sgrib pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1180:45a-3: mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1180:45a-5: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1180:45a-6: rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
T02D1180:45a-7: sgro btags pa dang sgro btags pa med pa dang /
T02D1180:45a-8: nga rgyal dang bcas pa dang nga rgyal med pa ste /
T02D1180:45a-9: sems can rnams dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis rten cing
T02D1180:45a-10: 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis 'gog pas
T02D1180:45a-11: mi skye ba 'jug pa yang med pa'o zhes pa
T02D1180:45a-12: rgyud gzhan thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
T02D1180:45a-13: kyi nges pa ste mkhas pa rnams kyis rig par
T02D1180:45a-14: bya'o // da ni yang kun rdzob kyi chos kyi
T02D1180:45a-15: lha la sogs pa brjod par bya ste lus la
T02D1180:45a-16: 'byung ngo zhes pa la sogs pas so //
T02D1180:45a-17: 'dir gang gi phyir lus 'byung ba lnga'i bdag nyid
T02D1180:45a-18: la kun rdzob kyi bde ba yang dag par 'byung
T02D1180:45a-19: ba de'i phyir lha zhes bdag gis brjod par bya'o
T02D1180:45a-20: // sangs rgyas 'di la bha ga mnga' //
T02D1180:45a-21: des na bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod //
T02D1180:45a-22: bha ga rnam pa drug tu brjod //
T02D1180:45a-23: dbang phyug la sogs yon tan kun //
T02D1180:45a-24: dbang phyug dang ni phun tshogs dang //
T02D1180:45a-25: ye shes grags pa dpal rnams dang //
T02D1180:45a-26: skal ba bzang po yon tan nyid //
T02D1180:45a-27: bha ga'i sgra yis brjod par bya //
T02D1180:45a-28: yan na nyon mongs la sogs bdud //
T02D1180:45a-30: don dam pas so zhes pa thabs kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1180:45a-31: da ni shes rab brjod par bya //
T02D1180:45a-32: ma zhes pa la sogs pas so //
T02D1180:45a-33: 'dir thabs ni pha ste khu ba'i khams so //
T02D1180:45a-34: shes rab ni ma ste rdul gyi khams so ;
T02D1180:45a-35: / bskyed pa ni las kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i
T02D1180:45a-36: dri za'i sems can 'chi ba'i mthar gyur pa skye
T02D1180:45a-37: ba'i char gtogs pa'i kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa
T02D1180:45a-38: ste / de kho na 'gro ba'i sgras brjod par bya'o //
T02D1180:45a-40: kye rgyal ba'i sras rnams khams gsum po 'di ni sems tsam mo zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1180:45a-42: 'gro ba skyed par byed do zhes pa shes rab
T02D1180:45a-43: ma ru brjod par bya ste rdul gyi khams so
T02D1180:45a-44: // de bzhin du skal ba can gyi thabs te khu ba'i khams so //
T02D1180:45a-45: gang phyir rnam dbye ston pa'i phyir //
T02D1180:45a-46: shes rab de kho na sring mor brjod par bya /
T02D1180:45a-47: khams kyi rnam 'gyur so so'i ba spu dang pags pa dang sha dang khrag gi'o //
T02D1180:45a-48: de bzhin du thabs ni spun zla ste ;
T02D1180:45a-49: gang gi phyir rtsa dang rus pa dang rkang gi
T02D1180:45a-50: rnam par dbye ba ston pa de'i phyir khu ba'i
T02D1180:45a-51: khams so // yon tan 'jo phyir shes rab de
T02D1180:45a-52: kho na ni bu mor yang brjod par bya ste
T02D1180:45a-53: khams so // / yon tan rnams ni sgra dang /
T02D1180:45a-59: de rnams 'jo ba'i phyir na de 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:45b-0: de bzhin du thabs @45b ni bu ste mig la
T02D1180:45b-1: sogs rnams rab tu 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir thabs
T02D1180:45b-2: kyi khams so // de bzhin du shes rab ni
T02D1180:45b-3: sring mo'i bu mo ste yul la rnam par shes
T02D1180:45b-4: pa rnams rab tu 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir ro
T02D1180:45b-5: kyi khams so // // thabs ni spun zla'i bu
T02D1180:45b-6: ste mig la sogs pa rnams la rab tu 'jug
T02D1180:45b-7: pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o de bzhin du
T02D1180:45b-8: 'pho ba'i bde ba la 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1180:45b-9: shes rab ni chung mar brjod do //
T02D1180:45b-10: thabs kyang khyo bo ru brjod de phan tshun ltos
T02D1180:45b-11: pa nyid kyi phyir gnyis ka yang 'pho ba'i bde
T02D1180:45b-12: ba'i chos las so zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:45b-13: chags pa dang bral ba las shes rab ni reg min mthar skyes ma zhes brjod do //
T02D1180:45b-14: thabs kyang ngo zhes pa phyag rgya drug gi nges pa'o //
T02D1180:45b-15: khams kun rmongs par byed pa'i phyir //
T02D1180:45b-16: bram ze mo zhes brjod par bya //
T02D1180:45b-18: khams g-yo byed phyir gar mkhan ma //
T02D1180:45b-19: sreg byed phyir nag tu ma mor bshad //
T02D1180:45b-20: reg min phyir na g-yung mor bshad //
T02D1180:45b-21: de bzhin du thabs kyang shes par bya ste /
T02D1180:45b-22: bya ba lnga'i rang bzhin las so //
T02D1180:45b-23: de ltar thams cad phyi rol du de'i phyir mu
T02D1180:45b-24: stegs pa rnams kyis rig byed la sogs pa rnams
T02D1180:45b-25: kyis rab tu brtags pa ste //
T02D1180:45b-26: rang bzhin gyis bud med thams cad dang skyes pa
T02D1180:45b-27: thams cad mi'i rigs gcig tu yang dag par byung
T02D1180:45b-28: ba ste / de rnams la rigs gzhan yod pa
T02D1180:45b-29: ma yin no zhes pa rgyud gzhan thams cad du
T02D1180:45b-31: da ni khams kyi rang bzhin gyis sngags bzlas pa
T02D1180:45b-32: la sogs pa brjod pa zhes pa la sogs pas
T02D1180:45b-33: bshad par bya'o // 'dir sems can thams cad kyi
T02D1180:45b-34: brjod pa ni a'a li k'a li dbyangs dang gsal
T02D1180:45b-35: byed dag gi brjod pa gang yin pa ste /
T02D1180:45b-37: brjod pa bzlas pa yin par bshad //
T02D1180:45b-38: de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1180:45b-41: rkang pa dag gis sa gzhi nyed pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor du brjod par bya'o //
T02D1180:45b-43: lag pa bsgyur ba phyag rgyar 'gyur //
T02D1180:45b-44: sor mo nyed pa gang yin pa //
T02D1180:45b-46: sems can rnams kyis gang sems pa //
T02D1180:45b-47: de kho na bsam bya ste /
T02D1180:45b-48: pha rol gyi sems shes pas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:45b-49: gang phyir bsam bral bsam bya ba //
T02D1180:45b-50: zhes pa bsam bral zhes pa sems pa med pa ste /
T02D1180:45b-51: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bsam bya gang yin pa'o //
T02D1180:45b-52: pha'i yul la 'chi ba'i mthar gyur pa skye ba'i
T02D1180:45b-53: char gtogs pa'i sems can gyi 'pho ba'i gnas skabs
T02D1180:45b-54: su thob pa'i bde ba gang yin pa'i bde ba
T02D1180:45b-55: de nyid ni lo bcu drug gi mtshams su skyes
T02D1180:45b-56: pas rang gi bza' bar bya ba'o //
T02D1180:45b-57: bud med kyis ni lo bcu gnyis kyi mtshams su longs spyad par bya'o //
T02D1180:45b-58: bde ba gang gis 'chi ba 'dir te /
T02D1180:46a-0: 'khor ba pa rnams kyis 'khor bar skye ba dang gnas pa'i bde ba de kho na @46a * //
T02D1180:46a-1: brtan par gyur pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bsam gtan du brjod par bya'o //
T02D1180:46a-2: kye'i rdo rje'i snying po bdag gis 'di thams cad
T02D1180:46a-3: ni mdor bsdus pa'i kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud 'bum phrag
T02D1180:46a-4: lnga pa las / 'bum phrag so so'i nang nas
T02D1180:46a-5: le'u so so las bsdus pa'i don bstan pa ste
T02D1180:46a-8: // /'di las phyi ma spyod pa'i le'u la sogs pa ni rgya cher rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1180:46a-9: rigs kyi le'u ru tshigs su bcas pa sum cu
T02D1180:46a-10: rnams kyis 'bum phrag dang po las bsdus pa'i don
T02D1180:46a-12: / sngags kyi le'u ru tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu rnams kyis 'bum phrag gnyis pa las so //
T02D1180:46a-13: lha'i le'u ru nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams kyis 'bum phrag gsum pa las so //
T02D1180:46a-14: tshigs su bcad pa drug rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'i le'u ru 'bum phrag bzhi pa las so //
T02D1180:46a-15: tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rnams kyis de kho
T02D1180:46a-16: na nyid kyi le'u 'bum phrag lnga pa las so
T02D1180:46a-17: // de ltar tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu lhag
T02D1180:46a-18: pa'i brgya rnams kyis bsdus pa'i don le'u lnga rnams
T02D1180:46a-19: su rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rgya cher 'grel pa
T02D1180:46a-20: 'di yis rtogs par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1180:46a-21: kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel pa stong phrag drug par de
T02D1180:46a-22: kho na nyid nges par mdor bstan pa'i mdor bsdus
T02D1180:46a-24: / de ltar de kho na nyid kyi le'u rdzogs so //
T02D1180:46a-25: dpal kye'i rdo rje bsdus pa'i don gyis 'grel pa rdzogs so /
T02D1180:46a-27: // / rje btsun byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos mdzad pa'o //
T02D1180:46a-28: rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'a na sh'i la dang /
T02D1180:46a-29: lo ts'a ba 'bro seng dkar sh'a kya 'od kyis bsgyur ba ;
T02D1180:46a-30: slad kyi rgya gar gyi mkhan po su bh'u ti shr'i sh'a nti dang /
T02D1180:46a-31: lo ts'a ba cog gru ting nge 'dzin bzang pos zhus so //
T02D1180:46a-32: yang slad kyi rgya gar gyi mkhan po rgyal po'i sras /
T02D1180:46a-33: dpal 'jigs med lha'i zhal sngar lo ts'a ba snyel
T02D1180:46a-34: cor dge slong pra dzny'a k'i rtis yul dbus 'gyur
T02D1180:46a-35: gyi dpes gtan la phab pa /
T02D1180:46a-36: slar yang dpal ldan shong ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan
T02D1180:46a-37: gyis legs par bshad pa la sogs pa'i mthu las
T02D1180:46a-38: / brda sprod pa'i tshul rig pa'i dpang lo ts'a ba dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas /
T02D1180:46a-39: byang chub sems dpa'i 'grel ba skor gsum gyi tshul
T02D1180:46a-40: la shin tu dad cing blo'i snang ba rgyas pa'i
T02D1180:46a-41: bshes gnyen ra lung pa chos grags dpal bzang pos
T02D1180:46a-42: / slob dpon chen po zhi ba 'tsho'i zhabs dpon slob kyis mdzad pa'i /
T02D1180:46a-43: dbu ma'i gzhung lugs chen po de kho na nyid
T02D1180:46a-44: bsdus pa rtsa 'grel gyi glegs bam bris te yon
T02D1180:46a-45: du gnang nas yang dang yang du bskul ba'i dor
T02D1180:46a-46: legs par bcos te bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la
T02D1180:46a-47: phab pa'i yi ge pa ni mdzad ston kun dga'
T02D1180:46a-50: // /'dis sems can mang po dpag tu med pa la phan par gyur cig /
T02D1180:46b-0: // / @46b * // rdo rje snying po'i 'grel pa bzhugs /
T02D1180:46b-2: # // yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton //
T02D1180:46b-3: dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang //
T02D1180:46b-4: kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1180:46b-7: 'gro la snying rjes gdungs pa yis //
T02D1180:46b-8: rdo rje snying po ngas bshad bya //
T02D1180:46b-9: de la kye'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i
T02D1180:46b-10: rnal 'byor pa sngon gyi dam bcas pa las mi
T02D1180:46b-11: 'dor ba la brtson pa dang ldan pas //
T02D1180:46b-12: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir spyod pa la 'jug par bya ba yin pas /
T02D1180:46b-13: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya //
T02D1180:46b-14: spyod pas pha rol phyin mchog nyid //
T02D1180:46b-15: kye yi rdo rje dngos grub rgyus ;
T02D1180:46b-16: / gang gis dngos grub mthar 'gro ba //
T02D1180:46b-18: de nas zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid
T02D1180:46b-19: kyi le'u bshad pa'i rjes su bstan pa yin pas
T02D1180:46b-21: kye'i rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi rgyu'i tshul gyis khams
T02D1180:46b-22: gsum po kye rdo rjer 'grub par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1180:46b-23: // spyod pa brtsams zhes bya ba'i don yin la /
T02D1180:46b-24: de las gzhan pa'i spyod pa ni ma bstan te dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1180:46b-25: spyod pa'i dgos pa ni dngos grub mthar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yin te /
T02D1180:46b-26: bdag dang de las gzhan pa'i skye bo rnams phyag
T02D1180:46b-27: rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi mthar 'gro ba'i spyod
T02D1180:46b-28: pa brtsams zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1180:46b-29: de'i don yang rtsa ba'i rgyud nyid la 'jug par bya ste /
T02D1180:46b-31: tshog [*cho ga?] yan lag kun ldan yang //
T02D1180:46b-32: spyod pa ma brtsams dngos mi grub //
T02D1180:46b-33: de bas phyag rgya'i dngos grub rgyu //
T02D1180:46b-34: chags med spyod pa 'di yin no //
T02D1180:46b-35: snying rje rnam par chad tsam gyis //
T02D1180:46b-36: sems can don gyi spyod mi 'grub //
T02D1180:46b-37: de bas snying rje dang ldan zhing //
T02D1180:46b-38: 'bad pas spyod pa spyad par bya //
T02D1180:46b-39: zhes pa 'di'i don yang shes par bya'o //
T02D1180:46b-40: de la spyod pa byed par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1180:46b-41: phyi nang gi dbye bas phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya ste /
T02D1180:46b-43: sgom pa po yis rnam 'dzin pa //
T02D1180:46b-44: rna ba dag la rna cha bzang //
T02D1180:46b-45: spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par gzung //
T02D1180:46b-46: lag pa gnyis la lag gdub gnyis //
T02D1180:46b-47: rked par ska rags nyis skor gzung //
T02D1180:46b-48: rkang par de bzhin rkang gdub po //
T02D1180:46b-49: dpung pa la ni dpung rgyan nyid //
T02D1180:46b-50: mgrin par rus khreng [*'khreng?] mgul to ste //
T02D1180:46b-51: zhes bya ba gsungs te 'di'i don yang 'bum phrag
T02D1180:46b-52: lnga pa nyid na gsal bas de la 'jug par
T02D1180:46b-53: bya ste / gal te spyod pa rtsom 'dod pas //
T02D1180:47a-0: @47a * // sems can 'dun par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1180:47a-1: mi bskyod 'khor lo'i gzugs nyid kyis //
T02D1180:47a-2: lus mchog la ni rnam brgyan te //
T02D1180:47a-3: srid pa gsum du 'khor lo bskor //
T02D1180:47a-4: lus mchog la gnas chu rgyun gyis //
T02D1180:47a-5: cig car chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02D1180:47a-7: dpag med rna cha'i gzugs nyid kyis //
T02D1180:47a-8: rna ba dag la rnam brgyan te //
T02D1180:47a-9: srid pa gsum la chags par bya //
T02D1180:47a-11: rin chen mgul rgyan gzugs nyid kyis //
T02D1180:47a-12: bdag gi mgul pa rnam brgyan te //
T02D1180:47a-15: rnam snang lag gdub gzugs nyid kyis //
T02D1180:47a-16: lag pa dag la rnam brgyan te //
T02D1180:47a-18: skye bo sa ltar brtan par 'gyur //
T02D1180:47a-19: don yod ska rags gzugs kyis ni //
T02D1180:47a-20: rked pa la ni rnam brgyan pa //
T02D1180:47a-23: / byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1180:47a-24: thal bas lus la rnam brgyan te //
T02D1180:47a-25: mchog gi spyod pa rab spyad na //
T02D1180:47a-27: zhes gsungs pas 'di'i don rgyas par khong du chud par byas te /
T02D1180:47a-32: nam mkha' dang ye shes zhes bya ba'i bdag nyid
T02D1180:47a-33: can 'khor lo drug la brten pa'i khu ba drug
T02D1180:47a-34: dang rlung drug phyir 'byung ba 'gags pas /
T02D1180:47a-35: spyod pa spyad par bya ba yin la /
T02D1180:47a-36: des skye bo gdul bar dka' ba thul bar 'gyur te /
T02D1180:47a-37: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02D1180:47a-38: de bas na de 'gags pa'i brdar bstan pa ni /
T02D1180:47a-39: 'khor lo la sogs pa drug tu bstan te /
T02D1180:47a-40: spyod pa byed pa rnams kyis phyi'i gzugs rnams kyang bcang bar nges so //
T02D1180:47a-43: thabs dang shes rab la gnas pa dang /
T02D1180:47a-44: rigs lnga'i tshul du gnas pa dang /
T02D1180:47a-45: kha dog las ston pa dang /
T02D1180:47a-46: rigs gcig tu bsdu ba dang /
T02D1180:47a-47: kha dog dang rigs gzhan gyis mi rigs par byas la spyod pa spyad ces su sbyar te /
T02D1180:47a-48: de yang bsdus pa'i rgyud 'di nyid las /
T02D1180:47a-50: bgo ba stag gi pags pa nyid //
T02D1180:47a-51: bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed de //
T02D1180:47a-52: he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid //
T02D1180:47a-53: kha dog lnga la rnam gnas te //
T02D1180:47a-54: rigs lnga dag dang mnyam ldan pa //
T02D1180:47b-0: rigs gcig tu ni rnam @47b par brtag / gang phyir bye brag mtshon mi bya //
T02D1180:47b-2: nang gi phyag rgya drug 'gags pa las stobs dang gzi brjid 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02D1180:47b-3: 'di ltar gnod sbyin gyi bdag po phyag na rdo
T02D1180:47b-4: rje lta bur cher drag la mi bzad pa rnams
T02D1180:47b-5: kyis kyang 'jigs shing skrag par mi 'gyur na /
T02D1180:47b-6: 'jig rten pa phal pa lta bu rnams lta ci smos //
T02D1180:47b-7: de bas na phyi dang nang gi bdud ma rungs
T02D1180:47b-8: pa rnams las rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir yang phyi
T02D1180:47b-9: rol du stag gi pags pa gos su gyon pa
T02D1180:47b-10: dang / skye bo rnams 'dun par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1180:47b-11: lha'i yul nas bdud rtsi drang ba la sogs pa
T02D1180:47b-13: gzhan yang sngags kyi tshul du zhugs pa'i skye bo
T02D1180:47b-14: la phyi'i dngos grub kyi ched du mgo zhes bya
T02D1180:47b-16: gzhan yang byi zhes bya ba'i skra dang ldan pa'i
T02D1180:47b-17: mi 'chi bcu'i phyed po rnams sbyang ba la sogs
T02D1180:47b-18: pa bya ste / rtog pa spangs la bdag bza' ba dang /
T02D1180:47b-19: gzhan la sbyin par yang bya ste /
T02D1180:47b-20: las kyi dang por gtogs pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya ba'i ched du'o //
T02D1180:47b-21: bdud rtsi za ba 'di'i nges pa'i don yang rtsa
T02D1180:47b-22: ba'i rgyud chen po nyid na gsal bas de la
T02D1180:47b-25: bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed rnams //
T02D1180:47b-26: skye bos rtogs par ma gyur la //
T02D1180:47b-27: mgo la sogs pa'i rigs dngos nyid //
T02D1180:47b-28: rnal 'byor dbang phyug spyod pa yis //
T02D1180:47b-29: gcig sogs phyi ru rgyu med pas //
T02D1180:47b-30: bsten cing de nyid thim pa ste //
T02D1180:47b-31: tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog //
T02D1180:47b-32: dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che //
T02D1180:47b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1180:47b-35: gzhan yang rang nyid stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1180:47b-36: snying rje tha mi dad pa la gnas te he ru kar byas la /
T02D1180:47b-37: phyi rol gyi skye bo gdul ba'i ched du rdul
T02D1180:47b-38: tshon la sogs pa gang dag kha dog lngar gnas
T02D1180:47b-39: pa de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa lnga
T02D1180:47b-40: 'am drug gi yon tan dang ldan par bstan pas
T02D1180:47b-41: kyang gdul bar dka' ba'i skye bo 'dul la /
T02D1180:47b-42: mos par 'gyur ba de bas rigs lnga dag dang mnyam par ldan pa bstan par bya ba dang /
T02D1180:47b-43: de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid pas kha dog dkar po //
T02D1180:47b-44: rigs dang tshon thams cad par bsdus te /
T02D1180:47b-45: bstan par bya ba yin pas /
T02D1180:47b-46: rigs gcig tu ni rnam par brtag / ces bya ba dang /
T02D1180:47b-47: de bzhin du de ltar bstan pa de dag kyang
T02D1180:48a-0: sngags kyi tshul gyis las kyi dang por @48a *
T02D1180:48a-2: nyan thos kyi lam la gnas pa dang /
T02D1180:48a-3: rang rgyal ba'i lam la gnas pa dang /
T02D1180:48a-4: mu stegs byed pa la gsang zhing sba bar bya ba yin te /
T02D1180:48a-5: de bas na kha dog du ma nyid kyis ni /
T02D1180:48a-6: gang phyir bye brag mtshon mi bya //
T02D1180:48a-8: gzhan yang spyod pa'i mchog byed pas /
T02D1180:48a-9: sems can rnams kyi don du nang gi ma rungs
T02D1180:48a-10: pa'i sems kyis dpa' bo he ru kar bsgrubs la
T02D1180:48a-11: / kha dog ste rigs lnga'i bdag nyid du gnas par bya ste /
T02D1180:48a-16: gdol pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1180:48a-17: de rnams kyi nang du de rnams dang mthun pa'i lus su bsgyur la /
T02D1180:48a-18: spyod pa bstan par bya ba dang /
T02D1180:48a-19: de rnams kyi nang du song ste /
T02D1180:48a-20: rang rang gi rigs rnams sun phyung la rigs thams
T02D1180:48a-21: cad rdo rje'i rigs su rigs gcig par bsgrub par
T02D1180:48a-22: bya ba dang / de bzhin du rje'i rigs kyi
T02D1180:48a-23: nang du rigs bzhi po mtshon par bya ba sbas
T02D1180:48a-24: bya ba dang / te / de nyid dang mthun par zhugs te gdul ba'i chos bstan pa dang /
T02D1180:48a-25: de bzhin du rigs thams cad kyi nang du phan
T02D1180:48a-26: tshun mi rigs par bya zhing chos bstan pa dang
T02D1180:48a-27: / de bzhin du las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par
T02D1180:48a-28: bya ba'i ched du yang 'jig rten pa'i kha na
T02D1180:48a-29: ma tho ba spang bar bya ba'i rgyus rigs gzhan
T02D1180:48a-30: gyi lus su bsgyur te las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub
T02D1180:48a-32: rigs ni du ma nyid dag gis //
T02D1180:48a-33: gang phyir bye brag mtshon mi bya //
T02D1180:48a-35: 'di rnams kyi nges pa'i don ni rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D1180:48a-36: nyid na gsal te de bas na de la 'jug
T02D1180:48a-37: par bya'o // de yang ji skad du /
T02D1180:48a-38: stong nyid he ru kar sbyor bas //
T02D1180:48a-39: sa chu me rlung nam mkha' zhes //
T02D1180:48a-40: khu ba rlung gnyis gnas pa la //
T02D1180:48a-41: mi phyed lam du bcug byas pa //
T02D1180:48a-42: dus mtha'i me yis thal bar byed //
T02D1180:48a-43: nam mkha' bzhin du mtshon du med //
T02D1180:48a-45: gang du stong pa zhes bya ba'i lam la gnas
T02D1180:48a-46: na ye shes kyi gzi brjid mched par 'gyur la
T02D1180:48a-47: / gzi brjid des khu ba'i rigs rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D1180:48a-48: rlung gi rigs rnam pa lnga po ro mnyam zhing gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa nyid /
T02D1180:48a-49: mtshon du med cing tha dad pa'i rang bzhin spangs
T02D1180:48a-50: pa las gsungs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges
T02D1180:48a-51: pa'o // gzhan du na sems rtse gcig par mi
T02D1180:48a-52: gnas pas khu ba dang gci ba dang bshang ba
T02D1180:48b-0: rigs tha dad @48b par gnas shing bye brag tha dad pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1180:48b-1: da ni sgrub pa po'i gnas kyi khyad par brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1180:48b-4: shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang //
T02D1180:48b-5: ma mo'i khyim dang mtshan dus sam //
T02D1180:48b-6: yang na dben pa'am bas mtha' ru //
T02D1180:48b-7: de ru bsgom pa bzang bar brjod //
T02D1180:48b-8: zhes bya ba'i don ni phyi dang nang gi bye brag gis phye la shes par bya'o //
T02D1180:48b-9: de yang re zhig phyi'i ni las dang po pa'i
T02D1180:48b-10: sgrub pa po bdag yid nyams dga' zhing skye bo'i
T02D1180:48b-11: 'du 'dzis dben pa'i sa phyogs su bsgrubs na dngos
T02D1180:48b-12: grub kyi mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T02D1180:48b-13: gnas de dag kyang mi ma yin pa gnas pa'i shing gcig skyes pa dang /
T02D1180:48b-14: ma mo'i khyim zhes bya ba gnod sbyin mo dang sha za mo gang na gnas pa dang /
T02D1180:48b-15: dben pa'am bas mtha' ste yang na de las gzhan
T02D1180:48b-16: pa'i mi ma yin pa gang du 'du ba'i gnas
T02D1180:48b-17: mi rgod la sogs pas dben ba'i gnas de ru
T02D1180:48b-18: rnal 'byor pa 'khod la sems can thams cad la
T02D1180:48b-19: snying rje chen po bskyed de /
T02D1180:48b-20: de na gnas pa'i mi ma yin pa rnams la gtor ma dus gsum du btang zhing /
T02D1180:48b-21: mi ma yin pa de dag la 'di skad ces
T02D1180:48b-22: kho bo 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig byed kyis
T02D1180:48b-23: / de dang de khyed kyis bsgrub par rigs so zhes yang dang yang du bsgo ba na /
T02D1180:48b-24: mi ma yin pa de dag gis kyang sgrub pa
T02D1180:48b-25: po la mngon par dga' bas las de sgrub par
T02D1180:48b-26: byed la de grub pas gdod 'gro ba'i don byed
T02D1180:48b-28: gnas 'di'i nges pa'i don ji skad du /
T02D1180:48b-30: rang lus ri bo mchog yin te //
T02D1180:48b-31: de las skyes pa'i shing chen gang //
T02D1180:48b-32: rtse mos lha rnams smin byed cing //
T02D1180:48b-33: rtsa bas klu sogs smin par byed //
T02D1180:48b-34: yal ga de yis mi la sogs //
T02D1180:48b-35: yongs su smin byed shing de yin //
T02D1180:48b-36: de ru gnas par rab tu brjod //
T02D1180:48b-37: gang du dbugs ni mi rgyu ba //
T02D1180:48b-38: de ni dur khrod ces su bshad //
T02D1180:48b-39: ma mo'i khyim ni stong pa nyid //
T02D1180:48b-40: seng ge rnam rol phyag rgya'o //
T02D1180:48b-41: mtshan ma'i spras pas mi brdzi zhing //
T02D1180:48b-42: rtogs par dka' bas mtshan mo yin //
T02D1180:48b-43: sa bon yi ge phyag mtshan dang //
T02D1180:48b-44: kha dog dbyibs dang rigs mi mnga' //
T02D1180:48b-45: phyag rgya sbyin sreg gtor mas dben //
T02D1180:48b-46: dben pa'am bas mtha' de yin la //
T02D1180:48b-47: bsgom pa bzang po 'ang de nyid yin //
T02D1180:48b-48: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1180:48b-49: spyod par nus pa'i tshad bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1180:48b-50: cung zad drod ni thob pa na //
T02D1180:49a-3: 'dis ni spyod pa spyad pa nyid //
T02D1180:49a-5: 'di'i don yang rtsa ba'i rgyud nyid la 'jug par bya ste /
T02D1180:49a-7: gal te spyod pa byed 'dod pa //
T02D1180:49a-8: yan lag drug sbyor gang yin de //
T02D1180:49a-9: du ba smig rgyu la sogs pa'i //
T02D1180:49a-10: drod ni dang por bskyed par bya //
T02D1180:49a-12: 'di'i don ni yang rnal 'byor pas sems can gyi
T02D1180:49a-13: don du spyod pa byed par 'dod pa rnams kyis
T02D1180:49a-14: // dang po du ba dang smig rgyu la sogs
T02D1180:49a-15: pa rnams kyis drod bskyed nas spyod pa la 'jug
T02D1180:49a-16: // par bya'o // gzhan du na 'jig rten pa'i bzhad gang du 'gyur ro //
T02D1180:49a-17: des skyes bu 'dod chags can rnams gdul bar bya'i ched du /
T02D1180:49a-18: 'pho ba med pa'i ye shes nyams su blangs la /
T02D1180:49a-20: shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma //
T02D1180:49a-21: rang gis dbang bskur snying rje can //
T02D1180:49a-22: btsun mo rdo rje'i rigs bzung la //
T02D1180:49a-23: spyod pa bya bar brtag par bya //
T02D1180:49a-24: rdo rje rigs kyi dngos med na /
T02D1180:49a-25: rang 'dod lha yi rigs kyis bya //
T02D1180:49a-27: 'di'i don yang gdol pa'i rigs las byung ba'i bu
T02D1180:49a-28: mo skyes bu gzhan gyis reg par bya ba ma
T02D1180:49a-29: yin pa'am / yang na rigs gang yang rung ste
T02D1180:49a-30: gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa la byang chub kyi
T02D1180:49a-31: sa bon gyis sbyangs te zhes bya ba rang gi
T02D1180:49a-32: de la mi dad pa med par snyoms par 'jug
T02D1180:49a-34: bde ba'i byang chub kyi sems des de'i sems sbyangs la /
T02D1180:49a-35: de dang lhan cig kun du 'gro bar bya zhing
T02D1180:49a-36: rdo rje'i glu la sogs pas skyes bu 'dod chags
T02D1180:49a-38: don yod grub pa'i rigs las byung ba'i gar bya
T02D1180:49a-39: ba ste de ni rgyud bsdus pa 'di nyid las
T02D1180:49a-40: ji skad du / gal te dga' bas glu blangs te //
T02D1180:49a-41: de tshe rdo rje mchog dang ldan //
T02D1180:49a-42: gal te dga' ba skyes pa na //
T02D1180:49a-43: thar pa'i rgyus ni gar bya'o //
T02D1180:49a-44: de tshe rdo rje rkang pas gar //
T02D1180:49a-45: rnal 'byor mnyam par gzhag par bya //
T02D1180:49a-46: zhes bya ba gsungs pa la /
T02D1180:49a-47: 'di'i nges pa'i don yang 'bum phrag lnga pa las /
T02D1180:49a-49: stong nyid ma skyes zhi ba ni //
T02D1180:49a-50: bud med ces su de brjod cing //
T02D1180:49a-51: rtsa yi mdud pa bcu drug nas //
T02D1180:49a-52: bde ba'i thig le bcu drug 'byung //
T02D1180:49a-53: bcu drug lo yang de yin la //
T02D1180:49a-54: sems kyi sbyangs pa'ang de yin no //
T02D1180:49a-55: de bzhin du bde ba'i nga ro ni glu dang bde bas g-yo ba'i gar dang /
T02D1180:49b-0: bde ba'i rim pas 'gro ba'i @49b rkang pa dang ldan pas gnas par bya ba ste /
T02D1180:49b-1: rnal 'byor mnyam par gzhag par bya //
T02D1180:49b-2: zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i don to //
T02D1180:49b-4: 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyod pa //
T02D1180:49b-6: ska rags la ni don yod gnas //
T02D1180:49b-7: zhes bya ba'i don ni sngar bstan pa nyid do //
T02D1180:49b-8: de las gzhan pa'i don rnams ni 'di lta ste /
T02D1180:49b-9: kha tv'am gzugs kyi shes rab dang //
T02D1180:49b-10: thabs kyi gzugs kyi cang te'u nyid //
T02D1180:49b-12: kha ni nam mkha'i gzugs can no //
T02D1180:49b-13: tv'am ni dka' thub kyi gnas pa yin la //
T02D1180:49b-14: bsdus pa'i don gyis chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du gnas zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02D1180:49b-15: da ma ru'i sgra ni khams gsum du sems can
T02D1180:49b-16: thams cad la cig car du chos kyi 'khor lo
T02D1180:49b-18: de bas na kha tv'am gdang cang te'u gzung ba
T02D1180:49b-19: nyid la nyon mongs pa lam zhe sdang skyed cing
T02D1180:49b-20: dbugs phyir rgyu ba dang nang du 'jug pa dang
T02D1180:49b-21: gnas gsum ni aa li da k'a li nyid de
T02D1180:49b-23: glu ni rnam dag sngags su gsungs //
T02D1180:49b-24: gar ni bsgom par bya ba nyid //
T02D1180:49b-25: de yi phyir na glu dang gar //
T02D1180:49b-26: rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bya //
T02D1180:49b-29: sman ni rnam par bza' ba ste /
T02D1180:49b-30: chu ni rtag tu btung ba nyid //
T02D1180:49b-31: ces bya ba yang rnam pa gnyis su rtogs par bya ste /
T02D1180:49b-32: phyir ni 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi don du dri chen dang /
T02D1180:49b-33: dri chu rnams sbyang ba dang spel ba la sogs pa byas la /
T02D1180:49b-34: rtog pa med pas bza' ba yin la de'i stobs kyis /
T02D1180:49b-35: rga shis dril gyis mi non cing //
T02D1180:49b-37: nges pa'i don ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1180:49b-39: g-yon pa'i steng 'og shes rab thabs //
T02D1180:49b-41: g-yas pa'i steng 'og shes rab thabs //
T02D1180:49b-44: des rga shis dril gyis mi non cing //
T02D1180:49b-45: rtag tu bsrung bar 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1180:49b-46: zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i don yin la //
T02D1180:49b-47: gzhan du na phyi'i dri chen dang dri chu zos
T02D1180:49b-48: shing 'thungs pas ni rga shis zil gyis mi non
T02D1180:49b-49: par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te 'jig rten pa rnams
T02D1180:49b-50: kyis kyang dpya bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni nges
T02D1180:49b-51: pa'o // gzhan yang rkun ma'i skra las cod pan byas la //
T02D1180:49b-52: de la h'um byung sbyar bar bya //
T02D1180:49b-53: sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa rnams //
T02D1180:50a-2: / thod pa sor lnga pa yi char //
T02D1180:50a-3: byas pas cod pan 'dzin par byed //
T02D1180:50a-4: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las //
T02D1180:50a-5: skra yi ska rags nyis skor nyid //
T02D1180:50a-6: thal ba skra yi mchod phyir thogs //
T02D1180:50a-9: dge ba'i chos thams cad dbrog par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1180:50a-10: rkun ma'i skra zhes bya ba'i rtsa las cod pan du brda bya ba dang /
T02D1180:50a-11: de ru h'um las yongs su byung ba'i rdo rje rgya gram yongs su bzung ba ste /
T02D1180:50a-12: sems can gyi don sna tshogs pa byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1180:50a-13: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D1180:50a-14: rnam pa nyi shu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
T02D1180:50a-15: pa'i tshul gyis gang ba dang bzang po la sogs
T02D1180:50a-16: pa zla ba yar do'i lnga tshan rnams kyang yin
T02D1180:50a-17: la / de'i phyir aa ai ri au li zhes bya bas dang /
T02D1180:50a-21: nam mkha'i chos can du shes par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1180:50a-22: sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa rnams //
T02D1180:50a-23: zhes bya ba sogs pa dang /
T02D1180:50a-24: thod pa sor lnga pa'i cha zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs so //
T02D1180:50a-25: de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i lha nga rgyal can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i don du /
T02D1180:50a-26: mi ro'i skra'i ska rags nyis skor dang /
T02D1180:50a-27: dbang phyug chen po'i brtul zhugs kyi ched du thal bas lus la byugs pa dang /
T02D1180:50a-28: tshangs pa'i brtul zhugs kyi ched du mi ro'i skra'i tshangs skud dang /
T02D1180:50a-29: lha rnams kyi dga' ba'i rtsed mo'i ched du cang te'u gzung ba dang /
T02D1180:50a-30: dbang phyug chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi ched du kha tv'am ga gzung ba dang /
T02D1180:50a-31: thod pa'i dum bus brtul zhugs kyi ched du rdo rje'i thod pa gzung bar bya ba ste /

T02D1180:53a-58: la rgyug par byed pa grong la brten pa'i lha

T02D1180:53a-60: yin la / ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang //
T02D1180:53b-0: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir @53b nang gi gnas ni lus
T02D1180:53b-1: la rtsa'i gzugs kyis gnas par gsungs te de las
T02D1180:53b-3: de yang lus la ni dz'a la ndha ra zhes
T02D1180:53b-4: pa nas skyed tshal rab rdzing bu'i 'gram zhes pa
T02D1180:53b-6: rtsa ba'i rgyud las ji skad du /
T02D1180:53b-7: spyi bo dang ni spyi gtsug dang //
T02D1180:53b-8: rna ba g-yas pa rtsi ba logs dang //
T02D1180:53b-9: de bzhin sna tshogs smin dbus dang //
T02D1180:53b-10: lag pa mchan khung dag dang ni //
T02D1180:53b-11: nu ma gnyis dang lte ba dang /
T02D1180:53b-12: sna rtse dang ni kha yi lam //
T02D1180:53b-13: phrag gong gnyis dang pho mtshan dang //
T02D1180:53b-14: rtags dang bshang lam brang gi gnas //
T02D1180:53b-15: byin pa dang ni sor mo dang /
T02D1180:53b-16: rkang pa'i bo la dang mthe bong dang //
T02D1180:53b-17: pus mo rnams su go rims bzhin //
T02D1180:53b-18: gnas dang sa sogs blta bar bya //
T02D1180:53b-20: de bas na de'i phyir sems can rnams la spyod
T02D1180:53b-21: pa dang grol ba'i 'bras bu ster ba'i lha mo
T02D1180:53b-22: dang gnas 'di rnams ni lus can thams cad kyi
T02D1180:53b-23: lus nyid la rtsa dang khu ba'i gzugs kyi gnas
T02D1180:53b-24: so // da ni nyi ma'i dus kyi khyad par brjod pa'i phyir /
T02D1180:53b-25: rnal 'byor ma rgyud kyi rdo rjer //
T02D1180:53b-27: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D1180:53b-28: nyin mo'i dus kyang rab bshad bya //
T02D1180:53b-29: zhes bya ba la 'dir nyi ma'i dus ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1180:53b-31: de la phyi'i zla ba mar gyi ngo'i bcu bzhi
T02D1180:53b-32: la sogs pa la grong gi lha mo rnams gong
T02D1180:53b-33: du brjod pa'i phyi'i gnas rnams su lus can thams

T02D1180:53b-35: yin la / nang du ni khu ba dang rlung
T02D1180:53b-36: la sogs pa dbugs dang chu srang dang chu tshod
T02D1180:53b-37: la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi gnas su 'phro zhing
T02D1180:53b-39: de bzhin du dngos grub gnyis la 'dun pa'i rnal
T02D1180:53b-40: 'byor pas kyang phyi dang nang gi bye brag shes

T02D1180:53b-44: dpa' bo'i ston mo la sogs pa la 'du bar bya ba yin no //

T02D1180:53b-46: gang lags zhes bya ba smos te phyi dang nang

T02D1180:53b-48: mar gyi ngo yi bcu bzhi dang /
T02D1180:53b-49: de bzhin du yang brgyad pa nyid //
T02D1180:53b-51: mar ngo'i bcu bzhi ni nyi shu rtsa dgu'o //
T02D1180:53b-52: de bzhin du mar ngo'i brgyad ni nyi shu rtsa gsum mo //
T02D1180:54a-0: de yang nges pa'i don ni rtsa ba'i rgyud nyid la 'jug par @54a * //
T02D1180:54a-3: byang chub sems kyi zla ba 'di //
T02D1180:54a-4: yar ngo mar ngo rab tu gnas //
T02D1180:54a-5: yar ngo yis ni skyed byed ma //
T02D1180:54a-6: mar ngo yis ni 'joms byed ma //
T02D1180:54a-7: mar ngo'i bcu bzhi la sogs kyis //
T02D1180:54a-8: byang chub sems kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1180:54a-10: 'di ni nges pa'i don du bshad //
T02D1180:54a-12: gzhan yang bza' ba gsungs pa ni /
T02D1180:54a-13: rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnun nyid //
T02D1180:54a-14: lan bdun pa yang bza' bar bya //
T02D1180:54a-16: rgyal mtshan ni rgyal pos rkun po la sogs pa
T02D1180:54a-17: skyes pa'am bud med 'ga' zhig chad pas bcad de
T02D1180:54a-18: / lus mtshon gyis dral nas ro shing la dpyangs te gzhag pa'o //
T02D1180:54a-19: lan bdun pa ni 'di na skyes pa'am bud med
T02D1180:54a-20: 'ga' zhig skye ba bdun du mi'i lus su brgyud
T02D1180:54a-21: pa yin la / de'i mtshan nyid kyang grib ma bdun du 'byung ba dang /
T02D1180:54a-23: dpral ba la gnyer ma gsum yod pa dang /
T02D1180:54a-24: lus la dri zhim po 'byung ba la sogs pa
T02D1180:54a-25: nyid yin te de lta bu thong na phyag tu
T02D1180:54a-26: me tog dag phul te bskor ba byas la 'di
T02D1180:54a-27: skad ces rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po da
T02D1180:54a-28: ni bdag cag lta bu'i don bgyi ba'i dus la

T02D1180:54a-31: rgya shug gi tshig gu tsam gyi rim lur byas
T02D1180:54a-32: 'gyur ro // te / bdag cag thams cad kyis
T02D1180:54a-33: bza' bar bya zhing sems can thams cad la khyed
T02D1180:54a-35: de ni mkha' la spyod pa'i dngos grub ster ba yin no //
T02D1180:54a-36: de bzhin sha phal pa rgyal mtshan mtshon dang bsnun
T02D1180:54a-37: pa la sogs pa'i sha ni sbyang ba dang spel
T02D1180:54a-38: ba la sogs pa byas la ril bur byas te
T02D1180:54a-39: thos pas kyang gnyer ma dang skra dkar la sogs
T02D1180:54a-41: 'di dag gi nges pa'i don yang 'bum phrag lnga pa las /
T02D1180:54a-43: rtsa yi shing gzugs las sbyangs pa'i //
T02D1180:54a-44: lus kyi rgyal mtshan mchog 'di yis //
T02D1180:54a-45: byang chub sems kyi sha zos na //
T02D1180:54a-48: lan bdun pa yi nges pa'i don ni ji skad du /
T02D1180:54a-49: gang yang lus can thams cad kyi //
T02D1180:54a-50: lus 'di skye ba bdun yin te //
T02D1180:54a-51: ro drug ldan pa'i bza' btung dag / kun du zos shing 'thungs pa las //
T02D1180:54a-52: zhu zhing bcud ni rgyas pa de //
T02D1180:54b-0: skye ba dang @54b por de brjod do //
T02D1180:54b-1: de nas de la khrag 'byung ba //
T02D1180:54b-2: skye ba gnyis par rab tu brjod //
T02D1180:54b-3: de las sha byung gsum pa ste /
T02D1180:54b-4: pags par gyur pa bzhi pa dang //
T02D1180:54b-5: rtsa ru gyur pa lnga pa'o //
T02D1180:54b-6: de las rus pa drug pa ste //
T02D1180:54b-7: zhag dang rkang mar bdun pa'o //
T02D1180:54b-10: 'bad pas snying rje bskyed pa yis //
T02D1180:54b-11: gsad par bya ba brjod pa nyid //
T02D1180:54b-12: snying rje med na mi 'grub pas //
T02D1180:54b-13: de phyir snying rje bskyed par bya //
T02D1180:54b-15: phyi dang nang gi dbye bas re zhig gi phyir ni /
T02D1180:54b-16: mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang //
T02D1180:54b-17: sangs rgyas bstan pa 'khrug byed pa //
T02D1180:54b-18: zhe sdang rigs ni ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D1180:54b-19: re zhig tsam zhig gsad bya yis //
T02D1180:54b-20: rnam pa kun du gzhom mi bya //
T02D1180:54b-21: de ste kun du gsang byas nas //
T02D1180:54b-22: rnal 'byor dam tshig las nyams phyir //
T02D1180:54b-23: grub pa nam yang yod mi srid //
T02D1180:54b-24: ces bya ba ste des ni gdug pa can thams cad thul bar 'gyur //
T02D1180:54b-25: de bas na gdug pa can thams cad gzhug pa ste zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D1180:54b-26: gzhan yang nges pa'i don ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las ji skad du /
T02D1180:54b-27: steng dang 'og gi srog chen po //
T02D1180:54b-28: rnal 'byor chen pos gsad cing gso //
T02D1180:54b-29: de min srog chags mi gsod de //

T02D1180:54b-33: cho ga'i gtso bos dgag par bya //
T02D1180:54b-35: phyi nang gi srog gnyis char la khyab pa yin te /
T02D1180:54b-36: phyi ni bde stong rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis dgag par byas la /
T02D1180:54b-37: nang du stong pa chen pos dgag par bya'o //
T02D1180:54b-38: gzhan yang nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i dus thabs dang shes rab kyi char brtag par bya ste /
T02D1180:54b-40: nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02D1180:54b-41: shes rab mtshan mor brtag par bya //
T02D1180:54b-44: gang zhig zhes rab dngos med de //
T02D1180:54b-45: dngos po thabs su brtag par bya //
T02D1180:54b-47: 'di'i nges pa'i don yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las ji skad du /
T02D1180:54b-48: g-yas g-yon nyi zla'i mtshan nyid can //
T02D1180:54b-49: bsil dang tsha bar byed pa de ;
T02D1180:54b-50: / gang de skyon yon gnyis kyang yin //
T02D1180:54b-51: de ni thabs dang shes rab bo //
T02D1180:54b-54: mi bya cung zad yod ma yin //
T02D1180:54b-55: rtag tu mi bza' yod ma yin //
T02D1180:54b-56: 'di la mi bsam pa yang med //
T02D1180:54b-57: bzad dam ngan zhes mi smra med //
T02D1180:55a-0: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba 'di dag thams cad rang @55a * //
T02D1180:55a-1: las yongs su byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1180:55a-3: ji ltar bdag nyid de ltar gzhan //
T02D1180:55a-4: de bzhin bdag dngos mchog yin te //
T02D1180:55a-5: zhes bya ba rang gi rang bzhin ji lta ba
T02D1180:55a-6: bzhin du shes pa na khams gsum gyi 'khor los
T02D1180:55a-7: sgyur ba gcig po yang yin no //
T02D1180:55a-10: bza' dang btung ba la sogs spyad //
T02D1180:55a-11: yan lag ji snyed bsgyur ba dang //
T02D1180:55a-12: tshig rnams rab tu nyed pa nyid //
T02D1180:55a-13: he ru ka dpal gnas bzhugs pas //
T02D1180:55a-14: de snyed sngags dang phyag rgyar brjod //
T02D1180:55a-18: gzhan dag lha dang dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1180:55a-19: btsal bas nam yang mi rnyed ces //
T02D1180:55a-20: 'dren pa dpa' bos rab tu gsungs //
T02D1180:55a-21: shr'i ni gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D1180:55a-22: zhes pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal gnyi ga'i char mi 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1180:55a-23: he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid //
T02D1180:55a-25: las dang ye shes dang phyag rgya bcing ba dang
T02D1180:55a-26: gtor ma la sogs pa'i rgyu dang bral ba'i ting
T02D1180:55a-28: ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid //
T02D1180:55a-30: kun du brtags pa'i mtshan nyid las grol ba'i bde ba nyid de /
T02D1180:55a-31: gang de ji ltar bsgrub snyam pa la /
T02D1180:55a-32: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa //
T02D1180:55a-34: tshogs pa dang dmigs pa'i chos las bral ba phan
T02D1180:55a-35: tshun du ltos pa med pas bsgrub par gsungs so
T02D1180:55a-36: // de bas na he ru ka'o //
T02D1180:55a-38: rdo rje thod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1180:55a-40: lus skyong ba'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
T02D1180:55a-41: skye bo gang dang gang rnams kyi //
T02D1180:55a-42: sha ni mkhas pas bza' byas na //
T02D1180:55a-43: sems can de de dbang du 'gyur //
T02D1180:55a-45: rnal 'byor pa bdag gis lus skyong ba'i rnal 'byor mngon du byas na /
T02D1180:55a-46: sangs rgyas rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur na /
T02D1180:55a-47: 'jig rten gsum na gnas pa'i skye bo phal pa
T02D1180:55a-48: rnams ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin byed pa smos kyang
T02D1180:55a-49: ci dgos // gzhan du na rnal 'byor pas bud
T02D1180:55a-50: med kyi skye bo rnams la 'jug pa na byang
T02D1180:55a-51: chub sems kyi sha phyi rol du mi gtang bar
T02D1180:55a-52: zos na rang gi lus la dbang du 'gyur te
T02D1180:55a-53: ci dgos // / de ni rnal 'byor pa mkhas pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1180:55a-54: kye rdo rje'i nges pa'i don gyi rgya cher bshad pa las /
T02D1180:55b-0: brda dang gnas gtan la phab pa'i le'u'i @55b rgya cher bshad pa ste bdun pa'o /
T02D1180:55b-2: // / byang chub sems ni zla bar 'gyur //
T02D1180:55b-3: cha shas bco lnga'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1180:55b-5: mi yi gzugs kyi tshul bsgyur nas //
T02D1180:55b-6: 'jig rten gsum po dbang du mdzad //
T02D1180:55b-7: de la gus pas rab btud nas //
T02D1180:55b-8: bdag med dkyil 'khor rgyas bshad ni //
T02D1180:55b-9: rdo rje snying pos bri bar bya //
T02D1180:55b-10: de nas rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1180:55b-11: rnal 'byor ma ni zla ba mar ngo'i chos can
T02D1180:55b-12: tshes bco lnga po mun pa'i rdul med par byed
T02D1180:55b-13: la / snang ba'i rdul ni 'joms par byed cing
T02D1180:55b-14: 'khor ba'i byang chub kyi sems kha thur du bltas
T02D1180:55b-15: pa gang yin pa de la brjod par bya'o //
T02D1180:55b-16: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las ji skad du /
T02D1180:55b-17: sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis //
T02D1180:55b-18: dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum du brtags //
T02D1180:55b-19: dang por dgyes pa'i rdo rje nyid //
T02D1180:55b-20: sku yi dkyil 'khor zhes su brjod //
T02D1180:55b-21: de rjes bdag med ma bshad pa //
T02D1180:55b-22: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin par gsungs //
T02D1180:55b-23: de rjes ku ru ku lle bshad //
T02D1180:55b-26: da ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo bshad par rigs so //
T02D1180:55b-27: nam mkha' khams su bha ga bsam //
T02D1180:55b-28: dbus su rnam par bsgom pa ni //
T02D1180:55b-29: 'khor lo sngon du ci rigs par //
T02D1180:55b-30: lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid //
T02D1180:55b-32: 'di'i don yang sngon du 'gro ba'i srung ba'i 'khor
T02D1180:55b-33: lo la sogs pa ni he ru ka bskyed pa
T02D1180:55b-34: nyid kyi dus su bstan pa las shes pa nyid
T02D1180:55b-35: du bya'o // 'dir ni gnad kyi gnas tsam zhig
T02D1180:55b-36: bstan par bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings su zhes
T02D1180:55b-37: bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
T02D1180:55b-38: rang gi bdag po mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D1180:55b-39: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na zhes pa la sogs
T02D1180:55b-40: pa'i tshul gyis snod dang bcud sbyang ba byas la
T02D1180:55b-41: / chos thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ltar mos par bya ste /
T02D1180:55b-42: de'i rjes la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
T02D1180:55b-44: thugs mtshon par bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings der
T02D1180:55b-45: yi ge ae'i dbyibs lta bu dpag tshad rgya khyon
T02D1180:55b-46: dpag tu med par bsgoms la de'i nang du 'khor
T02D1180:55b-47: lo sngon du ci rigs par zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1180:55b-48: to // sa dang chu dang me dang rlung //
T02D1180:55b-49: zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor rim gyis bskyed la /
T02D1180:56a-0: @56a * // de dag yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1180:56a-1: bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sgo bzhi dang rta babs dang ldan pa bsams te /
T02D1180:56a-2: 'phar ma gnyis dag skyon med pa //
T02D1180:56a-4: yul dang yul can gyi lha mo'i tshul gyis 'phar ma gnyis su bcad cing /
T02D1180:56a-6: zhes bya ba ze 'bru dang nang gi 'phar ma
T02D1180:56a-7: la ni phung po lnga rnam par dag pa'i lha
T02D1180:56a-8: mo ste / sngon du brjod pa'i stong pa chen po yi ge lnga'i chos can no //
T02D1180:56a-9: gang yang de ni rang bzhin chen po lnga zhes
T02D1180:56a-10: kyang brjod la 'phar ma phyi ma rnams ni phyi
T02D1180:56a-13: gru gsum la ni phyi ma brjod //
T02D1180:56a-15: de dbus ro ni bco lnga yi //
T02D1180:56a-16: gdan gyi bdag nyid rnam par bsam //
T02D1180:56a-18: khams thams cad srog gi rlung la zhon nas rgyu ba'i phyir /
T02D1180:56a-19: phyi rol du ro ru brtags so //
T02D1180:56a-20: de yi steng du zla ba yin //
T02D1180:56a-21: zla ba'i steng du sa bon nyid //
T02D1180:56a-22: ces bya ba ni ji skad du /
T02D1180:56a-24: dang po khu ba pha las 'byung //
T02D1180:56a-25: rnam shes rlung ldan der 'jug ste //
T02D1180:56a-26: de la ma yi khrag gis sbyar //
T02D1180:56a-27: don 'di yis ni bskyed rim bstan //
T02D1180:56a-29: ro dang zla ba dang sa bon dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis mnan par gsungs so //
T02D1180:56a-30: gnyis 'dus pa las bde chen po ;
T02D1180:56a-31: / zhes pa ni khu ba dang khrag gi rang bzhin dang srog 'byung 'jug gi rim pa dang /
T02D1180:56a-32: la la n'a dang ra sa n'a 'dom pa dang steng 'og gnyis 'dom pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1180:56a-33: a'a li zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas //
T02D1180:56a-34: k'a li'i gzugs kyis snang byed do //

T02D1180:56a-38: k'a lis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor srog 'gro ba'i tshul
T02D1180:56a-39: du bsam pa ni drang ba dang nges pa'i don
T02D1180:56a-40: to // zla ba nyi ma 'dus pa las //
T02D1180:56a-42: nyi zla'i rang bzhin dang rnam par shes pa gsum 'dus pa las so //
T02D1180:56a-43: dkar mo la sogs rab tu grags //
T02D1180:56a-45: phyi rol du ni bcud kyi srid bskyed pa dang /
T02D1180:56a-46: nang du dam pa'i srid pa skyed pa zhes grags so //
T02D1180:56a-47: de ni dkar mo la sogs pa'i lha mo bco
T02D1180:56a-48: lnga'i bdag nyid thams cad tshul de ltar skye zhes
T02D1180:56a-50: zla ba ye shes me long ldan //
T02D1180:56a-51: rta bdun pa ni mnyam nyid ldan //
T02D1180:56a-52: rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ni //
T02D1180:56b-0: @56b so sor rtog par brjod par bya //
T02D1180:56b-1: thams cad gcig gyur nan tan nyid //
T02D1180:56b-2: rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa'o //
T02D1180:56b-6: chu yis yongs su smin par byed pa dang /

T02D1180:63a-17: gang de ni mes po chen pos bkag ste /
T02D1180:63a-19: thams cad rig byed grub mtha' dang //
T02D1180:63a-20: de bzhin las rgyas la sogs pas //
T02D1180:63a-21: srid par dag pa'i dngos grub min //
T02D1180:63a-22: slar zhing srid par skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1180:63a-26: de med pas na dngos grub med //
T02D1180:63a-27: ces bya ba ni 'di ltar brjod pa dang bral
T02D1180:63a-28: ba'i dngos grub kyis dman pa'i byis pa ni 'khyam
T02D1180:63a-30: de'i dbang gis sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad pa yang yin no //
T02D1180:63a-31: de bas na thar par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten
T02D1180:63a-32: pa'i dbang phyug chen po brgyad la sogs pa la
T02D1180:63a-33: 'dod cing zhen pas gnas par mi bya'o //
T02D1180:63a-34: gang gis mi shes kye rdo rje //
T02D1180:63a-35: zhes bya ba ni gong du bstan pa de lta bu kye'i rdo rje mi shes pa'o //
T02D1180:63a-36: de ni ngal ba don med 'gyur //
T02D1180:63a-38: gang gis spros pa'i mtshan ma mi mnga' ba'i kye'i
T02D1180:63a-39: rdo rje dang bral bas lus dang ngag dang yid
T02D1180:63a-40: kyi spyod pa bskal par bgrang ba las 'das par
T02D1180:63a-41: spyad kyang 'bras bu dang bral ba'o zhes bya'o //
T02D1180:63a-42: chu bo'i rgyun ltar rab 'bab pa //
T02D1180:63a-43: zhes pa ni nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba la
T02D1180:63a-44: sogs pa lam la gnas pa dag ni chu bo
T02D1180:63a-45: lta bu'o // gzhan du na byis pa rnams la
T02D1180:63a-46: nyin dang mtshan du chu bo gang+g'a'i rgyun kha 'og
T02D1180:63a-48: mtshan ma'i rtog pa byung ba yin no //
T02D1180:63b-0: mar me'i rtse mo @63b lta bur bcing //
T02D1180:63b-1: zhes pa ni de ltar lam gnyis la gnas pa'i
T02D1180:63b-2: rnal 'byor ba yang dmigs pa'i lam la gnas par
T02D1180:63b-3: 'gyur bas rang rang gi lam bcad pa yin no
T02D1180:63b-4: // de bzhin du kha thur du bltas pa'i chu
T02D1180:63b-5: bo yang mar me'i rtse mo ltar dbyer med pa'i
T02D1180:63b-6: lam du bsgyur par bya ste /
T02D1180:63b-7: chu bran mdog dang ro dang dbyibs tha dad pa
T02D1180:63b-8: gang+g'a si ta la sogs pa phyi'i dug can du
T02D1180:63b-9: chud pa na tha mi dad pa bzhin no //
T02D1180:63b-10: rtag tu de nyid rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1180:63b-11: nyin dang mtshan du rnam par gzhag / ces bya
T02D1180:63b-12: ba ni dngos po rnams ro gcig pa'i de kho
T02D1180:63b-13: na nyid la spyod lam thams cad du gzhag ces
T02D1180:63b-15: 'dir mang smras pas ci zhig bya //
T02D1180:63b-16: blo yi yul du gang gyur pa //
T02D1180:63b-17: de dag ro mnyam bsgom par bya //
T02D1180:63b-18: mkha' ltar khyab pa'i dngos grub 'byung //
T02D1180:63b-20: kye'i rdo rje nges pa'i don gyi rgya cher bshad pa las /
T02D1180:63b-21: rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'i rgya cher bshad pa ste brgyad pa'o /
T02D1180:63b-24: // / dngos med ngo bo las byung ba //
T02D1180:63b-25: rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1180:63b-26: rnam dag le'u rgyas bshad ni //
T02D1180:63b-27: rdo rje snying pos bri bar bya //
T02D1180:63b-28: 'di ltar ma sbyangs pa'i dug la sogs pa'i dngos po ni gsod par byed pa kho na bas /
T02D1180:63b-29: skyes bu blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis de sbyang ba'i rigs so //
T02D1180:63b-30: de bas 'di ltar gsang chen rnam pa gsum gyi tshul gyis /
T02D1180:63b-31: lus dang ngag dang yid rnam pa gsum rnam par dag par bya'o //
T02D1180:63b-32: de la re zhig / de nas mchog tu rnam
T02D1180:63b-33: par dag pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba
T02D1180:63b-34: ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo bshad pa'i rjes thogs
T02D1180:63b-35: su zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1180:63b-36: nges par dngos po thams cad kyi //
T02D1180:63b-37: zhes pa ni khams gsum pa'i dngos po thams cad do //
T02D1180:63b-38: dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod //
T02D1180:63b-39: ces pa ni dngos po'i dug sel bar byed pa'i
T02D1180:63b-40: sman mi 'gyur ba'i de bzhin nyid kho na yin
T02D1180:63b-41: no // de yang re zhig byis pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1180:63b-42: phyin nas re rer dbye ba yis //
T02D1180:63b-43: lha rnams kyis ni brjod par bya //
T02D1180:63b-44: zhes bya ba la bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs la /
T02D1180:63b-45: aom sh'u n+ya t'a zhes pa la sogs pas ni /
T02D1180:63b-46: nges par dngos po thams cad sbyong ba yin la //
T02D1180:63b-47: de bzhin du gzhal yas khang dang lha la sogs pas brtags pa ni drang ba'i don to //
T02D1180:64a-2: phya nas ra rer dbya [*dbye?] ba yis //
T02D1180:64a-3: lha rnams kyis ni brjod par bya //
T02D1180:64a-4: phung po lnga dang dbang po drug / skye mched drug dang 'byung chen lnga //
T02D1180:64a-5: rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par sbyang //
T02D1180:64a-7: mi rgyu ba'i khams rnams gzhal yas khang du brtag
T02D1180:64a-8: cad rgyu ba'i khams rnams lha ru brtag par ni
T02D1180:64a-9: re zhig rnam par sbyang ba'o //
T02D1180:64a-10: de las phung po lnga dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1180:64a-11: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du phung po
T02D1180:64a-12: lnga po rnam snang la sogs pa lnga ru sbyang
T02D1180:64a-13: ngo // de bzhin du dbang po dang skye mched dang 'byung ba chen po la sogs ba rnams /
T02D1180:64a-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02D1180:64a-15: rig ma lnga rnams su sbyang ngo //
T02D1180:64a-16: nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib sbyang bya //
T02D1180:64a-17: rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid //
T02D1180:64a-18: dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol min //
T02D1180:64a-19: zhes bya ba la sbyang bar bya ba'i dgos pa ni /
T02D1180:64a-20: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1180:64a-21: de la ji ltar dag par bya zhe na //
T02D1180:64a-22: rang rig bdag nyid ces bya ba smos te /
T02D1180:64a-23: gzugs la sogs pa ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med par shes pa gang yin pa ni /
T02D1180:64a-24: dag pa zhes de la brjod de //
T02D1180:64a-25: de ma rtogs pa gzhan gyis dag par mi bya ba ni nges pa'i don to //
T02D1180:64a-27: yul gyi dngos por dag pa'i phyir //
T02D1180:64a-28: rang gis rig pa'i bde ba'i mchog / gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams dang //
T02D1180:64a-29: gzhan yang rnal 'byor bas mthong ba //
T02D1180:64a-30: dngos po de kun dag pa ste //
T02D1180:64a-31: 'di ltar 'gro ba sangs rgyas bdag / ces bya
T02D1180:64a-32: ba la 'di ltar byis pa rnams kyis rtogs par
T02D1180:64a-33: bya ba'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa rnams ngo bo
T02D1180:64a-34: nyid kyis sangs rgyas gtso bo la sogs pa ste
T02D1180:64a-35: / 'di ltar gzugs rnam par snang mdzad ces pa la sogs pa'i tshig gis so //
T02D1180:64a-36: de'i phyir dpag bsam gyi shing dang /
T02D1180:64a-38: yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
T02D1180:64a-39: ral gri la sogs par snang zhing don byed pa'i
T02D1180:64a-40: yul rnam par sbyang ste byis pa rnams la drang
T02D1180:64a-41: bar gsungs so // kye bcom ldan 'das rnam par ma dag pa gang lags zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1180:64a-42: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje snying pos gsol ba btab pa /
T02D1180:64a-43: gong du bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs la sogs pa'i yul dang /
T02D1180:64b-0: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams ni gdod @64b nas sangs rgyas lags na /
T02D1180:64b-1: de las gzhan pa'i dngos po gnyis pa bdag gis ma mthong zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1180:64b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje snying po'i lan du'o //
T02D1180:64b-3: gzugs la sogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni gzugs la
T02D1180:64b-4: sogs pa 'di nyid byis pa rnams la rnam par
T02D1180:64b-5: ma dag pa yin te 'di ltar gsod pa'i phyir
T02D1180:64b-6: ro zhes pa'o // de ci'i slang du zhe na
T02D1180:64b-7: zhes pa ni rdo rje snying po slar gsol pa'o
T02D1180:64b-8: ro zhes pa'o // // gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i
T02D1180:64b-9: dngos po'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni byis pa'i
T02D1180:64b-10: skye bo rnams bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin te /
T02D1180:64b-11: 'di ltar skyes bu rang bzhin du 'dzin cing /
T02D1180:64b-13: de bzhin du sgra dang snyan dngags dang byed pa'i
T02D1180:64b-14: tshig la sogs par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs
T02D1180:64b-15: so // kye bcom ldan 'das gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gang lags zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1180:64b-16: gang gis gang la ji ltar 'dzin //
T02D1180:64b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes pa ni lan du'o //
T02D1180:64b-19: mig gis gzugs la 'dzin par byed //
T02D1180:64b-20: sgra la rna bas nyan par byed //
T02D1180:64b-21: sna yis dri la snom par byed //
T02D1180:64b-22: lce yis rol myong bar byed //
T02D1180:64b-23: dngos po kun gyis reg par byed //
T02D1180:64b-25: byis pa rnams ni yul dang yul can dang /
T02D1180:64b-26: bdag dang bdag gi dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal
T02D1180:64b-27: gyi tshul du yul rnams la 'jug pas rnam par
T02D1180:64b-28: ma dag pa yin la rnal 'byor pa mkhas pa
T02D1180:64b-29: ni / de nyid thabs gyis [*kyis] 'jug par byed de /
T02D1180:64b-31: 'di ltar bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad ni /
T02D1180:64b-32: gzod ma nas ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing dben te /
T02D1180:64b-33: gang gis de ltar shes pa de ni rnam par sbyangs pa ste nges pa'i don to //
T02D1180:64b-35: yid kyis bde sogs thob pa rnams //
T02D1180:64b-36: dag pas dug med byas nas ni //
T02D1180:64b-37: bsten bya 'di dag bsten par bya //
T02D1180:64b-38: zhes bya ba la rnal 'byor pa mkhas pa dang /
T02D1180:64b-39: byis pa'i rang bzhin can dag gis 'di ltar rim pa bzhin du bden pa gnyis la brten te /
T02D1180:64b-40: rnal 'byor pa mkhas pas kyang sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis dang /
T02D1180:64b-41: dam tshig gi 'khor lo kun rdzob kyi bden pa mi spang ste /
T02D1180:64b-42: rang rang ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bstan to //
T02D1180:65a-0: de bzhin du las dang po bdag gis ni bdag @65a * //
T02D1180:65a-3: rus dang rigs dang rgyu dang cho 'brang du 'dzin pa las bzlog ste /
T02D1180:65a-4: rdo rje'i rigs zhes bya ba kun rdzob kyi mngon par dbang bskur ba bdun la gnas te /
T02D1180:65a-5: gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba'i rtog pa las rim gyis bzlog par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1180:65a-6: rigs bzhi po rnams nang phan tshun du go dang /
T02D1180:65a-7: ku la sogs pa'i bza' ba dag thun mong du bza' zhing /
T02D1180:65a-8: rigs dang rigs ma yin pa la bgrod par bya ste /
T02D1180:65a-9: ma dang sring mo la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas par bya ba ste /
T02D1180:65a-10: gang des tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa cher rags pa rnams las ldog go //
T02D1180:65a-11: de bas na rdo rje'i rigs ni mngon par dbang bskur ba bdun nyid kyis ming 'thob po //
T02D1180:65a-12: des na bdag cag rnams kyis phung po dang /
T02D1180:65a-17: 'byung ba las gyur pa ji snyed pa dang /
T02D1180:65a-18: de bzhin du las dang las kyi dbang po'i bya ba rnams lha nyid du brtag gis /
T02D1180:65a-19: de las gzhan gyi tshul du mi brtag ste /
T02D1180:65a-20: de ltar na dang po'i las can gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis /
T02D1180:65a-21: gzugs phung rdo rje ma yin te //
T02D1180:65a-22: tshor ba la yang dkar mor brjod //
T02D1180:65a-25: rnam shes phung po'i tshul gyis ni ;
T02D1180:65a-26: / bdag med rnal 'byor ma gnas so //
T02D1180:65a-27: rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas /
T02D1180:65a-30: 'di ltar shel gyi nor bu'i nye 'khor du kha
T02D1180:65a-31: dog gang dang gang gzhag pa de dang de'i kha
T02D1180:65a-33: rdo rje 'chang chen pos kyang byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba la /
T02D1180:65a-34: rigs kyi bu sems de ni ji ltar sbyangs pa de ltar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02D1180:65a-35: 'di'i phyir ni phung po lnga lha mo lnga ru brtag par bya ste /
T02D1180:65a-36: nang gi tshul du bstan pa ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lor rgyas par bstan to //
T02D1180:65a-37: de ni nang gi 'phar ma ste phung bo lnga dag pa'o //
T02D1180:65a-38: yul rnams lha ru brtag par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1180:65a-39: de nas phyi yi 'phar ma bshad //
T02D1180:65a-40: dbang ldan du ni pu kka s'i //
T02D1180:65a-41: mer ni de bzhin ri khrod ma //
T02D1180:65a-42: bden bral gdol pa mo bzhag cing //
T02D1180:65a-43: rlung du g-yung mo rnam par gzhag / ces pas ni 'byung ba bzhi'i lha mo bstan to //
T02D1180:65b-0: de bzhin du @65b yul gzugs la sogs pa 'byung
T02D1180:65b-1: ba bzhi'i lha ru brtag pa ni 'di lta ste
T02D1180:65b-2: / dbang dkar gshin rjer chom rkun ma //
T02D1180:65b-3: chu yi phyogs su ro langs ma //
T02D1180:65b-4: lus ngan du ni gha sma r'i //
T02D1180:65b-7: 'og tu sa spyod ma zhes brjod //
T02D1180:65b-8: steng du mkha' spyod ma zhes bshad //
T02D1180:65b-9: ces pa ni phyi nang gi tshul gyis gong du rgyas par bstan to //
T02D1180:65b-10: bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid kyi phyogs zhes bya ba
T02D1180:65b-11: ni de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas las dang po
T02D1180:65b-13: srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1180:65b-15: srid pa ni mkha' spyod ma yin la zhi ba ni sa spyod ma yin no //
T02D1180:65b-16: de yang rgyud gzhan las ji skad du /
T02D1180:65b-17: srid pa ni dpral ba yin zhing mya ngan las 'das pa ni /
T02D1180:65b-18: nor bu'i mgrin pa las zags par 'gyur ba'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D1180:65b-19: lha mo 'di gnyis rnam par gnas //
T02D1180:65b-20: zhes bya ba ni srid pa dang zhi ba'i rang
T02D1180:65b-21: bzhin du steng dang 'og gi lha mo gnyis shes
T02D1180:65b-22: par bya'o // bskyed pa'i rim pa la rnam par
T02D1180:65b-23: dag par bstan pa byis pa rnams kyis rtogs par
T02D1180:65b-25: gzugs la dkar mor brtag par bshad //

T02D1180:65b-30: byis pas brtags pa'i dngos po bzhi po rnams de

T02D1180:65b-33: la / las 'di bzhi'i nges pa'i don bstan pa ni /
T02D1180:65b-34: rtsa ba'i rgyud las 'di lta ste /
T02D1180:65b-35: rdo rje snying po lus can rnams kyi rang gi
T02D1180:65b-36: lus las 'byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi chus
T02D1180:65b-37: nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba zhi bar byed pa ni
T02D1180:65b-38: zhi ba'o // snga na med pa'i bde ba gya
T02D1180:65b-39: nom pas lus dang ngag dang sems rgyas pa'i phyir
T02D1180:65b-40: zhi ba'o // rgyas pa'o // lus dang ngag dang
T02D1180:65b-41: yid sdug bsngal ba las bzlog ste bde bas dbang
T02D1180:65b-42: du byas pa'i phyir dbang ngo //
T02D1180:65b-43: de stobs kyis srog nyi khri chig stong rgyu ba dang //
T02D1180:65b-44: byang chub sems kyi thig le kha thur du bltas pa'i rgyu ba gsod pa'i phyir mngon spyod do //
T02D1180:65b-46: zhi ba chu yi bsam gtan dpral bar bsam pa dang /
T02D1180:65b-47: dbang me'i bsam gtan mgrin par bsam pa dang //
T02D1180:65b-48: gsang ba rlung gi bsam gtan snying ga dang //
T02D1180:66a-0: @66a * // rgyas pa sa yi bsam gtan lte bar gnas //

T02D1180:66a-3: chos kyi dbyings la mkha' spyod ma /

T02D1180:66a-10: de bzhin du sa spyod ma zhes bya ba ni

T02D1180:66a-14: rgyud kyi de kho na nyid de /

T02D1180:66a-16: de ni dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud ces bya ba las kyang ji skad du /
T02D1180:66a-17: steng 'og sems kyi rtsa gnyis ni //

T02D1180:66a-19: thabs kyi thugs ni mun pa can //

T02D1180:66a-36: mar ngo'i chos can stong pa nyid bcu drug dang
