T02D1180:76a-3: cad bslus pa yang yin la /
T02D1180:76a-4: des dam tshig nyams te rnam pa kun gyi mchog
T02D1180:76a-5: dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya'i grub pa las nyams par
T02D1180:76a-7: da ni sgrub pa po rnams la bza' ba dang
T02D1180:76a-8: bsrung ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig bstan par bya
T02D1180:76a-9: ba'i phyir / de ru dam tshig bza' bya ba //
T02D1180:76a-10: na dang ga ha dang po dang //
T02D1180:76a-11: mtha' ma'i shva dang dang po'i shva //
T02D1180:76a-12: kye yi rdo rje'i dngos grub phyir //
T02D1180:76a-13: bdud rtsi lnga yang de bzhin bza' //
T02D1180:76a-14: zhes bya ba la kye'i rdo rje'i dam tshig la
T02D1180:76a-15: gnas pa rnams kyis phyi nang gi bye brag gis
T02D1180:76a-16: phye la bza' ba dang bsrung ba bya'o //
T02D1180:76a-17: de la skyes bu'i ming gi dang po'i yi ge na'o //
T02D1180:76a-18: gang gi ba lang gi ming gi dang po'i yi ge ga'o //
T02D1180:76a-19: ha ni glang po che'i ming gi dang po'i yi ge'o //
T02D1180:76a-20: shva ni rta'i mtha' ma'i ming gi yi ge'o ;
T02D1180:76a-21: / de bzhin du shva ni khyi'i ming gi dang po'i yi ge'o //
T02D1180:76a-22: rdzas 'di rnams mnyam par byas la mthe bo'i tshigs
T02D1180:76a-23: mdud tsam gyi ril bu byas te sbyang ba dang
T02D1180:76a-25: sbar ba dang bdud rtsir byas te zos pas phyi'i dngos grub tu 'gyur la /
T02D1180:76a-26: de bzhin du nang du ni mgo la sogs pa'i
T02D1180:76a-27: ming can mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams yul
T02D1180:76a-28: las bzlog ste gnas par gsungs pas mchog gi grub
T02D1180:76a-29: par 'gyur ro // de bzhin du bdud rtsi lnga ste /
T02D1180:76a-33: ra dang shu rnams kyang phyi nang gis phyi la
T02D1180:76a-34: spyad par bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' lung
T02D1180:76a-35: ngo // kye rdor las gsungs mtshan nyid ldan //
T02D1180:76a-36: skye ba bdun pa de nas mtshon //
T02D1180:76a-37: khyad par dga' ba la smod pa //
T02D1180:76a-39: zhes bya ba'i drang ba dang nges pa rnams mngon du bstan pa yin la /
T02D1180:76a-40: 'on kyang ji lta ba'i skye ba bdun pa'i mtshan
T02D1180:76a-41: nyid ma bstan pa gsal bar bstan par bya ba'i
T02D1180:76a-42: phyir / skad snyan mig ni sdug pa dang //
T02D1180:76a-43: lus la dri ldan gzi brjid che //
T02D1180:76a-44: de yi grib ma bdun du 'gyur //
T02D1180:76a-45: mthong nas rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon //
T02D1180:76a-47: gang zhig mi mo la la dag / skad kyi nga ro mdzes pa dang //
T02D1180:76a-48: mig dkyus ring la dkar nag 'byes pa dang /
T02D1180:76b-0: lus la gla @76b rtsi lta bu dang /
T02D1180:76b-1: ga bur lta bu'i dri dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1180:76b-2: de bzhin du gzi brjid che ba dang /
T02D1180:76b-3: grib ma bdun gyur gang la yod pa de ni
T02D1180:76b-4: skye ba bdun par mtshon cing rtogs par byas la
T02D1180:76b-5: / de lta bu rnyed nas rnal 'byor pas rgya
T02D1180:76b-6: shug gi tshi gu tsam gyi ril bu byas te
T02D1180:76b-7: zos pas mkha' la spyod par 'gyur zhing bskal pa
T02D1180:76b-8: dpag tu med par 'tshol de lta bu'i rnam par
T02D1180:76b-10: gang dag mtshams med pa byas pa dang /
T02D1180:76b-11: gang gis chos kyi dbyings kyi bde ba khyad par
T02D1180:76b-12: du gyur pa las bshung ba yang lus de nyid
T02D1180:76b-15: de ni zos pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02D1180:76b-16: skad cig la ni mkha' spyod 'gyur //
T02D1180:76b-18: da ni rigs su mdzad pa'i lha mo'i sgrub pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1180:76b-19: ku ru ku lle'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste
T02D1180:76b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di yang rtsa
T02D1180:76b-21: ba'i rgyud las / ji skad du /
T02D1180:76b-22: srid pa gsum po chags pas rmongs //
T02D1180:76b-23: de dag gzud par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1180:76b-24: bcom ldan kye yi rdo rje yis //
T02D1180:76b-25: mo gzugs 'jig rten dbang du mdzad //
T02D1180:76b-27: bcom ldan 'das nyid sku mdog chags pa dmar po'i
T02D1180:76b-28: tshul du bstan nas 'gro ba bcug pa yin no
T02D1180:76b-29: // gang du brtag pa bcu gnyis las //
T02D1180:76b-30: rgyas par gsungs pa mdo ru bsdu //
T02D1180:76b-31: zhes bya ba la srung ba'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D1180:76b-34: ye shes lngas bskyed pa la sogs pa rnams /
T02D1180:76b-35: sngon du kye'i rdo rje nyid sgrub pa'i dus su
T02D1180:76b-36: ji skad bstan pa bzhin bsgrubs pa la gnas pa
T02D1180:76b-37: yin la / 'dir ni lha mo'i sa bon dang ;
T02D1180:76b-40: gdan gyi gnas tsam zhig bstan par shes par bya'o //
T02D1180:76b-41: lha mo hr'i: yig las byung ba //
T02D1180:76b-42: kha dog dmar zhing phyag bzhi ma //
T02D1180:76b-43: phyag na bsnams pa mda' dang gzhu //
T02D1180:76b-45: 'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1180:76b-46: 'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed //
T02D1180:76b-47: ces bya ba la khyad par du kye'i rdo rje bskyed pa'i sa bon ni h'um yin la /
T02D1180:76b-48: de bzhin du bdag med ma la sogs pa bskyed pa aom gyi yi ge yin te /
T02D1180:76b-49: 'dir ni hr'i: las bskyed cing zhal nas hr'i:'i sgra sgrogs pa'i bdag nyid de /
T02D1180:76b-50: dang po hr'i: yig yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1180:77a-1: der de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bstim pa las /
T02D1180:77a-2: lha mo dmar mo phyed krung can phyag bzhi'i dang po gnyis na autpala'i gzhu dang mda' bsnams shing /
T02D1180:77a-4: sku la mi mgo brgya phyed kyi ngo shal dang /
T02D1180:77a-5: dbu rgyan la dum bu lnga dang thor tshugs zla ba phyed pa dang /
T02D1180:77a-6: dbu skra dmar po gyen du 'greng ba dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1180:77a-8: aom ku ru ku lle hr'i: sv'a h'a zhes bzlas
T02D1180:77a-9: pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas zla ba
T02D1180:77a-11: de la yi ge'i grangs kyi 'bum gyis chog bzhin
T02D1180:77a-12: du bzlas na thar pa nges par skyed par byed
T02D1180:77a-13: de sbyin sreg bcu char bya'o //
T02D1180:77a-14: de la phal pa'i dbang du byas pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02D1180:77a-15: 'bum phrag gcig gis rgyal po rnams //
T02D1180:77a-16: khri yis 'jig rten phal pa nyid //
T02D1180:77a-17: bye bas phyugs dang gnod sbyin sogs //
T02D1180:77a-18: bdun 'bum gyis ni lha min rnams //
T02D1180:77a-19: 'bum phrag gnyis kyis lha rnams nyid //
T02D1180:77a-20: brgya phrag gcig gis sngags 'chang rnams //
T02D1180:77a-21: zhes pa ni dbang du byed ces tshig tu sbyar
T02D1180:77a-22: te thams cad du sbyin sreg bzlas pa'i grangs kyi
T02D1180:77a-24: lta stangs dang srog gi kun du spyod pa dang
T02D1180:77a-25: ldan par bsgrubs na 'grub la gzhan du na 'jig
T02D1180:77a-26: rten pa'i bzhad gang du 'gyur ro //
T02D1180:77a-27: de la ku ni bde ba chen po'o //
T02D1180:77a-28: ru ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1180:77a-30: lles ni sprul pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D1180:77a-31: de ltar bstan pa'i rim pas 'gro ba 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1180:77a-32: de ni ji skad du pad+ma rigs kyi mngon par
T02D1180:77a-33: shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ces
T02D1180:77a-35: 'dod chags mngon shes bskyed nas kyang //
T02D1180:77a-36: rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms nas su //
T02D1180:77a-37: mngon shes lngar ni bdag 'gyur nas //
T02D1180:77a-38: dag pa'i dngos grub thob 'gyur zhes //
T02D1180:77a-39: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02D1180:77a-41: de bzhin du pad+ma rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i
T02D1180:77a-42: ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ces bya ba
T02D1180:77a-45: de bzhin chos kyi phyag rgya las //
T02D1180:77a-46: byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di //
T02D1180:77a-47: bsgoms na dngos grub thob 'gyur zhes //
T02D1180:77a-48: bcom ldan spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs //
T02D1180:77b-0: @77b 'gro ba 'dul ba la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1180:77b-1: pa rnams kyis lha mo 'di la bsgrub par bya'o
T02D1180:77b-2: // kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom
T02D1180:77b-3: pa zhes bya ba la kye dang rdo rje zhes
T02D1180:77b-4: bya ba ni gong du rgyas par bstan la /
T02D1180:77b-5: mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' lta
T02D1180:77b-6: bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de la
T02D1180:77b-8: dra ba ni tshogs te de rnams mang ba la bya'o //
T02D1180:77b-9: rdo rje snying po mngon par byang chub pa'i brtag
T02D1180:77b-10: pa zhes bya ba kye'i rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D1180:77b-11: 'bum phrag lnga yang brtag pa gnyis su gnas te
T02D1180:77b-12: dang por rdo rje snying pos zhus pa'i brtag pa
T02D1180:77b-13: dang / phyi nas bdag med mas zhus pa'i brtag pa yin la /
T02D1180:77b-14: bsdus pa'i rgyud 'dir yang de ltar khong du chud par bya ste /
T02D1180:77b-15: de yan chad phal cher rdo rje snying pos zhus
T02D1180:77b-16: pa la dgongs pa yin gyi dngos su ni rdo
T02D1180:77b-17: rje snying po la brten pa ma yin te /
T02D1180:77b-18: 'di ltar rdo rje snying po ni dus gsum gyi
T02D1180:77b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang chen sdud
T02D1180:77b-20: par snang zhing zhub po dang /
T02D1180:77b-21: gsang ba'i bdag po zhes kyang bstan cing lung bstan te /
T02D1180:77b-22: de bas 'di'i tshig ni phal che ba la dgongs pa'o //
T02D1180:77b-23: brtag pa gnyis pa la yang ma zhus pa ni med do //
T02D1180:77b-24: kye'i rdo rje'i nges pa'i don gyi rgya cher bshad pa las /
T02D1180:77b-26: ku ru ku lle'i sgrub pa'i bshad pa ste le'u bcu gcig pa'i bshad pa dang /
T02D1180:77b-27: rgyas par rdo rje snying po mngon par byang chub
T02D1180:77b-28: pa zhes bya ba'i brtag pa dang po'i rgya cher
T02D1180:77b-29: bshad pa ma lus pa rdzogs par bstan pa'o /
T02D1180:77b-31: // / khong stong sku ni mi mnga' la //
T02D1180:77b-32: rdo rje lta bu'i sku lus can //
T02D1180:77b-33: kye yi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D1180:77b-34: ma rig thibs pos non pa yi //
T02D1180:77b-37: de phyir rab gnas le'u yi //
T02D1180:77b-38: rgyas bshad rdo rje snying pos bri //
T02D1180:77b-39: da ni brtag pa gnyis pa'i rgya cher bshad pa bstan par bya ba yin la /
T02D1180:77b-40: de las kyang dang por rab gnas thams cad kyi
T02D1180:77b-41: spyi'i mtshan nyid legs par bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1180:77b-42: / rdo rje snying pos gsol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1180:77b-45: rdo rje snying po bdag / sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa //
T02D1180:77b-46: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung
T02D1180:77b-47: gcig tu bsdus pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje snying
T02D1180:78a-0: po bdag ste / dngos su na dus @78a * //
T02D1180:78a-1: gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pas gnang zhing bstod pa gsang ba'i bdag po yin zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1180:78a-2: rab gnas mtshan nyid bzang po nyid //
T02D1180:78a-3: rim pa ji bzhin bshad du gsol //
T02D1180:78a-4: zhes bya ba ni sngon du bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1180:78a-5: slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i don du dkyil
T02D1180:78a-6: 'khor gsungs pa'i rab tu gnas pa ji ltar bgyi
T02D1180:78a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1180:78a-9: ci gsungs sbyin sreg byas nas ni //
T02D1180:78a-10: dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs pa dang //
T02D1180:78a-11: zhes bya ba la rig sngags 'chang gi slob dpon gyi slob ma'i don dang /
T02D1180:78a-12: de las gzhan pa'i glegs bam dang /
T02D1180:78a-14: ras kyi gzugs la rab tu gnas par byed 'dod pas /
T02D1180:78a-15: sngon du rgyas pa la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg byas la /
T02D1180:78a-16: de nas rigs dang mthun pa'i rdul tshon bri'o //
T02D1180:78a-17: de nas sta gon la gnas par bya'o //
T02D1180:78a-18: nam mkha'i khams la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams rab gnas kyi gzhi la bstim par byas la /
T02D1180:78a-19: rab tu gnas pa'i gzhi de sbyang ste /
T02D1180:78a-20: de nas snga bar sku gzugs sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D1180:78a-21: sta gon la gnas byas nas ni //
T02D1180:78a-22: nam mkha' bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
T02D1180:78a-23: sku gzugs snying gar rab tu gzhug //
T02D1180:78a-25: 'di'i nges pa'i don ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las ji skad du /
T02D1180:78a-26: bla mas gnang ba'i sta gon la //
T02D1180:78a-27: lus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas te //
T02D1180:78a-28: bdag gi lnga phung sbyin sreg nas //
T02D1180:78a-29: khu ba'i gzugs kyis sangs rgyas bstim //
T02D1180:78a-30: bdag gi lnga phung lha gzugs sbyangs //
T02D1180:78a-31: rab tu gnas la byin brlabs mchog / yun du gnas shing byin rlabs che //
T02D1180:78a-32: mchog gi rab tu gnas pa'o //
T02D1180:78a-33: zhes gsungs te nges pa'i don to //
T02D1180:78a-35: rab mthong sngags kyi pha rol son //
T02D1180:78a-36: zhes bya ba ni tshul ji ltar rab tu gnas
T02D1180:78a-37: pa byas nas rang gi 'dod pa'i lha kye'i rdo
T02D1180:78a-39: sngags thams cad kyi pha rol du son pa'i rnal 'byor pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1180:78a-40: aom badzra pu shpe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa ni me tog gi'o //
T02D1180:78a-41: aom badzra dh'u pe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1180:78a-43: aom badzra d'i pe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1180:78a-45: aom badzra ga ndhe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1180:78a-47: aom badzra nee be dye a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1180:78b-0: sna tshogs h'um las @78b rdzogs pa dang //
T02D1180:78b-1: me tog la sogs dbul ba nyid //
T02D1180:78b-2: gong ma'i rgyud kyi cho ga'i rim //
T02D1180:78b-3: mchod yon zhal bsil gong bzhin dbul //
T02D1180:78b-4: zhes bya ba la rang rang gi sngags kyis byin
T02D1180:78b-5: gyis brlabs shing dbul bar bya ba de bzhin gshegs
T02D1180:78b-7: nges pa'i don ni ji skad du rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1180:78b-8: yid 'ong nyi zla'i me tog dang //
T02D1180:78b-9: ral pa med pa'i tshul khrims spos //
T02D1180:78b-10: bde ba gsal bas mar me yin //
T02D1180:78b-11: bde bas tshim pas dri yi mchog / lus ngag yid gsum bde rgyas pa //
T02D1180:78b-12: ting 'dzin zas te zhal zas mchog /'jam zhing snyan par smra ba dang //
T02D1180:78b-13: rang srog sgra ni sil snyan sgra ;
T02D1180:78b-14: / zhes gsungs pa ni nges pa'i don to //
T02D1180:78b-15: de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems ma shor ba bsten pa'i bde ba'i khrus dang /
T02D1180:78b-16: de nyid kyi bde ba'i gnas su khrid pa'i phyir zhabs bsil ba yin no //
T02D1180:78b-17: da ni sbyin sreg bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1180:78b-18: zhi bar thab khung zlum po nyid //
T02D1180:78b-19: dpral bar chu yi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1180:78b-20: rgyas pa nyid kyi gru bzhi ni //
T02D1180:78b-21: lte bar sa yi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1180:78b-22: gsad pa la ni gru gsum nyid //
T02D1180:78b-23: gtsug gi 'khor lo nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1180:78b-24: 'di nyid la ni lhag ma bsgrubs //
T02D1180:78b-26: dbang la mgrin pa me'i rigs la'o //
T02D1180:78b-27: khru gang dang ni khru phyed nyid //
T02D1180:78b-28: zhi ba'i steng dang'og tu yin //
T02D1180:78b-31: zhes pa ni sgra ji bzhin du bstan pa ste nges pa'i don yod par ma gsungs so //
T02D1180:78b-32: da ni kha dog gi bye brag bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1180:78b-33: zhi bar kha dog dkar por 'gyur //
T02D1180:78b-34: rgyas la ser po de bzhin no //
T02D1180:78b-35: gsad pa la ni kha dog gnag / dbang la dmar por rab tu grags //
T02D1180:78b-36: zhes bya ba la phyir ni las kyi bye brag
T02D1180:78b-37: las kha dog bye brag tu bya zhes kyang gsungs
T02D1180:78b-38: la / de bas na skabs 'dir me thab thams cad kha dog de ltar bsgyur bar bya'o //
T02D1180:78b-39: de bas na 'khor lo bzhi'i bye brag las kha dog tha dad par bya'o //
T02D1180:78b-40: de bas na zhi ba dkar po chu'i bsam gtan dpral bar ro //
T02D1180:78b-41: rgyas pa ser po sa'i bsam gtan lte bar ro //
T02D1180:78b-42: gsad pa nag po nam mkha'i bsam gtan ni gtsug tor du'o //
T02D1180:78b-43: dbang dmar po me'i bsam gtan ni mgrin par ro //
T02D1180:78b-44: de ltar na dbang bzhin du dgug pa dang gsad
T02D1180:78b-45: pa bzhin du sdang ba la sogs la thab kyi
T02D1180:79a-0: @79a * // kha dog dang dbyibs tha mi dad par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1180:79a-1: da ni bsreg rdzas kyi bye brag bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1180:79a-2: zhi la til dang rgyas la zho //
T02D1180:79a-3: gsad la tsher ma de bzhin no //
T02D1180:79a-4: sdang la sogs pa'ang tsher ma yin //
T02D1180:79a-6: zhes bya ba la de yang rim pa bzhin //
T02D1180:79a-7: zhi ba la dang po til bsreg go //
T02D1180:79a-8: rgyas pa la dang por zho /
T02D1180:79a-9: gsad pa la dang por tsher ma can gyi shing bsreg go //
T02D1180:79a-10: de bzhin du sdang ba la sogs pa la dang por tsher ma can no //
T02D1180:79a-11: dbang dang dgug pa la dang por autpala bsreg go //
T02D1180:79a-12: lhag ma ni gzhan dang mthun no //
T02D1180:79a-13: aom aa gna ye ma h'a te dza:/
T02D1180:79a-14: sa rbba k'a m'a rtha s'a dha ka:/
T02D1180:79a-15: k'a ru na kri tv'a sa tv'a rtha /
T02D1180:79a-16: aa smin sa nni hi to bha ba zhes bya

T02D1180:87a-0: @87a * // 'dod chags gang gi skad cig la 'byung ba lnga'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba de'i phyir ro //

T02D1180:87a-7: nam mkha' lta bu'i 'od gsal ba'i dga' ba chen
T02D1180:87a-8: po gcig po nyid kyi dus su 'jig rten kun
T02D1180:87a-9: rdzob tu gnas skabs tha dad pa lnga 'byung ste

T02D1180:87a-12: zhes bya ba rdo rje dang pad+ma sbyor ba'i dus su'o //
T02D1180:87a-14: rig pas sra ba'i bag chags nyid //
T02D1180:87a-15: sra ba gti mug chos kyi phyir //
T02D1180:87a-16: gti mug rnam par snang mdzad brjod //
T02D1180:87a-18: gang gis skad cig la mkhrang ba dang /
T02D1180:87a-19: sra ba sa'i khams yin la /
T02D1180:87a-20: de'i phyir skad cig de ni rnam par snang mdzad du brjod do //
T02D1180:87a-22: byang chub sems ni gsher ba yi //

T02D1180:87a-28: 'dod chags kyi drod de ni me'i khams yin no //

T02D1180:87a-32: don yod rlung las 'byung ba nyid //

T02D1180:87b-2: rigs ni lnga po de nyid las //
T02D1180:87b-3: stong phrag du ma skyes pa nyid //
T02D1180:87b-5: rigs kyi gtso bo rnam pa lnga po de las

T02D1180:87b-8: rigs lnga po de dag kyang mgrin pa dang rkan

T02D1180:87b-22: drug dang de bzhin du lnga po de las rnam

T02D1180:87b-24: shes rab kyi char ston par byed pa yin no
T02D1180:87b-25: // de bzhin du gsal byed 'ga' zhig gi ni sum cu'o //

T02D1180:87b-28: brgyad cur 'gyur te bgrod pa gcig gis so //

T02D1180:87b-32: brgya brgyad cu gnyis thabs dang shes rab gnyis su

T02D1180:98b-10: dus kyi me 'bar bas ku nda lta bu kha
T02D1180:98b-11: thur du bltas pas gsod par byed pa nyid do
T02D1180:98b-12: // rmongs med 'khor ba dag bas ni //
T02D1180:98b-15: gang ku nda lta bu ste rgyu ba 'gags pa ni rmongs pa med pa ste /
T02D1180:98b-19: dpral ba rnams su rten 'brel lugs las bzlog ste /
T02D1180:98b-20: gnas dang gnas su thim pa na //
T02D1180:98b-24: byang chub sems ni mya ngan 'das //
T02D1180:98b-25: kun rdzob don dam tshul can no //
T02D1180:98b-27: gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan //
T02D1180:98b-28: sngo bsangs dal la rigs bzangs ma //
T02D1180:98b-29: si hla ga pur 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02D1180:98b-30: rang gis dbang bskur kye'i rdo rje //
T02D1180:98b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1180:98b-32: kun rdzob kyi tshul can ma bde ba rtogs par
T02D1180:98b-33: byed pa'i phyag rgya zhes tha snyad gdags te sngon
T02D1180:98b-35: de bzhin du de'i chang ni lhan cig skyes pa ste /
T02D1180:98b-36: bdag dang gzhan gyi don du btung bar bya ba nyid de mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1180:98b-37: btung ba ni drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyi dbyangs rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1180:98b-38: drang ba'i don du ni dngos su ro ldan gyis blang ba yin la /
T02D1180:98b-39: nges pa'i don du ni ling+ga'i ro ldan gyis blang ba ni nges pa'o //
T02D1180:98b-41: bo la ka kko la ra bkod nas //
T02D1180:98b-42: kun du ru bya brtul zhugs can //
T02D1180:98b-43: de ru sbyor ba las byung ba //
T02D1180:98b-44: ga bur mkhas pas mi spang ste //
T02D1180:98b-45: de phyir lag tu mi blang zhing //
T02D1180:98b-46: nya phyis dung chos nyid du min //
T02D1180:98b-47: nges par blo dang stobs kyi phyir //
T02D1180:98b-48: 'chi med lce yis blang bar bya //
T02D1180:98b-50: ga bur nyid ni bdag med ma //
T02D1180:98b-51: bde ba bdag med tshul can nyid //
T02D1180:98b-52: de yi bde ba phyag rgya che //
T02D1180:98b-53: zhes bya ba la thig le'i ga bur bco lnga
T02D1180:98b-54: po la brten nas phyag rgya chen po bdag med
T02D1180:99a-0: @99a * // bdag med ma zhes gdags so //
T02D1180:99a-1: lus can rnams kyi lte ba'i dkyil 'khor na dbyangs
T02D1180:99a-2: kyi yi ge dang po nyid aa'i tshul du gnas
T02D1180:99a-3: la / de las sbyor ba gang gi dus su
T02D1180:99a-4: dus kyi me 'bar bar byed cing khams gsum po
T02D1180:99a-5: thams cad sreg par byed de /
T02D1180:99a-6: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang bsregs nas /
T02D1180:99a-7: rang gi gnas su 'ong bar byed pa 'di ni thams cad kyi rgyu can no //
T02D1180:99a-9: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dag tu gnas //
T02D1180:99a-10: dbyangs yig dang po'i rang bzhin te //
T02D1180:99a-11: blo zhes sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags //
T02D1180:99a-13: rtsa ba'i rgyud las kyang ji skad du /
T02D1180:99a-14: lus can thams cad 'khrig pa na //
T02D1180:99a-16: bde dang sdug bsngal ma lus pa //
T02D1180:99a-17: 'di nyid kyis ni byed par brjod //
T02D1180:99a-18: ces gsungs te thun mong gi chos so //
T02D1180:99a-19: de las blo zhes pa ni shes rab kyi ming gi khyad par yin la ;
T02D1180:99a-20: des so sor 'bigs shing gcod pa'i las byed pa'i phyir /
T02D1180:99a-21: shes rab ces sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs so //
T02D1180:99a-22: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor las //
T02D1180:99a-23: de nyid bcom ldan shes rab ma //
T02D1180:99a-24: zhes bya ba la gang du 'jig rten lta bu las 'das te /
T02D1180:99a-25: yid nang du chud pa'i dus de na 'pho ba med pa'i gnas te /
T02D1180:99a-26: de nas 'bar te mtshan mar rtogs pa thams cad sreg par byed do //
T02D1180:99a-28: shes rab nges 'bigs zhes bya ba //
T02D1180:99a-29: ting nge 'dzin zhes grags pa ste //
T02D1180:99a-31: bsgoms na myur du 'grub po zhes //
T02D1180:99a-32: bcom ldan shes rab mchog gis gsungs //
T02D1180:99a-34: de ltar na thog ma dang /
T02D1180:99a-36: dbus rnams su mtshan ma'i spros pa las grol ba ni bdag med ma yin te /
T02D1180:99a-37: de ni ring min thung ba min //
T02D1180:99a-38: gru bzhi ma yin zlum po min //
T02D1180:99a-39: dri dang ro dang mya ngan 'das //
T02D1180:99a-40: lhan cig skyes dga'i byed pa can //
T02D1180:99a-43: dang po'i dbyangs yig rang bzhin te //
T02D1180:99a-44: zhes bya ba dang sbyar te 'jig rten dang 'jig
T02D1180:99a-45: rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi byed pa po
T02D1180:99a-46: yin zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1180:99a-47: de bzhin du rang bzhin dang skyes bu la sogs
T02D1180:99a-48: pa du mar rtogs pa'i byed pa po yang yin
T02D1180:99b-0: te / @99b 'di ltar mu stegs shes rab 'chal pa can rnams ji skad du /
T02D1180:99b-1: sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang //
T02D1180:99b-2: dus dang phyogs dang bdag dang yid //
T02D1180:99b-3: rdzas ni dgu yi bdag nyid de //
T02D1180:99b-4: dngos kun 'di yi rang bzhin yin //
T02D1180:99b-7: rdzas dang yon tan las dang ni //
T02D1180:99b-8: spyi dang khyad par cha shas rnams / tshig gi don ni drug yin te //
T02D1180:99b-10: zhes tha snyad du mar 'dogs so //
T02D1180:99b-11: de las skyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1180:99b-12: de yi bde ba za ba nyid //
T02D1180:99b-13: de dang lhan cig phyag rgya che //
T02D1180:99b-14: bde ba ster ba'i dngos grub 'gyur //
T02D1180:99b-15: zhes bya ba la dang po'i dbyangs yig gis bskyed pa'i bde ba za ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1180:99b-16: dbyangs yig de dang de las 'byung ba'i bde ba
T02D1180:99b-17: phyag rgya chen po rtogs shing de'i tshul gzhan la
T02D1180:99b-18: yang ster ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bya'o //
T02D1180:99b-19: ji ltar sbyin par bya zhe na /
T02D1180:99b-20: gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni //
T02D1180:99b-21: ro dang de bzhin reg bya nyid //
T02D1180:99b-22: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yang //
T02D1180:99b-23: shes rab nyid kyis dpyad par bya //
T02D1180:99b-25: phyi dang nang gi dbye bas phye la phyir ni
T02D1180:99b-26: mi mo'i bde bar bsdu ba'i tshul du sbyin no
T02D1180:99b-27: // nang du a'a li k'a li 'byor ba'i bdag nyid kyis sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1180:99b-30: a'a li k'a li sbyor ba las //
T02D1180:99b-31: phyi rol gyis ni gnyis gnyis bkag / ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1180:99b-32: de nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs //
T02D1180:99b-33: bde chen bzang po'i rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1180:99b-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1180:99b-35: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can //
T02D1180:99b-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'jig rten dang
T02D1180:99b-37: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tha snyad du tha snyad
T02D1180:99b-38: can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang mo thab
T02D1180:99b-39: dang phyag rgya bcing ba la sogs pa thams cad
T02D1180:99b-40: kyang lha dang / lha ma yin dang /
T02D1180:99b-44: phye ma leb la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzhi gang de nyid yin zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1180:99b-45: da ni phyi dang nang gi sdom pa dag las
T02D1180:99b-46: phyi'i sdom pa rnams sngon du rgyas par bstan nas
T02D1180:99b-47: / nang gi bde ba'i sdom pa khyad par can bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1180:99b-48: rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'khor lo bsgom pa'i lam dang /
T02D1180:99b-49: phyi nang gi lha thams cad ji ltar 'byung ba thams cad khong du chud de /
T02D1180:100a-2: zhes nang gi bde ba'i sdom pa phyi rol gyi
T02D1180:100a-3: khrims kyi bya ba yongs su gtang bar zhus pa'i
T02D1180:100a-4: don to // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1180:100a-5: rnal 'byor ma yi lus dbus na //
T02D1180:100a-6: sdom pa aa yi rnam par gnas //
T02D1180:100a-7: ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang //
T02D1180:100a-8: sdom pa de nyid rab tu bstan //
T02D1180:100a-10: de la 'di'i don ni 'di yin te phyi rol gyi ras dang /
T02D1180:100a-11: shan la sogs pa snyigs ma can gyi tshos kyis legs par bsgyur te lus la bcang ba dang /
T02D1180:100a-12: de bzhin du phas pham pa bzhi dang /
T02D1180:100a-13: dge 'dun la rag lus pa'i tshig can gyi lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang /
T02D1180:100a-14: ma nges pa'i chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1180:100a-15: ji snyed cig bstan pa de dag ni byis pa'i
T02D1180:100a-16: skye bo rnams drang ba'i phyir gsungs so //
T02D1180:100a-17: de las gzhan pa gsang sngags kyi lam nyid du
T02D1180:100a-18: spyad pa spyod pa nyid la yang drang ba dang
T02D1180:100a-19: nges pa'i don rgya cher bstan te /
T02D1180:100a-21: gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan nyid //
T02D1180:100a-24: mngal gyi phru ma chos gos nyid //
T02D1180:100a-25: ces pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1180:100a-26: gcer bu skra dang kha spu bregs //
T02D1180:100a-27: sngags 'don skyes pa dge slong nyid //
T02D1180:100a-28: ces pa la sogs pa rnams phyi rol nyan thos byed pa'i khrims kyi bya ba las /
T02D1180:100a-29: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa las kyi dang por gtogs pa /
T02D1180:100a-30: rnal 'byor pa byis pa'i blo can rnams la nges pa'i don du bstan to //
T02D1180:100a-31: de yang rnal 'byor pa mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa rnams la /
T02D1180:100a-32: gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan pa //
T02D1180:100a-33: zhes pa la sogs pa drang ba'i don du bstan la /
T02D1180:100a-34: rnal 'byor ma yi lus dbus na //
T02D1180:100a-35: sdom pa a'a yi rnam par gnas //
T02D1180:100a-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nges pa'i don du bstan to //
T02D1180:100a-37: de yang phyi rol du ni phas pham pa la
T02D1180:100a-38: sogs pa'i chos mi byed pa sdom pa yin la
T02D1180:100a-39: / nang du bde ba'i sdom pa gang la gnas
T02D1180:100a-40: te byang chub sems kyi srog mi gcod pa'i phyir
T02D1180:100a-41: / / srog mi gcod pa'i sdom pa dang /
T02D1180:100a-42: de ltar bde ba phyir ma shor bas mi tshangs
T02D1180:100a-43: par spyod pa las log pa'i sdom pa la sogs
T02D1180:100a-44: pa bsrung ba nges pa'i don du bstan te /
T02D1180:100a-45: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las kyang /
T02D1180:100b-0: dka' thub mthar phyin @100b dka' thub che //
T02D1180:100b-1: gtsang gnas nam pa goo tam //
T02D1180:100b-4: tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba mchog / bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa po //
T02D1180:100b-5: zhes pa la sogs pa nges pa'i don gyi sdom pa rgyas par bstan to //
T02D1180:100b-7: bo la'i bde ba phyag rgya che //
T02D1180:100b-8: rdo rje skye mched thams cad nyid //
T02D1180:100b-10: nyi zla'i lam mi shigs pa'i lam du gtogs pa'i dus na /
T02D1180:100b-11: phyi'i las dang ye shes kyi phyag rgyal sogs pa
T02D1180:100b-12: dag rnam par spangs pa'i phyir bde ba'i sdom pa
T02D1180:100b-13: po la rab tu rgyas par byed pa rtsa thams
T02D1180:100b-14: cad rdo rje ltar 'gyur ba 'di ni gsang ba'i
T02D1180:100b-15: snyoms par 'jug pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1180:100b-18: phyi rol gyis ni gnyis gnyis bkag / zhes gsungs so //
T02D1180:100b-19: gzhan yang byis pa phal cher sku gsum zhes bya ba gzhan du 'dod pa dgag pa'i phyir /
T02D1180:100b-20: sku gsum lus kyi nang du ni //
T02D1180:100b-21: 'khor lo'i gzugs kyi yang dag bshad //
T02D1180:100b-22: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1180:100b-23: 'di ltar bde ba chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor lo na /
T02D1180:100b-24: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1180:100b-25: sprul pa'i gzugs can rtsa gsum gyis kun du khyab
T02D1180:100b-26: pa yongs su shes pa sku gsum du bstan to
T02D1180:100b-28: la la n'a ni sku zhes bya //
T02D1180:100b-29: ro ldan ma ni gsung yin te //
T02D1180:100b-30: aa wa dh'u t'i dbus gnas na //
T02D1180:100b-31: gzung 'dzin bral ba chos kyi sku //
T02D1180:100b-33: de bzhin du bde ba chen po kun la khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1180:100b-35: ma lus pa yi sems can gyis //
T02D1180:100b-36: skye ba gang nas rjod byed pa //
T02D1180:100b-37: gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan pa //
T02D1180:100b-38: de phyir sprul pa'i sku nyid yin //
T02D1180:100b-39: zhes bya ba la 'di ltar skye bo thams cad
T02D1180:100b-40: kyi lus chags pa na lte ba nas sngon du
T02D1180:100b-41: chags pa dang / srog gi rlung la sogs pa yang de nas sprul pa'i phyir /
T02D1180:100b-45: gang gis skyed dang sprul byed pa'i //
T02D1180:100b-46: sku ni sprul pa can zhes brjod //
T02D1180:100b-48: sems kyi rang bzhin chos yin te //
T02D1180:100b-49: chos kyi sku yang snying gar yin //
T02D1180:100b-51: bde sdug thams cad 'dzin pa dang //
T02D1180:101a-2: mtshan med 'dus ma byas pa yi //
T02D1180:101a-3: chos sku snying ga'i gnas na bzhugs //
T02D1180:101a-4: zhes gsungs pa'i don khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1180:101a-5: ro rnams drug gi gzugs can gyi //
T02D1180:101a-6: bza' ba nges par longs spyod brjod //
T02D1180:101a-8: ro drug la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba phun sum tshogs pa'i lam dang /
T02D1180:101a-9: ro la sogs pa 'dzin par byed pa'i rtsa mgrin par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1180:101a-11: mgrin par longs spyod 'khor lo dang //
T02D1180:101a-13: spyi bor bde ba chen po gnas //
T02D1180:101a-14: zhes pa ni bde ba'i gzhi la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1180:101a-15: da ni 'bras bu brjod pa'i phyir //
T02D1180:101a-16: ae wam rnam pa rgyu mthun nyid //
T02D1180:101a-17: ji ltar byas pa de bzhin spyod //
T02D1180:101a-18: rgyu mthun zhes ni rab tu bsgrags //
T02D1180:101a-19: zhes pa ni lte ba'i dkyil 'khor ae wam gyi
T02D1180:101a-20: gnas su dus kyi me 'bar ba g-yas kyi lam
T02D1180:101a-21: nas bde ba'i gnas su son pa dang /
T02D1180:101a-22: gang gi rgyun bkug ste de nyid kyi gnas su spyod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1180:101a-23: rnam smin chos kyi 'khor lo las //
T02D1180:101a-24: las chung 'bras bu che ba'i phyir //
T02D1180:101a-25: rnam par smin pa de las bzlog / ces pa
T02D1180:101a-26: ste mes smin par bya ba'i 'bras bu chu'i lam
T02D1180:101a-28: longs spyod skyes bu byed pa nyid //
T02D1180:101a-29: bskyed pas skyes bu byed pa'o //
T02D1180:101a-30: zhes pa ni de lta bu'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i byed pa can yang /
T02D1180:101a-31: skyes bu'i rtsol ba la rag las pa'i phyir //
T02D1180:101a-32: bde chen 'khor lo dri med nyid //
T02D1180:101a-33: rnal 'byor dag cing dri ma med //
T02D1180:101a-35: rgyun gyis dri ma med pa'i gnas //
T02D1180:101a-36: zhes bya bar byin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1180:101a-38: rgyu mthun sogs pas rab phye ba'i //
T02D1180:101a-39: 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod //
T02D1180:101a-40: las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yis //
T02D1180:101a-41: las la bcom ldan shes rab spyod //
T02D1180:101a-42: ces bya ba la lte ba'i dkyil 'khor na rang
T02D1180:101a-43: bzhin gyis gnas pa'i las kyi rlung la shes rab
T02D1180:101a-45: las kyi rlung des ni dus kyi me spor zhing
T02D1180:101a-46: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sreg par byed pa
T02D1180:101a-47: yin no // da ni sde pa chen po bzhi'i nges pa'i tshig bstan par bya ste /
T02D1180:101a-48: gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan nyid //
T02D1180:101a-50: gang du gnas nas srog 'gro ba dang /
T02D1180:101a-51: 'ong ba'i gzhi brtan par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1180:101a-52: chos ni smra ba 'byung ba'i phyir /
T02D1180:101b-0: @101b chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad yod //
T02D1180:101b-1: ces bya ba ni snying ga'i srog rlung gi sgras
T02D1180:101b-2: brjod pa thams cad gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro
T02D1180:101b-3: // gang phyir mgrin par kun bkur phyir //
T02D1180:101b-4: longs spyod 'khor lo kun gyis bkur //
T02D1180:101b-5: zhes bya ba las rtsa thams cad rgyas par byed pa'i bza' ba dang /
T02D1180:101b-6: btung ba'i ro thams cad mgrin pa nas rgyu la //
T02D1180:101b-7: de'i phyir rtsa thams cad kyis bkur ba'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1180:101b-8: gang phyir bde chen mgor gnas pa //
T02D1180:101b-10: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems ku nda lta
T02D1180:101b-11: bu phal cher bde ba'i 'khor lo na gnas pa'i
T02D1180:101b-12: phyir ro // sde ba zhes bya lus su brjod //
T02D1180:101b-13: lto ba gnas su brjod par bya //
T02D1180:101b-15: sde ba bco brgyad ni thun mong du lus spyi la brjod do //
T02D1180:101b-16: ma'i lto ba ni gtsug lag khang du brjod do //
T02D1180:101b-18: sngags kyi bzlas pa aa dang ham //
T02D1180:101b-19: skye gnas 'khor lo'i rnam pa aa //
T02D1180:101b-20: bde chen gyi yang rnam pa ham //
T02D1180:101b-21: zhes bya ba la lte ba'i 'khor lo nas aam
T02D1180:101b-22: zhes pa'i srog gi rlung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi
T02D1180:101b-23: 'khor lo'i ham la gtugs pa'i phyir de skad ces
T02D1180:101b-24: bya'o // de'i phyir aa ham zhes pa gzod ma
T02D1180:101b-25: nas bde ba chen po'i sku'i rang bzhin de yin
T02D1180:101b-27: 'di dag rkyen gyis sems can rnams //
T02D1180:101b-28: sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med //
T02D1180:101b-29: zla ba bcu yang sa rnams nyid //
T02D1180:101b-30: sems can sa bcu'i dbang phyug go //
T02D1180:101b-32: drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyi rtsa ba dang
T02D1180:101b-33: yan lag gi rlung bcu po bag la zha ba
T02D1180:101b-34: ni nges pa'i don gyis bcu'o //
T02D1180:101b-35: de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs
T02D1180:101b-36: pa'i lha mo thams cad ces pa nas sa la
T02D1180:101b-37: 'gyel ba dang 'dar bar gyur to zhes pa yan
T02D1180:101b-38: chad kyis ni 'di ltar sems can thams cad gzod
T02D1180:101b-39: ma nas sa bcu'i rang bzhin gyi byang chub sems
T02D1180:101b-40: dpa' rdo rje lta bu'i sku can yin no zhes

T02D1180:101b-44: ltar skye ste zhes brgyal ba'i don to //

T02D1180:101b-46: de nyid nga yis spro yis nyon //
T02D1180:102a-0: lha mo de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis spro ba bskyed pa'i dbyangs @102a * //
T02D1180:102a-1: kyi nga ro bstan pa ste /

T02D1180:102a-3: bar thos nas lha mo de rnams thams cad srog
T02D1180:102a-4: rnyed par gyur to zhes pa'i tha tshig go //

T02D1180:102a-6: sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid //

T02D1180:102a-12: pa yin la de'i rgyu ba chad pa ni sangs
T02D1180:102a-13: rgyas zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D1180:102a-15: bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te /
T02D1180:102a-16: bden pa ma mchis shing brdzun pa ma mchis so
T02D1180:102a-17: zhes bya ba ni 'dzag pa dri ma yin la
T02D1180:102a-18: / mi 'dzag pa sangs rgyas yin no zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
T02D1180:102a-20: de de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1180:102a-21: de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis dpe 'di ltar gsungs te /
T02D1180:102a-22: gang zhig mi shes 'jig rten pa //

T02D1180:102a-24: rmongs spangs de nyid yid kyis ni //

T02D1180:102a-31: nyid yongs su shes pas za bzhin pa ni dug
T02D1180:102a-32: bdud rtsi dad mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1180:102a-34: de bzhin zhi ba'i thabs shes shing //
T02D1180:102a-35: kye yi rdo rjer dbugs bton na //
T02D1180:102a-36: ma rig sogs pas mi 'dzin cing //
T02D1180:102a-37: gti mug la sogs kyis mi 'ching //
T02D1180:102a-38: zhes bya ba srog gi kun du spyod pa'i rlung
T02D1180:102a-39: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba las rnam par grol zhing

T02D1180:102a-42: ma rig pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa mtha'
T02D1180:102a-43: dag gis rnam par 'ching bar mi 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1180:102a-44: pa ni nges pa'i don to //
T02D1180:102a-45: rang dang rang gi rtogs pa las //
T02D1180:102a-46: sangs rgyas ma yin sems can ni //
T02D1180:102a-47: gcig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
T02D1180:102b-0: dmyal ba yi dags byol song @102b dang ;
T02D1180:102b-1: / lha dang lha min mi rnams dang //
T02D1180:102b-2: bshang ba'i srin bu la sogs pa //
T02D1180:102b-3: rtag tu bde ba'i rang bzhin can //
T02D1180:102b-4: zhes bya ba la srog chags thams cad kyi bde
T02D1180:102b-5: ba thun mong pa ka rka ta dang chu srin
T02D1180:102b-6: zhes bya ba srog gi kun du spyod pa la
T02D1180:102b-7: brten pa'i thig le'i bde bar rang rang gi ji
T02D1180:102b-8: lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa na ;
T02D1180:102b-9: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de nyid nga yin gyi /

T02D1180:102b-11: lha dang lha ma yin gyi yang //
T02D1180:102b-12: bde ba gang phyir mi shes pas //
T02D1180:102b-14: mi shes pa de'i phyir 'khor bar bcings zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1180:102b-15: rtag tu rang bzhin bde ba can /
T02D1180:102b-16: 'jig rten khams ni gang du yang //
T02D1180:102b-17: gzhan du sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D1180:102b-18: zhes pa ni rang rig pa'i bde ba bor nas gzhan du sangs rgyas mi rnyed ces sbyar ro //
T02D1180:102b-19: don bsdus pa'i tshul gyis gsungs pa ni /
T02D1180:102b-20: sems ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D1180:102b-22: gsod pa don du gnyer ba rnams //
T02D1180:102b-23: kye yi rdo rje de shes nas //
T02D1180:102b-25: ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1180:102b-26: rang gis rang gi sems rig pa stong pa dang
T02D1180:102b-27: snying rje dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid kyi kye'i rdo
T02D1180:102b-28: rje shes na 'grub par 'gyur ba ni nges pa'o
T02D1180:102b-29: // byis pa mi shes pas bsgribs pas //
T02D1180:102b-32: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i bde
T02D1180:102b-33: ba las babs pas bde ba'i 'gro ba 'di mi
T02D1180:102b-34: shes te 'gro ba drug ces bya ba /
T02D1180:102b-35: chu srin nam ka rka ta'i 'gro ba drug gi mthar 'khor bar 'gyur te /
T02D1180:102b-37: rdo rje snying po snying rje che //
T02D1180:102b-38: kyi yi rdo rje'i thabs rnyed nas //
T02D1180:102b-39: gang zhig yul rnams rnam sbyong ba //
T02D1180:102b-40: des ni bla med rnyed par 'gyur //
T02D1180:102b-41: zhes bya ba ni bla ma'i lung phog pa thob
T02D1180:102b-42: pa'i stobs las thabs rnyed de bla ma'i lung ltar
T02D1180:102b-43: yul rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sbyangs
T02D1180:102b-44: na bla na med pa rnyed par 'gyur te /
T02D1180:102b-45: 'di ltar srog nyi khri tshig stong drug brgya 'khor
T02D1180:102b-46: lo bzhi'i gnas su lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga stong
T02D1180:102b-48: lugs dang lugs su 'byung ba'i rim par dga' ba dang /
T02D1180:102b-51: lhan cig skyes pa rnams rim pa bzhin brtsi bar bya'o //
T02D1180:103a-0: de bzhin du drug cu rtsa bzhi'i gnas nyid du rlung @103a * //
T02D1180:103a-1: brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang rkang pa re re gsad par bya'o //

T02D1180:103a-3: gsad pa na dga' ba bzhi bzhir slar bzhin sbyar
T02D1180:103a-4: ro // de bzhin du chos kyi gnas su drug
T02D1180:103a-5: brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga drug brgya bdun cu rtsa
T02D1180:103a-7: de las rtsa gnyis gnyis kyis stong sum brgya lnga
T02D1180:103a-8: bcu stong sum brgya lnga bcu gsang pa na dga'
T02D1180:103a-10: de bzhin du longs spyod kyi gnas su sum cu
T02D1180:103a-11: so bdun gyis lhag pa'i rkang pa dang bcas pa
T02D1180:103a-13: de las cha bzhi bzhi gsad pa na gong ma ltar dga' ba bzhi bzhi dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1180:103a-14: de nas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi gnas su drug
T02D1180:103a-15: cu rtsa brgyad kyis lhag pa'i rkang pa dang bcas
T02D1180:103a-16: pa'i brgya phrag re re gsad par bya'o //
T02D1180:103a-17: de las cha bzhi bzhi gsad pa na gong bzhin du dga' ba bzhi bzhi dang sbyar ro //
T02D1180:103a-18: de ltar brjod pa de rnams ni bla ma'i lung ltar sbyangs pa'o //
T02D1180:103a-19: da ni gang gi phyag rgyas gang la gdab pa'i rigs pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1180:103a-20: rdo rje snying pos gsol ba /
T02D1180:103a-21: sa ni pu kka s'ir bshad pa //
T02D1180:103a-22: gang yang gti mug srab pa'i phyir //
T02D1180:103a-23: sku ni rnam snang nyid gsungs na //
T02D1180:103a-24: ji ltar mi bskyod phyag rgya lags //
T02D1180:103a-25: zhes pa la sogs pa'i the tshom rnams bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang ;
T02D1180:103a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis lan 'di skad gsungs so //
T02D1180:103a-27: lus spangs nas ni sems kyis ni //
T02D1180:103a-28: mdzes pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1180:103a-29: de phyir sems kyi rnam snang mdzad //
T02D1180:103a-30: sku la thugs kyi phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D1180:103a-32: thabs dang mi ldan pa'i shes rab dang /
T02D1180:103a-33: shes rab dang mi ldan pa'i thabs dag gis kyang bya ba yongs su mi rdzogs pa ltar /
T02D1180:103a-34: sku dang thugs tha dad pa'i sku yis bya ba yongs su mi rdzogs pa'i phyir //
T02D1180:103a-35: sku la thugs kyi phyag rgyas gdab bo //
T02D1180:103a-37: chu khams ri khrod mar bshad do //
T02D1180:103a-38: mi bskyod khu ba'i gzugs can nyid //
T02D1180:103a-39: gtso bo mi bskyod phyag rgyas ni //
T02D1180:103a-40: ri khrod ma la gdab pa'i rigs //

T02D1180:103a-43: gdab par rigs pa ma 'gags sam zhes zhus pa
T02D1180:103a-44: dang / slar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1180:103a-45: sems spangs nas ni lus kyi ni //
T02D1180:103b-0: gnas @103b pa gzhan du mthong mi 'gyur //

T02D1180:103b-4: de'i phyir thugs kyi rigs la sku'i rigs kyis rgyas btab na mdzes par 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1180:103b-6: me ni gdol ba mong bshad pa //
T02D1180:103b-7: 'dod chags phyag rgyas gdol ba mo //
T02D1180:103b-8: rigs de phyag rgya gzhan min na //
T02D1180:103b-9: ji ltar rin chen phyag rgya lags //
T02D1180:103b-10: zhes bya ba ni me'i khams gdol ba mo la
T02D1180:103b-11: 'dod chags kyi phyag rgya dpag med 'od kyis gdab
T02D1180:103b-12: par rigs pa ma lags sam /
T02D1180:103b-14: rin chen 'byung ldan gyis me'i rigs la phyag rgyas gdab ces zhus pa dang /
T02D1180:103b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so //
T02D1180:103b-16: gang phyir 'dod chags khrag bshad pa //
T02D1180:103b-17: khrag ni rin chen 'byung ldan nyid //
T02D1180:103b-18: drod ni khrag gi rang bzhin phyir //
T02D1180:103b-19: 'dod chags ser sna'i phyag rgyas gdab //

T02D1180:103b-22: khrag ma gtogs par drod mi 'byung ste de bas na /
T02D1180:103b-23: ser sna'i rigs ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyis rgyas gdab par gsungs so //
T02D1180:103b-25: gang phyir g-yung mo rlung nyid de //

T02D1180:103b-28: gtso mo phyag rgyas rigs par 'gyur //
T02D1180:103b-30: g-yung mo rlung du bshad pa la //
T02D1180:103b-31: don yod grub pa rlung nyid kyi //
T02D1180:103b-32: phyag rgya rigs pa ma lags sam //
T02D1180:103b-34: 'dod chags kyi rigs 'od dpag med kyis rgyas btab ces zhus pa dang /
T02D1180:103b-35: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so //
T02D1180:103b-36: 'dod chags ma gtogs phrag dog ni //
T02D1180:103b-37: gzhan du 'byung ba ma yin te //
T02D1180:103b-38: de phyir 'dod chags phyag rgya yis //
T02D1180:103b-39: mkhas pas g-yung mo phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D1180:103b-41: 'di ltar phrag dog thams cad ni 'dod chags las 'byung la /

T02D1180:103b-44: dpag med 'od 'dod chags kyis rlung gi rigs la rgyas gdab ces bya ba gsungs so //
T02D1180:104a-0: de ltar brjod pa'i rigs pa rnams ni 'byung ba bzhi'i lha mo @104a * //
T02D1180:104a-1: rnams la rgyas gdab pa'i rigs pa yin la /
T02D1180:104a-2: phyogs kyi lha mo phung po'i rang bzhin rnams kyang
T02D1180:104a-3: don de ltar khong du chud par bya'o zhes gsungs
T02D1180:104a-5: gang phyir gzugs ni sra ba nyid //
T02D1180:104a-7: ma log pa las phyag rgya'o //
T02D1180:104a-8: zhes pa la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs pas rim pa bzhin shes par bya'o //
T02D1180:104a-9: da ni gtor ma'i de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02D1180:104a-10: kye yi rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1180:104a-11: snyoms 'jug pa yi lha nyid la //
T02D1180:104a-12: sems can don phyir gtor ma che //

T02D1180:104a-14: zhes pa la stong pa nyid dang snying rje tha
T02D1180:104a-15: mi dad pa'i bde ba la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan
T02D1180:104a-16: 'das la / phyi dang nang gi gtor ma de
T02D1180:104a-17: kho na nyid bdag med mas zhus pa zhes pa'i
T02D1180:104a-18: 'das la / don to // ae wam rnam par bzhugs nas ni //
T02D1180:104a-19: bgegs dang log par 'dren pa las //
T02D1180:104a-20: sems can rnams kyi srog bsrung phyir //
T02D1180:104a-21: rdo rje sems dpas gtor ma bstan ;
T02D1180:104a-22: / zhes bya ba la de ltar bdag med mas zhus pa'i rjes la /
T02D1180:104a-23: phyi nang gi 'byung bo thams cad la phan gdags par dgongs nas /
T02D1180:104a-24: gtor ma'i de kho na nyid 'di skad gsungs zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1180:104a-41: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1180:104a-42: 'di'i don yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las ji skad du /
T02D1180:104a-43: bdag dang rnal 'byor gnas bsrung ba //
T02D1180:104a-44: dkyil 'khor khang ba dang bcas pa //
T02D1180:104a-45: kye yi rdo rjer bdag bskyed la //
T02D1180:104a-46: gtor ma'i cho ga bya ba nyid //
T02D1180:104a-47: de bzhin gzhal yas khang la sogs //
T02D1180:104a-48: go rims ji bzhin bskyed pa la //
T02D1180:104a-49: dbus kyi gru gsum nam mkha' la //
T02D1180:104a-50: kye rdor rang bzhin 'byung po dgod //
T02D1180:104a-51: sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin phyir //
T02D1180:104a-52: aom dang a'a: dang h'um las ni //
T02D1180:104a-53: mgron rnams kun yang bsam byas la //
T02D1180:104a-54: sku gsung thugs su dmigs par bya ;
T02D1180:104a-55: / de la rigs par go ku sogs //
T02D1180:104a-56: sbyang spel spar dang bdud rtsi yis //
T02D1180:104a-57: yi ge bzhi dang ldan byas la //
T02D1180:104a-58: de dag tshogs la dbul bar bya //
T02D1180:104a-59: zhes gsungs pa'i don khong du chud par byas la bdag dang gzhan gyi srog bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1180:104a-60: de bzhin du nges pa'i don yang //
T02D1180:104b-0: 'byung po rang rang gi snying @104b ga'i rtsa 'dab
T02D1180:104b-1: brgyad po brgya byin la sogs pa thun brgyad yin
T02D1180:104b-2: la / steng gi sgra gcan dang 'og gi dus
T02D1180:104b-3: kyi me ni nyi ma dang zla ba yin no
T02D1180:104b-4: la / // t'a la p'a t'a lam ni lte ba'i steng dang 'og go //
T02D1180:104b-5: de rnams tshim par byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags aa
T02D1180:104b-6: k'a ro mu kham zhes pa la sogs pa ste

T02D1180:104b-8: gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro zhes pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D1180:104b-9: 'di ltar aa zhes pa ni tshig gi brjod pa kun las 'das pa /
T02D1180:104b-10: mi shigs pa'i sgrar gnas pa la bya'o //
T02D1180:104b-11: 'di ltar mi shigs pa'i sgrar gnas pa 'di ni srog chen po ste /
T02D1180:104b-12: gtor ma 'dis srog bsrung ba ni nges pa yin la /
T02D1180:104b-13: tshul gzhan du bskal ba dpag tu med par gtor

T02D1180:104b-15: pa ni / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' lung ngo //

T02D1180:104b-19: rnal 'byor ba rnams legs par 'gyur te zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1180:104b-20: 'di ltar drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyis dbye ste /
T02D1180:104b-21: de la gang drang ba'i don de ni phyi rol du ji ltar bstan pa rnams yin la /

T02D1180:104b-28: lha mo rnams dang 'gro bar rab tu 'byor ba rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //

T02D1180:104b-31: pa'i srog gi rlung gis gtor ma byin na zhes
T02D1180:104b-33: bde ba dbang du bsdus pas dbang ngo //

T02D1180:104b-37: bde ba 'gugs shing des nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba
T02D1180:104b-38: zhi zhing bde ba'i ye shes rgyas par byed pa'i
T02D1180:104b-39: phyir zhi ba dang rgyas par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1180:105a-1: kyi phyag rgya las rgyas gdab pa'i rigs pa bstan par bya'o //

T02D1180:105a-3: phyag rgya gang gis mkha' spyod ma //

T02D1180:105a-6: zhes bya ba la mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod ma dag la /
T02D1180:105a-7: phyag rgya gang gis gdab par bgyi zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1180:105a-8: bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rjes slar gsungs pa /
T02D1180:105a-9: gsang gsum 'khor lo'i dbus su ni //
T02D1180:105a-10: sku gsung thugs su dbye ba las //
T02D1180:105a-11: steng dang 'og dang dbus gnas kyi //
T02D1180:105a-12: 'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par gnas //
T02D1180:105a-14: gsang ba gsum gyi 'khor lo ni //
T02D1180:105a-15: sa 'og sa steng sa bla rnams //
T02D1180:105a-16: rnam pa gsum du phye ba ste //
T02D1180:105a-17: bde mchog 'khor lor rab tu bsgrags //
T02D1180:105a-18: sa spyod sku yi phyag rgya can //
T02D1180:105a-19: steng zhal sku yi phyag rgya ma //
T02D1180:105a-20: gti mug sku yi rigs can te //
T02D1180:105a-21: rnam snang mdzad du rab tu bsgrags //
T02D1180:105a-22: mkha' spyod 'dod chags phyag rgya can //
T02D1180:105a-23: 'og zhal gsung gi rdo rje ma //
T02D1180:105a-24: 'dod chags gsung gi rigs can te //
T02D1180:105a-25: dpag med 'od du rab tu bsgrags //
T02D1180:105a-26: thugs kyi rdo rje bdag med ma /
T02D1180:105a-27: sems ni dpag med tshul can nyid //
T02D1180:105a-28: sems ni dbus kyi gnas su ste //
T02D1180:105a-29: de phyir bdag med dbus su 'khrungs //
T02D1180:105a-30: sems ni nam mkha'i rigs can nyid //
T02D1180:105a-31: mgon po mi bskyod sems su bsgrags //
T02D1180:105a-32: 'di gsum dbus kyi rtsa yi gzugs //
T02D1180:105a-33: lo gsum zla ba phyed dang gnyis //
T02D1180:105a-34: 'di yi chos su rab bstan te //
T02D1180:105a-35: 'dus pa la sogs rgyud chen rnams //
T02D1180:105a-37: de bas sku gsung thugs kyi rigs //
T02D1180:105a-38: zhal gsum par ni rab tu brjod //
T02D1180:105a-39: rgyas par rab tu phye ba las //
T02D1180:105a-40: rigs ni rnam pa drug tu brjod //
T02D1180:105a-41: sa dang chu dang me dang ni //
T02D1180:105a-42: rlung dang nam mkha'i khams dag dang //
T02D1180:105a-43: ye shes khams dang drug tu brjod //
T02D1180:105a-44: rnam gsum nyi ma zla ba me //
T02D1180:105a-45: rnam lnga mun can sgra gcan 'dzin //
T02D1180:105a-46: gsum la gnyis kyis bsnan pas lnga //
T02D1180:105a-47: khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs //
T02D1180:105a-48: 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhal lnga pa //
T02D1180:105a-50: gzhan yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du /
T02D1180:105b-0: phyi'i skye bo rnams 'jug par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa 'di @105b lta ste ;
T02D1180:105b-1: mi bskyod rnam snang rin chen 'byung //
T02D1180:105b-2: dpag med phrag dog rdo rje sems //
T02D1180:105b-3: rigs ni rnam pa drug bshad pa //
T02D1180:105b-4: nyon mongs rnam drug rnam par sbyong //
T02D1180:105b-5: zhe sdang gti mug ser sna dang //
T02D1180:105b-6: 'dod chags phrag dog bde ba dag / nyon mongs drug tu rab tu bsgrags //
T02D1180:105b-7: 'dis ni rim par bsgom pa nyid //
T02D1180:105b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' spangs nas ni //
T02D1180:105b-9: phyi nas rigs ni rnam pa lnga //
T02D1180:105b-10: zhes bya bas ni 'khrigs pa'i 'dod chags spangs nas rigs rnam pa lngar 'gyur te /
T02D1180:105b-11: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes spangs nas zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1180:105b-13: ye shes kyi rigs kyis kun la khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1180:105b-14: de bzhin du rdul dang mun pa dang snying stobs kyi dbye ba'am //
T02D1180:105b-15: nyi zla sgra gcan 'dzin gyi dbye bas /
T02D1180:105b-16: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis //
T02D1180:105b-17: rdo rje rnam pa gsum du 'gyur //
T02D1180:105b-19: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nam mkha'i khams 'di yin te ;
T02D1180:105b-21: rigs gcig nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yin te /
T02D1180:105b-22: nam mkha' gcig gis gzugs tha mi dad pa'i gzugs kyis gnas pa'i phyir /
T02D1180:105b-23: mi bskyod zhe sdang gzugs can gyi //
T02D1180:105b-24: thugs kyi bdag po'i ro gcig nyid //
T02D1180:105b-26: de bas na thugs kyi rigs 'di nyid las rigs lnga dang rigs drug la sogs pa nas /
T02D1180:105b-27: dpag tu med pa'i rigs rnams 'byung ba'i phyir //
T02D1180:105b-28: zhe sdang rdo rje'i byin brlabs 'di //
T02D1180:105b-29: rigs ni lnga dang drug tu brjod //
T02D1180:105b-31: kye'i rdo rje'i nges pa'i don gyi rgya cher bshad pa las /
T02D1180:105b-32: rgyud thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o /
T02D1180:105b-34: // / zhal brgyad phyag ni bcu drug pa //
T02D1180:105b-35: dpa' bo thod phreng can btud nas //
T02D1180:105b-36: kye'i rdor mngon par 'byung ba yi //
T02D1180:105b-37: rgyas bshad rdo rje snying pos bri //
T02D1180:105b-38: phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa //
T02D1180:105b-39: zhabs bzhi pa dang 'jigs pa po ;
T02D1180:105b-40: / dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can //
T02D1180:105b-41: bdag med mas ni sku la 'khyud //
T02D1180:105b-43: stong pa bcu drug gis mtshan pa'i phyag bcu drug dang /
T02D1180:105b-44: rnam par thar pa brgyad dag pa zhal brgyad dang /
T02D1180:106a-0: don mthun pa la sogs pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dag pa'i zhabs bzhi @106a * //
T02D1180:106a-5: khro bar bcos pa la sogs pa khro bo'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1180:106a-6: rjod byed lnga bcu dag pa'i mgo bo'i phreng ba'i
T02D1180:106a-7: do shal 'dzin pa stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid
T02D1180:106a-8: yum chen mos la khyud pa'i sku can ;
T02D1180:106a-9: yi ge lnga dag pa'i phyag rgya lnga 'dzin pa'i
T02D1180:106a-10: bcom ldan 'das he ru ka la bdag med mas
T02D1180:106a-11: zhus pa / bco lngas yongs su bskor ba nyid //
T02D1180:106a-12: bdag gi 'khor lo khyod bshad na //
T02D1180:106a-13: khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags //
T02D1180:106a-14: gtso bo bdag gis sngar ma 'tshal //
T02D1180:106a-16: 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems kyi zla ba cha shas bco lnga'i bdag nyid can /
T02D1180:106a-17: mngon par rdzogs pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D1180:106a-18: rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid can /
T02D1180:106a-19: bdag gi dkyil 'khor lha mo lnga gsum gyi bdag nyid legs par gsungs lags na /
T02D1180:106a-20: gtso bo khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags /
T02D1180:106a-21: sngar ma gsungs pa gsung bar rigs so zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1180:106a-22: bdag med ma la'o mdzad nas //
T02D1180:106a-23: rdo rje thod par stsal nas ni //
T02D1180:106a-24: lha mo'i nu ma mnye mdzad de //
T02D1180:106a-25: dkyil 'khor yang dag rab tu bstan //
T02D1180:106a-26: zhes bya ba ni bdag med ma la nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bstan bar mdzad ba'i ched du /
T02D1180:106a-27: sngon du 'dod chags kyi chos rab tu bstan par mdzad nas /
T02D1180:106a-28: bshad par zhal gyis bzhes pa'o //
T02D1180:106a-29: 'khor lo ji ltar sngar brjod pa //
T02D1180:106a-31: rdo rje thig gis yang dag brgyan //
T02D1180:106a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1180:106a-33: dkyil 'khor gyi khang bu'i mtshan nyid phyi nang du phye ba las /
T02D1180:106a-34: bskyed pa'i rang bzhin ni khyod nyid kyi khang bu
T02D1180:106a-35: brtsegs pa dang mtshungs so zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1180:106a-36: // 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas //
T02D1180:106a-37: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin las //
T02D1180:106a-38: khyod dang lhan cig bzhin bzangs ma //
T02D1180:106a-39: de la dbus su nga yod de //
T02D1180:106a-41: kye lha mo khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1180:106a-42: khyod nyid dang por byas pa'i bco lnga'i bdag nyid yin la /
T02D1180:106a-43: 'dir ni bco lnga yongs su spangs pa'i bdag nyid khyod dang nga gnyis yongs su 'khrigs pa las /
T02D1180:106a-44: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin can khyod kyi lha
T02D1180:106b-0: mo brgyad kyis yongs su bskor @106b ba'o zhes pa'i
T02D1180:106b-1: don to // zhal brgyad pa la zhes pa nas /
T02D1180:106b-2: sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi bor mtshan //
T02D1180:106b-4: grong khyer nyams dgar khyod dang nga //
T02D1180:106b-5: zhes pa yan chad kyis ni /
T02D1180:106b-6: bcom ldan 'das gtso bo chen po nyid kyi sku
T02D1180:106b-7: brtse ba'i rang bzhin bdag med ma la gsal bar
T02D1180:106b-9: byis pa'i skye bo rnams gzhug pa'i phyir /
T02D1180:106b-10: sku mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yon tan thams cad
T02D1180:106b-11: kyis rab tu spras pa brjid bag thams cad dang
T02D1180:106b-12: ldan pa bstan par mdzad pa'i don to //
T02D1180:106b-13: grong khyer nyams dgar khyod dang nga //
T02D1180:106b-14: dga' bas shin tu rol pa las //
T02D1180:106b-15: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi khang bu chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid can /
T02D1180:106b-16: dpe med pa'i yul gyi yon tan gyis spras pa'i nang du /
T02D1180:106b-17: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas rol cing gnas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1180:106b-18: dkar mo dbang po'i phyogs phyung nas //
T02D1180:106b-19: shar gyi sgo ru yang dag gnas //
T02D1180:106b-21: rlung gi phyogs su g-yung mo nyid //
T02D1180:106b-22: ces bya ba la sogs pa yan chad kyis ni /
T02D1180:106b-23: de ltar lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i rol pa las /
T02D1180:106b-24: lha mo brgyad 'byung bar ston pa'i rdo rje'i tshig go //
T02D1180:106b-25: des ni 'jig rten pa'i srid pa'i skyed par byed
T02D1180:106b-26: pa'i chos pha dang ma yis bu tsha bskyed pa'i
T02D1180:106b-28: de nyid lus can rnams kyi srog 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i khyad par gyis //
T02D1180:106b-31: thun tshod dang thun mtshams bzhi bzhi ste brgyad kyis
T02D1180:106b-32: bcu drug phyed kyi khu ba'i thig le 'khrid par
T02D1180:106b-33: byed de / nyin mtshan gyi chos rab tu bstan la /
T02D1180:106b-35: gtso bo nyid kyis ni mtshams kyi me'i ri mo can du 'jug pa'i rlung bstan to //
T02D1180:106b-36: de nas rdo rje chags chen las //
T02D1180:106b-37: rig mar bcas pa khu bar gyur //
T02D1180:106b-38: zhes pa ni pha dang ma'i bya ba yongs su rdzogs nas /
T02D1180:106b-40: gzhan du na srog gi rtsa la brten pa'i khams
T02D1180:106b-41: thams cad nang du thim ste rgyu ba med par
T02D1180:106b-42: bstan to // de bzhin du bskul ba'i sa la bzhengs pa dang /
T02D1180:106b-43: lam gnyis kyis byang chub bdag pa ston te zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1180:106b-44: sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa las //
T02D1180:107a-2: rje btsun snying rje'i yid bzhengs shig / zhes pa nas /
T02D1180:107a-3: thugs rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig / ces pa
T02D1180:107a-4: la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i glu'i tshig rnams kyi ni
T02D1180:107a-5: / 'di ltar 'jig rten na pha ma dag yongs su 'khogs te /
T02D1180:107a-6: 'jig rten pha rol du song ba la bu dang
T02D1180:107a-7: bu mo la sogs pa smre sngags 'don cing cho
T02D1180:107a-8: nges 'debs la / 'di skad ces mgon po kho bo cag la mgon dang skyabs ma mchis kyis /
T02D1180:107a-9: kyi hud kyi hud bskyab tu gsol zhes zer zhing mtshun la 'thor bar byed do //
T02D1180:107a-10: de bzhin du nyan thos kyi skye po rnams la
T02D1180:107a-11: grong khyer rtsva mchog gi phyogs su mya ngan las
T02D1180:107a-13: nyan thos chen po rnams smre sngags 'don cing cho nges 'debs te /
T02D1180:107a-14: klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang mya ngan byed ce'o //
T02D1180:107a-15: de nyid gzhan gyi srog gi rlung thams cad nang du zhugs te /
T02D1180:107a-16: bde ba chen po'i khams la gnas pa las /
T02D1180:107a-17: sems can thams cad kyi don du sa dang chu
T02D1180:107a-18: dang me dang rlung rnams kyi khams kyis sad par
T02D1180:107a-19: byas te / 'gro ba'i don la 'jug pa ni nges pa'i don to //
T02D1180:107a-20: glong po rta bong glang rnga mo //
T02D1180:107a-21: mi dang sha ra bha byi la //
T02D1180:107a-22: g-yas pa'i thod pa brgyad po la //
T02D1180:107a-23: glang po la sogs rim shes bya //
T02D1180:107a-24: zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i phyag gi mtshan ma brgyad ston pa'o //
T02D1180:107a-26: sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni //
T02D1180:107a-27: me dang zla ba nyi ma nyid //
T02D1180:107a-28: mthar byed dang ni nor 'dzin te //
T02D1180:107a-29: g-yon pa'i thod ba brgyad na'o //
T02D1180:107a-31: phyag g-yon gyi mtshan ma brgyad de //
T02D1180:107a-32: 'di rnams kyi dag pa ni glo dang dbugs dang zhes pa nas /
T02D1180:107a-33: phyug po thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1180:107a-34: zhes gsungs pas rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1180:107a-35: de bzhin du gtso bo chen po gar gyi ro dgu dang ldan par ston to //
T02D1180:107a-36: 'di ltar rin chen sna bdun te //
T02D1180:107a-37: de la dmag dpon rin chen zhes //
T02D1180:107a-38: bde bar gshegs pas rab gsungs pa //
T02D1180:107a-39: tshul dgu rab ldan dmag dpon yin //
T02D1180:107a-40: sgeg pas 'gro ba shes rab bskyed //
T02D1180:107a-41: mdzad spyod nyam nga med pa'o //
T02D1180:107a-42: gdug rtsub rab ldan 'jigs pa po //
T02D1180:107a-43: log lta zhe gcod gshe ba'i tshul //
T02D1180:107a-44: rdo rje sems dpa' bteg pa la //
T02D1180:107a-45: dba' la dpa' bo'i de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1180:107a-46: rdo rje 'dzin pa snying rje la //
T02D1180:107b-0: @107b rgod la 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog / rdo rje nyi ma khro ba che //
T02D1180:107b-1: rdo rje drag po 'jigs pa la //
T02D1180:107b-2: sh'akya thub pa mi sdug la //
T02D1180:107b-3: ngo mtshar la ni aa ra lli //
T02D1180:107b-4: rmad byung chos sgrogs bzhad par snang //
T02D1180:107b-5: gdul dka' khro ba snying rjer ston //
T02D1180:107b-6: nyon mongs grub mdzad ngo mtshar tshul //
T02D1180:107b-7: khro drag mi g-yo zhi ba'i tshul //
T02D1180:107b-8: zhes pa la sogs pa ni gar stabs dgu'i don to //
T02D1180:107b-9: de lta bu'i gar stabs dgu dang ldan pa'i dpa' bo bzhengs pa ni /
T02D1180:107b-10: aom dang h'um gis rdo rje che //
T02D1180:107b-11: khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs nas ni //
T02D1180:107b-12: zhabs rnams sa la brdegs pa dang //
T02D1180:107b-13: lha dang lha min bsdigs par mdzad //
T02D1180:107b-15: sngon gyi sa bon gyi gzugs las /
T02D1180:107b-16: yi ge aam h'um gnyis las thod pa gri gug lta bur gyur cing /
T02D1180:107b-17: de las gzugs bzhengs pa'i don to //
T02D1180:107b-18: bdag med ma dang gtso bo'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
T02D1180:107b-19: bcu drug dang bcu gnyis nyi ma dang zla bar
T02D1180:107b-20: rab tu gsal zhing dri ma med par gyur pa'i
T02D1180:107b-21: don to // des 'gro ba'i don byed pa ni nges pa'i don to //
T02D1180:107b-22: gam tsam bam gham pam sham lam dam zhes pa
T02D1180:107b-23: ni thig le'i gzugs can ming gi dang po'i yi
T02D1180:107b-24: ge brgyad do // 'di yis sa bon dbyung ba dang //
T02D1180:107b-25: zhes pa ni lha mo brgyad bskyed pa'i dus su sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1180:107b-27: bdag po yi ni sa bon dag / aam h'um sngon po 'bar 'jigs pas //
T02D1180:107b-29: gtso bo 'di ltar bsgom pa nyid //
T02D1180:107b-30: ces pa yan chad kyis ni /
T02D1180:107b-31: gtso bo bskyed pa'i rang bzhin gsal bar bstan te /
T02D1180:107b-32: gong du bstan pa nyid do //
T02D1180:107b-33: da ni lha mo brgyad kyi phyag g-yas g-yon gyi phyag mtshan rnams bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1180:107b-34: dkar mo'i g-yas na gri gug ste //
T02D1180:107b-36: g-yon nas sdigs mdzub de bzhin no //
T02D1180:107b-37: zhes pa yan chad kyis bstan te /
T02D1180:107b-38: 'di ltar rang rang gi gdan gyi steng du nyi zla kha sbyar ba'i nang na /
T02D1180:107b-39: sngon gyi yi ge rnams gnas par bsam zhing /
T02D1180:107b-40: de dag yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1180:107b-41: g-yas pa'i phyag mtshan brgyad du bsams pa dang /
T02D1180:107b-42: de yongs su gyur pa las kyang lha mo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D1180:107b-43: ci'i phyir g-yas pa'i mtshan ma las yongs su rdzogs par bya zhe na /
T02D1180:107b-44: rtsa ba'i rgyud las ji skad du //
T02D1180:107b-45: lus can lag pa g-yas pa yis //
T02D1180:108a-2: stong nyid shes rab g-yas pa ni //
T02D1180:108a-3: de bzhin bya ba thams cad byed //
T02D1180:108a-4: sems can don la brtson pa las //
T02D1180:108a-5: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis ni //
T02D1180:108a-6: goo r'i la sogs lha mo rnams //
T02D1180:108a-7: kun du legs par gnas par 'dod //
T02D1180:108a-9: / de bzhin du nyon mongs pa gcod par mdzad pa dang /
T02D1180:108a-10: stong pa nyid kyi sgra sgrogs pa dang /
T02D1180:108a-11: mi g-yo ba'i bde ba dang /
T02D1180:108a-12: zhe sdang la sogs pa de kho na nyid kyis rgyan du bcing ba /
T02D1180:108a-13: bya ba thams cad la the tshom med par bya ba dang /
T02D1180:108a-14: dgra bcom pa brten pa dang /
T02D1180:108a-15: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T02D1180:108a-16: nyon mongs pa gzhom pa'i phyir /
T02D1180:108a-17: g-yas na gri gug la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan brgyad rim pa bzhin sbyar ro //
T02D1180:108a-18: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i brgyad ni /
T02D1180:108a-19: 'di ltar reg na bde ba dang /
T02D1180:108a-20: gti mug sad par bya ba dang /
T02D1180:108a-23: nyon mongs pa tshar gcod pa dang /
T02D1180:108a-25: nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T02D1180:108a-26: dri ma med pa'i gnas mtshon pa ste /
T02D1180:108a-27: rim pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1180:108a-28: dkar mo la sogs phyag gnyis brjod //
T02D1180:108a-29: spyan gsum dbu skra gyen du brjes //
T02D1180:108a-30: phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D1180:108a-31: zhes pa la sogs pa ni lha mo thams cad

T02D1180:111b-4: zhes smos pa'i shugs kyis bzhi ru nges te /

T02D1180:111b-8: 'di nyid kyi bshad pa'i rgyud mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur las kyang ji skad du //
T02D1180:111b-9: dang po ru ni bum pa'i dbang //
T02D1180:111b-10: gnyis pa gsang ba zhes su brjod //
T02D1180:111b-11: gsum pa shes rab ye shes te //
T02D1180:111b-12: bzhi pa slar yang de bzhin no //
T02D1180:111b-14: slob dpon gyi dbang ni drang ba'i don du bum pa yin la /
T02D1180:111b-15: nges pa'i don du ni bzhi pa la sogs pa
T02D1180:111b-16: yongs su rdzogs pa kho na slob dpon zhes brjod
T02D1180:111b-17: kyis / bum pa tsam ni ma yin no //
T02D1180:111b-19: slob dpon gyi nges tshig dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1180:111b-21: gnyis dang gnyis kyis phye ba yis //
T02D1180:111b-22: bum sogs dang po bzhi mtha' can //
T02D1180:111b-24: dbang bskur rdzogs par shes par bya //
T02D1180:111b-25: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
T02D1180:111b-26: rtsa ba'i rgyud 'bum phrag lnga pa dang //
T02D1180:111b-27: rgyud 'bum pa'i mngon par brjod pa zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1180:111b-28: dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D1180:111b-29: chen po rnams las rgyas par khong du chud par
T02D1180:111b-30: bya'i / 'dir ni mdor bsdus te bstan pa tsam mo //
T02D1180:111b-31: ji ltar mchod dang bstod bshad pa //
T02D1180:111b-32: slob ma bzang pos sngar shes bya //
T02D1180:111b-33: zhes bya bas slob ma blo dang ldan pas sngon
T02D1180:111b-34: du bla ma mchod la rgyud nas ji ltar gsungs
T02D1180:111b-35: pa'i bstod pa / khong stong khyod kyi sku la med //
T02D1180:111b-36: ces pa la sogs pas bstod pa bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1180:111b-37: de nyid de la bstan pa ni //
T02D1180:111b-38: dga' bral dang po mchog mtha' can //
T02D1180:111b-39: thams cad rgyud du sbas pa ste //
T02D1180:111b-40: mtha' yi mtha' yis phya ba nyid //
T02D1180:111b-41: ces bya ba la gnas snga ma snga ma'i dbang
T02D1180:111b-42: gis byis pa rnams kyis re zhig rtogs par bya

T02D1180:111b-44: ma can gang zhig rgyud thams cad du sbas pa
T02D1180:111b-45: ba'i phyir / / de slob ma'i skye bo mchog la bstan par bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1180:111b-46: de ni ji skad du sgyu 'phrul dra ba las kyang /
T02D1180:111b-47: chags bral dang po chags pa che //
T02D1180:112a-0: de bzhin du dang po'i mchog gi sangs rgyas @112a * //
T02D1180:112a-1: zhes bya ba'i rgyud las kyang ji skad du //
T02D1180:112a-2: phyogs gnyis po yi bag chags kyi //

T02D1180:112a-5: de kho na nyid de rgyud thams cad dang mi
T02D1180:112a-6: 'gal bar bstan par bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go
T02D1180:112a-7: // rdo rje mchod par rab sbyar nas //

T02D1180:112a-9: lha de'i skad cig ji ltar lags //

T02D1180:112a-17: srid min mya ngan 'das min pa //
T02D1180:112a-18: 'di ni mchog tu bde chen nyid //
T02D1180:112a-19: bdag min gzhan yang min pa nyid //
T02D1180:112a-21: lha mo de'i skad cig ni srid pa ste /
T02D1180:112a-22: sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi gnas nas 'phos pa dang /
T02D1180:112a-23: mya ngan 'das min te gang gi sgo nas ma 'das pa nyid //
T02D1180:112a-24: thog ma tha ma dbus min zhes pa yang yin la /
T02D1180:112a-25: bdag min gzhan yang min pa nyid //

T02D1180:112a-27: mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i skad cig kyang yin zhes pa'i don to //

T02D1180:112a-30: thog ma tha ma med zhi ba /
T02D1180:112a-31: gtso bo dngos dang dngos mi mnga' //
T02D1180:112a-32: stong pa snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02D1180:112a-33: byang chub sems zhes brjod pa yin //
T02D1180:112a-35: de lta bas na rdo rje'i tshig 'di'i don ni /
T02D1180:112a-36: 'di ltar rtogs shing khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1180:112a-37: longs spyod kyi ni rlabs gnyis las //
T02D1180:112a-38: rang lag g-yas dang g-yon pa yis //
T02D1180:112a-39: mthe bong dang ni srin lag gis //
T02D1180:112a-40: da ni rnal 'byor ba yis btsir //
T02D1180:112a-41: zhes bya ba la rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pa
T02D1180:112a-42: gang gis rang gi rgyal mtshan gyi ngos gnyis na
T02D1180:112a-43: gnas pa'i chu bo 'bab pa'i rgyun gyi slob ma
T02D1180:112a-44: la gsang bas gsang bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang
T02D1180:112a-45: / de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gang gi rtsal
T02D1180:112a-46: gyis btsir bar gyur pa des na g-yas nas 'gro
T02D1180:112a-47: / zhing / g-yon nas 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i don dang /
T02D1180:112b-0: de bzhin du rnam par @112b rtog pas kun nas
T02D1180:112b-1: bcings pa'i skye bo 'ga' la dngos su longs spyod
T02D1180:112b-2: rdzogs pa'i 'khor gnas kyi g-yas g-yon du slob dpon
T02D1180:112b-3: gyi lag pa g-yas g-yon gyis btsir bar gyur na
T02D1180:112b-4: / de las ye shes skye 'gyur te //
T02D1180:112b-5: de la ci zhig skye zhe na //
T02D1180:112b-6: gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji ltar ba'am //
T02D1180:112b-7: lkugs pa'i rmi lam lta bu'o //
T02D1180:112b-9: de lta bu'i gnas skabs gsum gyi khyad par gyis //
T02D1180:112b-10: khyad par du byas pa na brjod pa'i yul las
T02D1180:112b-11: tha dad pa dper na dge slong gang gis bsam
T02D1180:112b-12: gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i
T02D1180:112b-13: bde ba las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa 'byung
T02D1180:112b-15: don 'di ni mchog gi dang po zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud las kyang ji skad du //
T02D1180:112b-16: lang tsho yis ni bde thob pa //

T02D1180:112b-18: de bzhin ting 'dzin bral ba yis //
T02D1180:112b-19: bde ba smra bar mi nus so //
T02D1180:112b-21: don ni rgyas par khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1180:112b-22: mchog ni mtha' dang dga' bral dbus //
T02D1180:112b-23: zhes bya ba ni gong du rgyas par bstan la /
T02D1180:112b-24: stong dang stong min he ru ka / zhes bya ba ni //
T02D1180:112b-25: rtogs par 'gyur zhes tha tshig rnam par sbyar bar byas la /
T02D1180:112b-26: stong pa ni gang gi sgo nas brgal ba dang /
T02D1180:112b-27: stong min ni srid pa ste /
T02D1180:112b-28: sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor la mi gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1180:112b-29: kye'i rdo rje nges pa'i don gyi rgya cher bshad pa las /
T02D1180:112b-30: kyi'i rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u'i rgya cher bshad pa ste lnga pa'o /
T02D1180:112b-32: // / sems can rnams ni gdul ba'i phyir //
T02D1180:112b-33: rmad 'byung ngo mtshar gzugs can la //
T02D1180:112b-34: phyag 'tshal nas ni bu lon gyi //
T02D1180:112b-35: rim pa rdo rje snying pos bri //

T02D1180:112b-39: sngon du lha mo la ni dam 'khyud cing //
T02D1180:112b-40: mnyam sbyar bde ba myong mdzad nas //
T02D1180:112b-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1180:112b-42: gar thabs kyi bstan bcos dpag tu med pa tshar
T02D1180:112b-43: byung bar mdzad nas cho ga gsungs zhes bya bar
T02D1180:112b-44: sbyar bar bya'o // de la re zhig spyod pa'i

T02D1180:113a-0: sbyar bar bya'o // rnal @113a * // 'byor la gnas pa rnams kyis /
T02D1180:113a-1: phyi dang nang du phye la bcang bar bya'o zhes skabs de nyid du legs par bstan pa //
T02D1180:113a-2: bu lon bri ba'i skabs 'dir ni rang gi dam
T02D1180:113a-3: tshig rnam pa lnga las slob dpon mi smad cing
T02D1180:113a-4: / kun nas kun du bsten par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1180:113a-5: dang por phyag rgya lnga ni rab phye bas //
T02D1180:113a-6: bla ma slob dpon 'dod lha la //
T02D1180:113a-9: phyag rgya bsten phyir ska rags nyid //
T02D1180:113a-10: ces bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /
T02D1180:113a-11: phyi dang nang du phye ba las //
T02D1180:113a-12: phyi ni sgra ji bzhin pa rgyud nas gsungs pa kho na yin la /
T02D1180:113a-13: nges pa'i don ni rtsa ba'i rgyud nyid las ji skad gsungs te /
T02D1180:113a-14: bla ma slob dpon 'dod lha zhes pa sum cu
T02D1180:113a-15: rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor na yon tan lci ba'i
T02D1180:113a-16: 'byung gnas rab tu gnas pa rtogs par bya ba
T02D1180:113a-17: la btud pa'i don du 'khor los mtshan to //
T02D1180:113a-18: de nyid la skye bo ma rungs pa dag smod pa slar gzhug par bya zhing ;
T02D1180:113a-19: rang gnas de las mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir rna chas mtshan to //
T02D1180:113a-20: srog gi rlung mi shigs par gnas pa la 'bad pa'i phyir mgul rgyan gyis mtshan to //
T02D1180:113a-21: byang chub sems kyi srog mi gcad pa'i phyir lag gdub kyis mtshan to //
T02D1180:113a-22: bde ba'i gzhi drug cu rtsa bzhi'i dkyil 'khor las
T02D1180:113a-23: mi 'da' ba'i phyir ska rags kyis mtshan to zhes
T02D1180:113a-25: sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgyas ni //
T02D1180:113a-26: rtag tu lus la phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D1180:113a-28: don du na lus can thams cad kyi srog gi
T02D1180:113a-29: rlung gnas lnga ru bag la zha ba gang yin
T02D1180:113a-30: pa de / rtag tu lus la phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D1180:113a-32: / de nas rab tu bzhad mdzad nas //
T02D1180:113a-34: kye yi rdo rje'i bris sku nyid //
T02D1180:113a-35: bgyi lugs bde ba chen pos gsungs //
T02D1180:113a-36: zhes pa la sogs pas ni //
T02D1180:113a-37: bu don ji ltar bri ba'i lugs //
T02D1180:113a-38: bdag med mas zhus zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1180:113a-41: sgrub pa po yang dam tshig can gyis ni //
T02D1180:113a-42: bris sku yang ni 'jigs pa bri ba nyid //
T02D1180:113a-43: ces pa la sogs pas bstan te /
T02D1180:113a-44: 'di ltar sgrub pa po dang 'bri mkhan la sogs pa dang /
T02D1180:113a-45: ri mo'i don la 'jug pa gang dang gang yin
T02D1180:113a-46: pa de dang de thams cad stong pa nyid dang

T02D1180:113b-4: skyes pa'i thod gnas kha dog lnga //
T02D1180:113b-5: ro yi skra yi pir nyid kyis //
T02D1180:113b-6: bris sku bla med bri ba nyid //
T02D1180:113b-7: ces pa ste tshon sna lnga skyes bu'i thod pa'i
T02D1180:113b-8: snod du sbyar la mi shi ba'i skras bir bya
T02D1180:113b-9: ste tshon lnga po rang bzhin yon tan gyi dbang
T02D1180:113b-10: las skyes bu de dang de'i thod par gzhag ces

T02D1180:113b-12: dam tshig byin brlabs rnal 'byor las //
T02D1180:113b-13: zla ba zla ba'i mar ngo yi //

T02D1180:113b-15: phyed nas ma rungs sems kyis ni //
T02D1180:113b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1180:113b-17: dngos po nye bar dgos pa gang dang gang du

T02D1180:113b-27: bzhin bzangs snying rjer ldan pa dang /
T02D1180:113b-28: gzugs dang lang tshos skal bzangs ma //

T02D1180:113b-48: bu don gyi bstan bcos kyi rjes su tshim par mdzad nas /
T02D1180:113b-49: glegs bam nga yis bshad bya yis //
T02D1180:114a-3: kye lha mo chen mo sbrang chen gyi snag tsha

T02D1180:114a-5: mkhan dam tshig can gyis glegs bam sor bcu gnyis
T02D1180:114a-6: par bri zhes pa'i don te /
T02D1180:114a-7: 'di ltar nyi ma dang zla ba rnam par sbyangs pa'i ros snag tsha la bsres pa dang /
T02D1180:114a-8: rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag pa'i glegs bam sor bcu

T02D1180:114a-10: grub rang bzhin yon tan gyi dbang gis ster ba
T02D1180:114a-11: ni nges pa'o // glegs bam dang ni bris sku nyid //

T02D1180:114a-14: 'jig rten gzhan du'ang spyod yul min //

T02D1180:120b-53: rdo rje ma yis rnam brgyan la //
